query.name: S_DPA_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT * FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idUtente@

query.name: U_SIGN_PREFERENCE
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLE SET CHA_TIPO_FIRMA = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPA_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT CG.SYSTEM_ID, CG.ID_REGISTRO, CG.ID_AMM, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR, CG.ID_OLD, CG.DTA_FINE, TR.NUM_LIVELLO, CG.VAR_CODICE, CG.ID_GRUPPO, CG.CHA_TIPO_CORR, CG.CHA_TIPO_IE, CG.CHA_TIPO_URP, CG.VAR_CODICE_AOO, CG.VAR_CODICE_AMM, CG.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, CG.VAR_EMAIL, CG.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM, CG.ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR WHERE CG.SYSTEM_ID = @idCorrGlobali@ AND CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_AMM_APPARTENENZA_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT a.SYSTEM_ID as ID, a.VAR_CODICE_AMM as CODICE, a.VAR_DESC_AMM as DESCR FROM PEOPLE p, DPA_AMMINISTRA a WHERE p.ID_AMM = a.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(p.USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: UPD_TRASM_UTENTE_RIMOSSO_DAL_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0' , DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST = @param1@ WHERE system_id in( SELECT c.system_id FROM dpa_trasmissione a, dpa_trasm_singola b, dpa_trasm_utente c, dpa_ragione_trasm d WHERE a.system_id = b.id_trasmissione AND b.system_id = c.id_trasm_singola AND a.dta_invio IS NOT NULL AND b.id_corr_globale IN (@param2@) and b.cha_tipo_dest='R' AND (a.cha_tipo_oggetto = 'D' OR a.cha_tipo_oggetto = 'F') AND b.id_ragione = d.system_id AND c.id_people IN (@param3@) and c.cha_in_todolist='1' )

query.name: S_ID_PROFILE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE P WHERE @param1@

query.name: U_LOGIN_AMM
query.value: UPDATE DPA_LOGIN SET DTA_CONNESSIONE=@param1@,SESSION_ID='@param2@' WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param3@')

query.name: D_LOGIN_AMM
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: S_CORR_GLOB_GENERIC
query.value: select @param1@ from dpa_corr_globali where @param2@

query.name: S_AMM_LOGIN
query.value: select system_id as ID, cha_amministratore as TIPO from people where upper(user_id) = upper('@param1@') and user_password = '@param2@' and disabled = 'N'

query.name: S_AMM_LOGIN2
query.value: select system_id_registro from dpa_useradmin_registri where system_id_corr_glob in (select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where id_people = @param1@)

query.name: S_AMM_COD_UNIVOCO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE_AMM) = UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_PROJECT_ID_FROM_LINK
query.value: SELECT PROJECT_ID FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE LINK = @param1@

query.name: LS_IS_UNIQUE_COD
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_AMM = @param2@ AND Upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = '@param1@'

query.name: LS_IS_UNIQUE_COD_LISTA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP='L' AND ID_AMM = @param2@ AND Upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = '@param1@'

query.name: LS_IS_UNIQUE_NOME_LISTA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L' AND UPPER(VAR_DESC_CORR) = '@param1@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: LS_GET_CODICE_LISTA
query.value: SELECT VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: LS_GET_RUOLO_LISTA
query.value: SELECT ID_GRUPPO_LISTE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: LS_GET_NOME_LISTA
query.value: SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = '@param1@' @param2@

query.name: LS_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_BY_COD_LISTA
query.value: SELECT ID_DPA_CORR, L.ID_AMM FROM DPA_LISTE_DISTR, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI L,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE UPPER(L.VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = upper('@param1@') AND L.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_LISTA_DPA_CORR AND C.SYSTEM_ID=DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_DPA_CORR AND C.DTA_FINE IS NULL @param2@ ORDER BY LTRIM(C.VAR_DESC_CORR) ASC

query.name: LS_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_BY_COD_LISTA_BY_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT ID_DPA_CORR, L.ID_AMM FROM DPA_LISTE_DISTR, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI L,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE UPPER(L.VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = upper('@param1@') AND ((L.id_people_liste=@idPeople@ AND L.id_gruppo_liste is null) OR (L.id_gruppo_liste=@idGruppo@ AND L.id_people_liste is null) OR (L.id_people_liste is null AND L.id_gruppo_liste is null)) AND L.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_LISTA_DPA_CORR AND C.SYSTEM_ID=DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_DPA_CORR AND C.DTA_FINE IS NULL @param2@ ORDER BY LTRIM(C.VAR_DESC_CORR) ASC

query.name: LS_GET_LISTE_PER_MODIFICA_UT
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_PEOPLE_LISTE = @param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L' ORDER BY VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: LS_GET_LISTE_PER_RUOLO_UT
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_CORR, VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE (ID_PEOPLE_LISTE = @param1@ OR ID_GRUPPO_LISTE = @param2@) AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L' ORDER BY VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: LS_GET_LISTE_1
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, NOME_LISTA FROM DPA_ELENCO_LISTE WHERE (ID_UTENTE = @param1@ AND ID_AMM = @param2@) OR (ID_UTENTE IS NULL AND ID_AMM = @param2@)

query.name: LS_GET_LISTE_2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_CORR, VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_AMM = @param1@ AND ID_PEOPLE_LISTE IS NULL AND ID_GRUPPO_LISTE IS NULL AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: LS_GET_LISTE_3
query.value: SELECT VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE @param1@ (ID_PEOPLE_LISTE IS NULL AND ID_AMM = @param2@)) AND UPPER(VAR_DESC_CORR) LIKE '%@param3@%' AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: LS_DELETE_LISTA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: LS_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_LISTA
query.value: SELECT ID_DPA_CORR, VAR_DESC_CORR, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, CHA_TIPO_IE, CHA_DISABLED_TRASM FROM DPA_LISTE_DISTR, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_DPA_CORR = DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_LISTA_DPA_CORR = @param1@ AND DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.DTA_FINE IS NULL ORDER BY LTRIM(VAR_DESC_CORR) ASC

query.name: LS_DELETE_CORR_LISTA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LISTE_DISTR WHERE ID_DPA_CORR = @param1@

query.name: LS_RICERCA_CORR_LISTA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE UPPER(VAR_DESC_CORR) LIKE '%@param1@%' AND CHA_TIPO_IE = 'E'

query.name: LS_SALVA_DPA_ELENCO_LISTE_1
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @colID@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, ID_PEOPLE_LISTE, CHA_TIPO_URP ) VALUES ( @id@ NULL, '@param2@', '@param3@', '@param1@', NULL, 'L' )

query.name: LS_SALVA_DPA_ELENCO_LISTE_2
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @colID@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, ID_PEOPLE_LISTE, CHA_TIPO_URP ) VALUES ( @id@ NULL, '@param3@', '@param4@', '@param1@', '@param2@', 'L' )

query.name: LS_SALVA_DPA_LISTE_DISTR
LS_SALVA_DPA_ELENCO_LISTE_GRUPPO_1
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @colID@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, ID_GRUPPO_LISTE, CHA_TIPO_URP ) VALUES ( @id@ NULL, '@param2@', '@param3@', '@param1@', NULL, 'L' )

query.name: LS_SALVA_DPA_ELENCO_LISTE_GRUPPO_2
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @colID@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, ID_GRUPPO_LISTE, CHA_TIPO_URP ) VALUES ( @id@ NULL, '@param3@', '@param4@', '@param1@', '@param2@', 'L' )

query.name: LS_MODIFICA_LISTA_1
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LISTE_DISTR WHERE ID_LISTA_DPA_CORR = @param1@

query.name: LS_MODIFICA_LISTA_2
LS_MODIFICA_LISTA_3
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET VAR_COD_RUBRICA = '@param1@', VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: LS_MODIFICA_LISTA_4
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET VAR_COD_RUBRICA = '@param1@', VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param2@', ID_PEOPLE_LISTE = NULL, ID_GRUPPO_LISTE = @param4@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: LS_MODIFICA_LISTA_5
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET VAR_COD_RUBRICA = '@param1@', VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param2@', ID_PEOPLE_LISTE = @param4@, ID_GRUPPO_LISTE = NULL WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: LS_GET_ID_ELENCO_LISTE_1
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param1@' AND ID_PEOPLE_LISTE IS NULL AND ID_AMM = '@param3@' AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: LS_GET_ID_ELENCO_LISTE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param1@' AND ID_PEOPLE_LISTE = '@param2@' AND ID_AMM = '@param3@' AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'L'

query.name: GET_CORRISPONDENTE_SEMPLICE
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.VAR_NOME, A.VAR_COGNOME, A.CHA_DETTAGLI, A.CHA_PA, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO, A.VAR_EMAIL, A.VAR_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_CODICE_AOO, A.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, A.ID_PARENT, A.ID_UO, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.DTA_FINE, A.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM, A.InteropUrl FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND ((A.ID_AMM IS NULL) OR (A.ID_AMM='@param2@')) AND A.CHA_TIPO_CORR='S'

query.name: S_STORICO_MITT_1
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, A.DTA_MODIFICA AS DTA_MODIFICA, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_STO A, DPA_CORR_globali B WHERE A.ID_MITT_DEST = B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DES = '@param1@' AND A.ID_PROFILE = @param2@ ORDER BY DTA_MODIFICA

query.name: GET_CORRISPONDENTE_SEMPLICE_EST
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.VAR_NOME, A.VAR_COGNOME, A.CHA_DETTAGLI, A.CHA_PA, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO, A.VAR_EMAIL, A.VAR_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_CODICE_AOO, A.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, A.ID_PARENT, A.ID_UO, A.DTA_FINE, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.CHA_TIPO_CORR, A.CHA_TIPO_IE, A.InteropUrl FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND ((A.ID_AMM IS NULL) OR (A.ID_AMM='@param2@')) AND A.CHA_TIPO_IE='E'

query.name: GET_UTENTE_INTERNO_AOO
query.value: SELECT D.ID_GRUPPO FROM PEOPLEGROUPS PG, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG LR WHERE PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND LR.ID_REGISTRO = @param2@ AND D.ID_GRUPPO = PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AND D.SYSTEM_ID = LR.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO

query.name: GET_FOLDER_ROOT
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT=@param1@ AND DESCRIPTION='@param2@'

query.name: GET_TRASMISSIONI_COMPLETE
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID, B.CHA_TIPO_DEST, B.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASM_SINGOLA FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND ((B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND C.ID_PEOPLE=@param2@) OR B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE=@param3@) AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0'))

query.name: GET_TRASM_UTENTE_BY_IDTRASM_IDPEOPLE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = @param1@ AND ID_PEOPLE = @param2@

query.name: DELETE_TRASM_UTENTE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND ID_PEOPLE = @param1@

query.name: UPDATE_TRASM_UTENTE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET ID_PEOPLE = @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: UPDATE_TRASM_SINGOLA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA SET ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: UPDATE_TRASM_SECURITY
query.value: UPDATE SECURITY SET PERSONORGROUP = @param1@ WHERE PERSONORGROUP = @param2@ AND CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'T'

query.name: GET_TRASMISSIONI_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONI WHERE ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=@param1@

query.name: GET_TRASMISSIONISINGOLE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA,DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.SYSTEM_ID=DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_RAGIONE AND ID_TRASMISSIONE=@param1@

query.name: GET_IDUTENTEUO_BY_USERID
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: GET_NOMEUTENTE_BY_USERID
query.value: SELECT FULL_NAME FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_id)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_UTENTI_CONNESSI
query.value: SELECT L.*, P.VAR_COGNOME FROM DPA_LOGIN L, PEOPLE P WHERE L.ID_AMM=@param1@ AND upper(P.USER_ID) = upper(L.USER_ID) ORDER BY P.VAR_COGNOME ASC

query.name: UNLOCK_USER_LOGIN
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@') @param2@

query.name: UNLOCK_USER_LOGIN_ON_SESSION_ID
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@') @param2@ @param3@

query.name: UNLOCK_AMM_LOGIN_ON_SESSION_ID
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE SESSION_ID='@param1@'

query.name: LOCK_USER_LOGIN
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_LOGIN (USER_ID,ID_AMM,IP_ADDRESS,DTA_CONNESSIONE, SESSION_ID,DST) VALUES (UPPER('@param1@'),@param2@,'@param3@',@param4@, '@param5@','@param6@')

query.name: CHECK_USER_LOGIN
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: CHECK_USER_LOGIN_AMM
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DTA_CONNESSIONE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH:MI:SS')) AS data_conn FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: S_IP_ADDRESS_USER_LOGIN
query.value: SELECT IP_ADDRESS FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: CHECK_USER_LOGIN_ON_SESSION_ID
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(SESSION_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') AND UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@userid@') AND ID_AMM = @idamm@

query.name: UO_HAS_REFERENCE_ROLE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND cha_riferimento = '1' AND id_uo = @param1@

query.name: CHECK_PROJECT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_RUOLO4
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_GRUPPO, B.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_PARENT, A.ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__SECURITY__TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT /*+index (B) index(A) INDEX(C)*/ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, C.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, A.ID_UO, B.PERSONORGROUP FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, SECURITY B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C WHERE B.THING=@param1@ AND A.ID_GRUPPO=B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.SYSTEM_ID=A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO ORDER BY B.ACCESSRIGHTS DESC, A.ID_UO ASC

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__DELETED_SECURITY__TIPO_RUOLO_FASC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, C.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, A.ID_UO, B.NOTE, B.PERSONORGROUP FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DELETED_SECURITY B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C WHERE B.THING=@param1@ AND A.ID_GRUPPO=B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.SYSTEM_ID=A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO ORDER BY B.ACCESSRIGHTS DESC, A.ID_UO ASC

query.name: S_DPAFormattaSegn
query.value: SELECT VAR_STRINGA,ID_PESO FROM DPA_FORMATTA_SEGN WHERE CHA_VISUALIZZA = '1' AND ID_AMM = @param1@ ORDER BY ID_PESO

query.name: S_DPAELRegistri5
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_EMAIL_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A WHERE A.VAR_CODICE = '@param1@'

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__TRASM_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, A.ID_PROFILE, A.ID_PROJECT,@param1@ AS DTA_INVIO_F, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI,B.ID_RAGIONE, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE, B.ID_TRASM_UTENTE, B.CHA_TIPO_DEST,B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE, B.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS,B.VAR_NOTE_SING, B.CHA_TIPO_TRASM,@param2@ AS DTA_SCADENZA, C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, C.ID_PEOPLE AS ID_DESTINATARIO, @param3@ AS DTA_VISTA,CHA_VISTA,@param4@ AS DTA_ACCETTATA,CHA_ACCETTATA, @param5@ AS DTA_RIFIUTATA,CHA_RIFIUTATA,C.VAR_NOTE_RIF, C.VAR_NOTE_ACC, C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, C.CHA_VALIDA, C.DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST AS DTA_RIMOSSA_TDL, A.CHA_SALVATA_CON_CESSIONE, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO AS ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, C.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO AS DELEGATO_UTENTE, C.CHA_ACCETTATA_DELEGATO AS ACCETTATA_DELEGATO, C.CHA_VISTA_DELEGATO AS VISTA_DELEGATO, C.CHA_RIFIUTATA_DELEGATO AS RIFIUTATA_DELEGATO, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'SEGNATURA_CODFASC'),vardescribe(id_project,'CODFASC')) ID_SEGN_CODFASC, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'DATADOC'),vardescribe(id_project,'DATA_CREAZ')) DATA_DOC_FASC, z.var_desc_corr, e.full_name, f.var_desc_corr AS desc_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_tipo_ragione, g.var_desc_ragione, g.cha_eredita, g.cha_tipo_diritti, h.FULL_NAME as desc_destinatario, f.var_codice as cod_ruolo_mitt, e.user_id, g.cha_risposta, g.cha_tipo_dest AS tipo_dest_rag, g.var_note, g.cha_tipo_risposta, g.var_notifica_trasm, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_doc, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_fasc, g.cha_cede_diritti, g.cha_mantieni_lett, g.CHA_PROC_RES, g.CHA_FASC_OBBLIGATORIA FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, dpa_corr_globali z, people e, dpa_corr_globali f, dpa_ragione_trasm g, people h @param7@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA @param6@ AND z.system_id = b.id_corr_globale AND e.system_id = a.id_people AND f.system_id = a.id_ruolo_in_uo AND g.system_id = b.id_ragione AND h.system_id = c.id_people ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE DESC, C.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE__TRASM_SINGOLA
query.value: SELECT B.ID_TRASMISSIONE FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B WHERE @param1@ AND A.SYSTEM_ID= @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE__TRASM_SINGOLA2
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.CHA_TIPO_DEST, A.CHA_TIPO_TRASM FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA A, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND B.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param1@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=@param2@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA and TS.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_TRASM_SINGOLA FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID =@param3@) ) ORDER BY CHA_TIPO_DEST

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASM__DPA_RAGIONE__DPA_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT F.VAR_DESC_CORR AS MITT_UT, G.VAR_DESC_CORR AS MITT_RU, E.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE AS RAGIONE, H.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DEST_RU, D.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DEST_UT,D.ID_PEOPLE AS SYSTEM_ID_DEST_UT, @param1@ AS DATA_INVIO, @param2@ AS DATA_VISTA, @param3@ AS DATA_ACCET, @param4@ AS DATA_RIFIU, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI AS NOTE_GENER, B.VAR_NOTE_SING AS NOTE_INDIVID, F.ID_PEOPLE AS SYSTEM_ID_MITT_UT FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM E, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI F, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI G, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI H WHERE @param5@ AND C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_PEOPLE = D.ID_PEOPLE AND D.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = H.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PEOPLE = F.ID_PEOPLE AND F.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = G.SYSTEM_ID AND G.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND B.ID_RAGIONE = E.SYSTEM_ID AND DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC, A.SYSTEM_ID, G.VAR_DESC_CORR, F.VAR_DESC_CORR, H.VAR_DESC_CORR, D.VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASM__DPA_RAGIONE__DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__UO_D
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(C INDX_PROFILE41) */ F.VAR_DESC_CORR AS MITT_UT, G.VAR_DESC_CORR AS MITT_RU, E.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE AS RAGIONE, D.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DEST, @param1@ AS DATA_INVIO, C.DOCNUMBER AS ID, GETCODREG(C.ID_REGISTRO) AS COD_REG, C.NUM_PROTO AS NUM_PROTO, C.NUM_ANNO_PROTO AS ANNO, C.VAR_SEGNATURA AS SEGNATURA, C.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS DESCR, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI AS NOTE_GENER, B.VAR_NOTE_SING AS NOTE_INDIVID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, PROFILE C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM E, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI F, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI G WHERE B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PROFILE = C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND D.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND A.ID_PEOPLE = F.ID_PEOPLE AND F.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = G.SYSTEM_ID AND G.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND B.ID_RAGIONE = E.SYSTEM_ID AND DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL @param2@ ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC, A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASM__DPA_RAGIONE__DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__UO_F
query.value: SELECT F.VAR_DESC_CORR AS MITT_UT, G.VAR_DESC_CORR AS MITT_RU, E.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE AS RAGIONE, D.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DEST, @param1@ AS DATA_INVIO, C.VAR_CODICE AS ID, C.DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI AS NOTE_GENER FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, PROJECT C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM E, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI F, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI G WHERE B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PROJECT = C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F' AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND D.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND A.ID_PEOPLE = F.ID_PEOPLE AND F.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = G.SYSTEM_ID AND G.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND B.ID_RAGIONE = E.SYSTEM_ID AND DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL @param2@ ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC, A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_DPAAmministra
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_AMM, A.VAR_LIBRERIA FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA A ORDER BY A.VAR_CODICE_AMM

query.name: S_DPAAmministra2
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: S_DPAAmministra3
S_DPAAmministraByUser
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_AMM, A.VAR_LIBRERIA FROM PEOPLE P LEFT JOIN DPA_AMMINISTRA A ON a.system_id = p.id_amm WHERE UPPER(user_Id) = UPPER('@param1@') @param2@ ORDER BY A.VAR_CODICE_AMM

query.name: S_DPAAmministraByUserAdministrator
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_AMM, A.VAR_LIBRERIA FROM PEOPLE P LEFT JOIN DPA_AMMINISTRA A ON a.system_id = p.id_amm WHERE UPPER(user_Id) = UPPER('@param1@') AND P.cha_amministratore in ('1','2','3') @param2@ ORDER BY A.VAR_CODICE_AMM

query.name: S_DPAAreaLavoroProfile
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_AREA_LAVORO A, PROFILE P WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CANALI_REG__CANALI__DOCUMENTTYPES
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_SERVER_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, C.CHA_TIPO_CANALE, A.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CANALI_REG B, DPA_CANALI A, DOCUMENTTYPES C WHERE B.ID_CANALE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE = C.SYSTEM_ID AND @param1@

query.name: S_IDCorrGlobaliPeople
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP NOT IN ('L') AND ID_PEOPLE = @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali_byMail_Descrizone
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.CHA_TIPO_IE, A.CHA_TIPO_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_MAIL_CORR_ESTERNI M WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = M.ID_CORR AND UPPER(@mail@) = upper(M.VAR_EMAIL) AND (UPPER(VAR_DESC_CORR_OLD) = UPPER('@descrizione@') @descrizioneRC@) AND (ID_AMM= @idamm@ OR id_amm is null) AND ( (( ( id_registro is null AND ID_AMM= @idamm@ ) or id_registro = @id_reg@) and CHA_TIPO_IE='E') OR (( (id_registro is null AND ID_AMM= @idamm@ ) or id_registro != @id_reg@) and CHA_TIPO_IE='I') ) AND DTA_FINE IS NULL AND (upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) not like 'INTEROP%')

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali_1
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali1
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE VAR_COD_RUBRICA = @param1@ AND (ID_AMM = @param2@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND DTA_FINE IS NULL @param3@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali2
query.value: SELECT B.ID_GRUPPO, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.ID_TIPO_RUOLO, B.VAR_EMAIL, B.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, B.CHA_TIPO_IE, B.VAR_CODICE, B.VAR_SMTP, B.NUM_PORTA_SMTP FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE B.ID_UO = @param1@ AND B.ID_AMM = @param2@ AND B.DTA_FINE IS NULL ORDER BY B.VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali_VALID
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DTA_FINE IS NULL AND SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobaliByIdPeople
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DTA_FINE IS NULL AND ID_PEOPLE = @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali_ProtoInt_U
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI U, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI R, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG C WHERE R.ID_UO=U.SYSTEM_ID AND R.ID_TIPO_RUOLO=B.SYSTEM_ID AND R.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND U.CHA_TIPO_URP='U' AND U.CHA_TIPO_IE='I' AND U.CHA_TIPO_CORR='S' AND R.CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND R.CHA_TIPO_IE='I' AND R.CHA_TIPO_CORR='S' @param2@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali_ProtoInt_R
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI R, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG C WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobali_ProtoInt_P
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI R, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG C, PEOPLEGROUPS PG, PEOPLE E WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_DPACorrGruppo
query.value: SELECT ID_COMP_GRUPPO FROM DPA_CORR_GRUPPO WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_UO = @param1@

query.name: S_DPALOG
query.value: SELECT USER_ID, VAR_COD_AZIONE, DTA_AZIONE, VAR_COD_OGGETTO, VAR_DESC_OGGETTO FROM DPA_LOG WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPAANAGRAFICA_LOG__DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI
query.value: SELECT AN.VAR_CODICE, AN.VAR_DESCRIZIONE, AN.VAR_OGGETTO, AT.NOTIFY FROM DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI AT, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG AN WHERE (AT.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA = AN.SYSTEM_ID) @param1@ AND (UPPER(AN.VAR_METODO) = UPPER(@param2@))

query.name: I_DPACorrGlob
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @param1@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, ID_OLD, DTA_INIZIO, DTA_FINE, ID_PARENT, NUM_LIVELLO, VAR_CODICE, ID_GRUPPO, ID_TIPO_RUOLO, CHA_DEFAULT_TRASM, ID_UO, VAR_COGNOME, VAR_NOME, ID_PEOPLE, CHA_TIPO_CORR, CHA_TIPO_IE, CHA_TIPO_URP, CHA_PA, VAR_CODICE_AOO, VAR_CODICE_AMM, VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, ID_PESO, VAR_EMAIL, CHA_DETTAGLI, NUM_FIGLI, VAR_SMTP, NUM_PORTA_SMTP, VAR_FAX_USER_LOGIN ) (SELECT DISTINCT @param2@ A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.VAR_DESC_RUOLO + @param3@, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DTA_INIZIO, A.DTA_FINE, A.ID_PARENT, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO, A.CHA_DEFAULT_TRASM, @param4@, A.VAR_COGNOME, A.VAR_NOME, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.CHA_TIPO_CORR, A.CHA_TIPO_IE, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.CHA_PA, VAR_CODICE_AOO, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, A.ID_PESO, A.VAR_EMAIL, A.CHA_DETTAGLI, A.NUM_FIGLI, A.VAR_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.VAR_FAX_USER_LOGIN FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B WHERE B.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND A.SYSTEM_ID = @param5@ )

query.name: I_DPADettGlob
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_DETT_GLOBALI ( @param1@ ID_CORR_GLOBALI, VAR_INDIRIZZO, VAR_CAP, VAR_PROVINCIA, VAR_NAZIONE, VAR_COD_FISC, VAR_TELEFONO, VAR_TELEFONO2, VAR_FAX, VAR_NOTE, VAR_CITTA ) (SELECT @param2@ @param3@, VAR_INDIRIZZO, VAR_CAP, VAR_PROVINCIA, VAR_NAZIONE, VAR_COD_FISC, VAR_TELEFONO, VAR_TELEFONO2, VAR_FAX, VAR_NOTE, VAR_CITTA FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALI = @param4@ )

query.name: I_DPALRuoloReg
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_L_RUOLO_REG ( SYSTEM_ID, ID_REGISTRO, ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, CHA_PREFERITO, CHA_RIFERIMENTO ) (SELECT 1, ID_REGISTRO, @param1@, CHA_PREFERITO, CHA_RIFERIMENTO FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param2@ )

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob5
query.value: SELECT VAR_FAX_USER_LOGIN FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob6
query.value: SELECT VAR_FAX_USER_LOGIN, VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_PEOPLE IN (SELECT PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLEGROUPS B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE A.ID_GRUPPO = B.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AND B.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND A.ID_UO = @param1@ )

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob7
query.value: SELECT VAR_FAX_USER_LOGIN FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_PEOPLE = @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob8
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_IE = 'E' AND VAR_CODICE = '@param1@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@ AND ID_REGISTRO = @param3@ AND DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob9
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param1@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@ AND CHA_TIPO_IE = 'E' AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND ID_PARENT = @param3@ AND DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob10
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_PARENT FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND NUM_LIVELLO >= @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob11
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_PEOPLE = @param1@

query.name: S_DPACorrGlob12
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND NUM_LIVELLO = @param1@ AND ID_PARENT = @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__CORR_GRUPPO__CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A,DPA_CORR_GRUPPO B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_COMP_GRUPPO AND C.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_GRUPPO AND @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE__CORR_GRUPPO
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A , DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C, PEOPLE E, DPA_CORR_GRUPPO F WHERE A.ID_PEOPLE = E.SYSTEM_ID AND A.SYSTEM_ID = F.ID_COMP_GRUPPO AND F.ID_GRUPPO = C.SYSTEM_ID AND @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__DOC_ARRIVO_PAR
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(P INDX_PROFILE41) */ @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR B, PROFILE P WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_MITT_DEST AND B.ID_PROFILE=P.SYSTEM_ID AND @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__DOC_ARRIVO_PAR__CORR_GRUPPO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_AMM, A.CHA_TIPO_IE, A.CHA_TIPO_CORR, B.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST, A.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR B, DPA_CORR_GRUPPO C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_MITT_DEST AND A.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_COMP_GRUPPO AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLEGROUPS__CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE__TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, E.VAR_NOME, E.VAR_COGNOME, E.EMAIL_ADDRESS, E.CHA_NOTIFICA, E.VAR_TELEFONO, A.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.CHA_DETTAGLI, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.VAR_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_CODICE_AOO, A.DTA_FINE, C.SYSTEM_ID AS RUOLO_SYSTEM_ID, D.VAR_DESC_RUOLO AS RUOLO_DESC, C.VAR_CODICE AS RUOLO_CODICE, C.ID_UO AS RUOLO_ID_UO, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS RUOLO_COD_RUBRICA, C.CHA_DETTAGLI AS RUOLO_DETTAGLI, E.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO, E.DISABLED, E.VAR_SEDE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, PEOPLEGROUPS B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C, PEOPLE E, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO D WHERE B.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_PEOPLE AND C.ID_GRUPPO = B.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AND D.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND E.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_PEOPLE AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLEGROUPS__TIPO_RUOLO_COD_FUNC
query.value: SELECT A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.ID_GRUPPO, C.NUM_LIVELLO, C.VAR_CODICE, C.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, B.NUM_LIVELLO, B.ID_UO, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_REGISTRO, B.ID_AMM , B.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.CHA_PREFERITO, b.CHA_RIFERIMENTO, b.CHA_RESPONSABILE, b.CHA_SEGRETARIO from peoplegroups a, dpa_corr_globali b, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO c, dpa_tipo_f_ruolo fr, dpa_tipo_funzione d, people e where a.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = b.ID_GRUPPO and B.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = C.SYSTEM_ID and b.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' and b.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' and a.people_system_id = e.system_id and b.system_id = fr.id_ruolo_in_uo and fr.ID_TIPO_FUNZ = d.system_id AND @param1@ AND @param2@ ORDER BY @param3@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLEGROUPS__TIPO_RUOLO__CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.ID_GRUPPO, C.NUM_LIVELLO, B.ID_REGISTRO, C.VAR_CODICE, C.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, D.NUM_LIVELLO AS NUM_LIVELLO_UO, B.ID_UO, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.CHA_PREFERITO, b.CHA_RIFERIMENTO, b.CHA_RESPONSABILE, b.CHA_SEGRETARIO FROM PEOPLEGROUPS A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D WHERE B.ID_GRUPPO = A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = C.SYSTEM_ID AND D.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_UO AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLEGROUPS__TIPO_RUOLO__CORR_GLOBALI_E_D
query.value: SELECT A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.ID_GRUPPO, C.NUM_LIVELLO, B.ID_REGISTRO, C.VAR_CODICE, C.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, D.NUM_LIVELLO AS NUM_LIVELLO_UO, B.ID_UO, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.CHA_PREFERITO, b.CHA_RIFERIMENTO, b.CHA_RESPONSABILE, b.CHA_SEGRETARIO FROM PEOPLEGROUPS A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D WHERE A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT id_gruppo from dpa_corr_globali where system_id=b.original_id) AND B.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = C.SYSTEM_ID AND D.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_UO AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLEGROUPS__TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.ID_GRUPPO, C.NUM_LIVELLO, C.VAR_CODICE, C.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, B.NUM_LIVELLO, B.ID_UO, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_REGISTRO, B.ID_AMM ,B.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.CHA_PREFERITO, b.CHA_RIFERIMENTO, b.CHA_RESPONSABILE, b.CHA_SEGRETARIO FROM PEOPLEGROUPS A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C WHERE B.ID_GRUPPO = A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL and B.DTA_FINE is null AND @param1@ ORDER BY @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__RUOE_UTENTE__CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COGNOME, A.VAR_NOME, A.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.CHA_DETTAGLI, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.VAR_EMAIL, A.VAR_SMTP, A.VAR_CODICE_AOO, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, C.SYSTEM_ID AS RUOLO_SYSTEM_ID, C.VAR_DESC_CORR AS RUOLO_DESC, C.VAR_CODICE AS RUOLO_CODICE, C.ID_UO AS RUOLO_ID_UO, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS RUOLO_COD_RUBRICA, C.CHA_DETTAGLI AS RUOLO_DETTAGLI FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A,DPA_RUOE_UTENTE B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE B.ID_UTENTE_EST = A.SYSTEM_ID AND C.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RUOE AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE__SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE A, SECURITY B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.ID_PEOPLE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND @param2@

query.name: S_SECURITY_PROPRIETARIO
query.value: SELECT PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, ID_GRUPPO_TRASM FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO=@param2@

query.name: S_SECURITY__DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PROPRIETARIO
query.value: SELECT S.PERSONORGROUP, S.ACCESSRIGHTS, S.ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, C.ID_GRUPPO FROM SECURITY S, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE S.THING=@param1@ AND S.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO=@param2@ AND (S.PERSONORGROUP=C.ID_PEOPLE OR S.PERSONORGROUP=C.ID_GRUPPO)

query.name: S_SECURITY__DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__CESSIONE
query.value: SELECT S.ACCESSRIGHTS, S.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM SECURITY S, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE S.THING=@param1@ AND S.PERSONORGROUP=C.ID_PEOPLE

query.name: S_DELETED_SECURITY_PROPRIETARIO
query.value: SELECT S.PERSONORGROUP, S.ACCESSRIGHTS, S.ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, S.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, C.ID_PEOPLE FROM DELETED_SECURITY S, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE S.THING=@param1@ AND S.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO='P' AND (S.PERSONORGROUP=C.ID_PEOPLE OR S.PERSONORGROUP=C.ID_GRUPPO)

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE__DELETED_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE A, DELETED_SECURITY B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.ID_PEOPLE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND @param2@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_DELETED_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELETED_SECURITY s WHERE @param1@ And Not Exists (Select 'x' From security sec Where sec.thing = s.thing And sec.accessrights > 20 And sec.personorgroup = s.personorgroup)

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT checkSecurityDocumento(@idProfile@, @idPeople@, @idGroup@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'D') FROM DUAL

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ACL
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SECURITY WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_SECURITY_2
query.value: SELECT checkSecurity(@idObj@, @idPeople@, @idGroup@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F') FROM dual

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_DPA_LOG
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_LOG WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_PERSON_DELETED_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELETED_SECURITY WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__DPA_LOG
query.value: select log.USERID_OPERATORE, corr.var_desc_corr, log.dta_azione, log.var_desc_oggetto from dpa_log log, dpa_corr_globali corr where id_oggetto = @param1@ and var_cod_azione @param2@ AND CHA_ESITO=1 and log.id_gruppo_operatore=corr.id_gruppo

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_RUOLO2
query.value: SELECT @hint@ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_GRUPPO, B.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B @param1@ AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_RUOLO3
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_GRUPPO, B.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_DESC_CORR AS VAR_DESC_RUOLO, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_PARENT, A.ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__SECURITY__TIPO_RUOLO2
query.value: SELECT /*+index (B) index(A) INDEX(C)*/ DISTINCT @param1@, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, A.ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, SECURITY B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C WHERE A.ID_GRUPPO = B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND B.THING NOT IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND NVL(P.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='1') AND @param2@ ORDER BY B.ACCESSRIGHTS DESC, A.ID_UO ASC

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__DELETED_SECURITY__TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT @param1@, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, A.ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DELETED_SECURITY B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C WHERE A.ID_GRUPPO = B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND @param2@ ORDER BY B.ACCESSRIGHTS DESC, A.ID_UO ASC

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_F_RUOLO__TIPO_FUNZIONE__TIPO_RUOLO__CORR_GLOBALI__L_RUOLO_REG
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, D.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.ID_UO, D.NUM_LIVELLO, E.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO B, DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE C, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO D, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI E, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG F WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND F.ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TIPO_FUNZ = C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.VAR_COD_TIPO = 'PRAU_RF' AND D.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND E.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_UO AND F.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: S_DPACorrSto
query.value: SELECT @param1@ AS DTA_MODIFICA FROM DPA_CORR_STO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @param2@

query.name: S_DPADettGlob
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALI = @param1@

query.name: S_DPADettGlob2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALI = @param1@

query.name: S_DPADettGlob3
query.value: SELECT VAR_FAX FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALI = @param1@

query.name: S_DPADettGlob4
query.value: SELECT VAR_FAX, VAR_INDIRIZZO, VAR_CAP, VAR_PROVINCIA, VAR_CITTA FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPADettGlob5
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPADettGlob6
query.value: SELECT VAR_INDIRIZZO, VAR_CAP, VAR_PROVINCIA, VAR_CITTA, VAR_LOCALITA, VAR_TELEFONO, VAR_TELEFONO2, var_note FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPADocArrivoPar
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPADocArrivoPar2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPA_STATO_INVIO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @param1@ AND ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param2@

query.name: S_DPA_STATO_INVIO2
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @param1@

query.name: S_DPATrasm
query.value: SELECT COUNT(system_id) FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPATrasmUtente
query.value: SELECT COUNT(system_id) FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPADocCollegamenti
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_DOC_COLLEGAMENTI WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_EL_REGISTRI__L_AOO_UO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE, A.NUM_RIF, A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO, A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_AMM @param1@ @param2@ @param3@ FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A, DPA_L_AOO_UO B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_REGISTRO AND A.CHA_RF = '0' AND B.ID_UO = @param4@ ORDER BY A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO

query.name: S_DPAElRegistri
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_DPAELRegistri1
S_DPAELRegistri2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_CODICE, VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, VAR_USER_MAIL, VAR_PWD_MAIL, VAR_SERVER_POP, NUM_PORTA_POP, CHA_STATO,CHA_POP_SSL, CHA_SMTP_SSL, CHA_SMTP_STA, CHA_IMAP_SSL, VAR_SERVER_IMAP, NUM_PORTA_IMAP, VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE, VAR_INBOX_IMAP, VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE, VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE, VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPAELRegistri3
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, CHA_STATO, @param1@ AS DTA_CLOSE, VAR_DESC_REGISTRO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@ ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_DPAELRegistri4
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_EL_REGISTRI__AMMINISTRA
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_CODICE, B.VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A, DPA_AMMINISTRA B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND B.SYSTEM_ID=A.ID_AMM

query.name: S_J_DPA_EL_REGISTRI__AMMINISTRA2
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_USER_MAIL, A.VAR_PWD_MAIL, A.VAR_SERVER_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, B.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_USER_SMTP, B.CHA_STR_SEGNATURA, A.VAR_PWD_SMTP,A.CHA_POP_SSL,A.CHA_SMTP_SSL,A.CHA_SMTP_STA, A.VAR_SERVER_IMAP, A.NUM_PORTA_IMAP, A.VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE, A.VAR_INBOX_IMAP, A.VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE, A.VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE, A.CHA_IMAP_SSL, A.VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A, DPA_AMMINISTRA B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND B.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_AMM

query.name: S_J_DPA_EL_REGISTRI__AMMINISTRA3
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_USER_MAIL, A.VAR_PWD_MAIL, A.VAR_SERVER_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, B.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_USER_SMTP, A.VAR_PWD_SMTP,A.CHA_SMTP_SSL,A.CHA_POP_SSL,A.CHA_SMTP_STA, A.VAR_SERVER_IMAP, A.NUM_PORTA_IMAP, A.VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE, A.VAR_INBOX_IMAP, A.VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE, A.VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE, A.CHA_IMAP_SSL, A.VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC, A.CHA_RICEVUTA_PEC FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A, DPA_AMMINISTRA B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND B.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_AMM

query.name: S_J_DPA_EL_REGISTRI__L_RUOLO_REG
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE, A.NUM_RIF, A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO, A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_AMM, @param1@ @param2@ @param3@ FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_REGISTRO AND B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param4@ AND A.CHA_RF = '0' ORDER BY A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO

query.name: S_DPAFirmatari
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_COD_FISCALE FROM DPA_FIRMATARI WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_FIRMATARI__FIRMA_VERS
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_FIRMATARI A, DPA_FIRMA_VERS B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_FIRMATARIO AND B.ID_VERSIONE = @param2@

query.name: S_DPAFormattaFasc
query.value: SELECT VAR_STRINGA, ID_PESO FROM DPA_FORMATTA_FASC WHERE CHA_VISUALIZZA = '1' AND ID_AMM = @param1@ ORDER BY ID_PESO

query.name: S_J_DPA_FUNZIONI__TIPO_FUNZIONE__TIPO_F_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.COD_FUNZIONE, A.VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE, A.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE, B.VAR_COD_TIPO, B.VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN FROM DPA_FUNZIONI A, DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE B, DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO C WHERE A.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TIPO_FUNZ AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_FUNZIONI__TIPO_F_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT B.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_FUNZIONI A, DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO B WHERE B.ID_TIPO_FUNZ = A.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AND A.COD_FUNZIONE = @param1@ AND B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE__TIPO_F_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_TIPO, A.VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN, A.CHA_VIS FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE A, DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TIPO_FUNZ AND B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param1@ ORDER BY A.VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_RUOLO__L_RUOLO_REG
query.value: SELECT B.*, C.NUM_LIVELLO AS liv FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO C WHERE A.ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND A.CHA_RIFERIMENTO = '1' AND B.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND C.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TIPO_RUOLO

query.name: S_J_DPA_L_RUOLO_REG__EL_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE, A.NUM_RIF, A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO, A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_AMM, @param1@, A.DIRITTO_RUOLO_AOO, A.INVIO_RICEVUTA_MANUALE, A.FLAG_WSPIA FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG B, DPA_EL_REGISTRI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_REGISTRO AND CHA_RF = '0' AND @param2@ ORDER BY @param3@

query.name: S_DPAMailElab
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, LTRIM(VAR_MESSAGE), CHA_RAGIONE_ELAB, DTA_ELAB, ID_REGISTRO FROM DPA_MAIL_ELABORATE WHERE VAR_MESSAGE = @param1@ and cha_ragione_elab = 'E' AND(ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR ID_REGISTRO = @idRegistro@)

query.name: S_DPAOggettario2
query.value: SELECT /*+INDEX (DPA_OGGETTARIO) */@param1@ FROM DPA_OGGETTARIO A, DPA_EL_REGISTRI B WHERE A.ID_REGISTRO = B.SYSTEM_ID(+) AND @param2@

query.name: S_DPAOggSto
query.value: SELECT @param1@ AS DTA_MODIFICA FROM DPA_OGGETTI_STO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_OGGETTI_STO__OGGETTARIO
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_OGGETTI_STO A, DPA_OGGETTARIO B WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = B.SYSTEM_ID AND @param2@

query.name: S_DPAParole
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_PAROLE WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPAParole2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_PAROLA FROM DPA_PAROLE WHERE @param1@ ORDER BY VAR_DESC_PAROLA

query.name: S_J_DPA_PROF_PAROLE__PAROLE
query.value: SELECT DPA_PROF_PAROLE.ID_PAROLA, DPA_PAROLE.VAR_DESC_PAROLA, DPA_PAROLE.ID_AMM, DPA_PROF_PAROLE.ID_PROFILE FROM DPA_PROF_PAROLE, DPA_PAROLE WHERE DPA_PROF_PAROLE.ID_PAROLA = DPA_PAROLE.SYSTEM_ID AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.USER_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.CHA_TIPO_IE, B.VAR_NOME, B.VAR_COGNOME, A.CHA_NOTIFICA FROM PEOPLE A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_PEOPLE AND B.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'P' AND B.DTA_FINE IS NULL @param1@ ORDER BY B.VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE2
query.value: SELECT A.USER_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.CHA_TIPO_IE, B.VAR_NOME, B.VAR_COGNOME, A.CHA_NOTIFICA, B.VAR_SMTP, B.NUM_PORTA_SMTP FROM PEOPLE A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_PEOPLE AND B.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'P' @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLEGROUPS__CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.ID_UO, C.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM PEOPLEGROUPS A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_GRUPPO AND B.ID_UO = C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL ORDER BY B.VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: S_J_RUOLO_PREFERITO_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID, B.SYSTEM_ID, B.VAR_DESC_CORR, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.ID_UO, C.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM PEOPLEGROUPS A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_GRUPPO AND B.ID_UO = C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL ORDER BY A.CHA_PREFERITO DESC

query.name: S_J_PEOPLE__PEOPLEGROUPS
query.value: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_PASSWORD FROM PEOPLE A, PEOPLEGROUPS B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND B.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND B.CHA_UTENTE_RIF = '1' AND B.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PROFILE__DOC_ARRIVO_PAR
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ A.VAR_PROTO_IN, A.DTA_PROTO_IN, B.VAR_CODICE_AMM, B.CHA_TIPO_IE, B.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.ID_AMM, B.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_MITT_DEST AND C.ID_PROFILE = A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__UFFICIO_REFERENTE
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(P INDX_PROFILE41) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.ID_AMM, A.CHA_TIPO_CORR, A.VAR_DESC_CORR, P.CHA_TIPO_PROTO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A , PROFILE P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND P.ID_UO_REF = A.SYSTEM_ID AND A.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I'

query.name: S_PROFILE_ID_UO_REF
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ ID_UO_REF FROM PROFILE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: U_PROFILE_ID_UO_REF
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET ID_UO_REF = @param1@, LAST_EDIT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__DPA_EL_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ A.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE A, DPA_EL_REGISTRI B WHERE A.ID_REGISTRO = B.SYSTEM_ID AND upper(B.VAR_CODICE) = upper('@param1@') AND A.NUM_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param3@

query.name: S_Profile
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ DTA_PROTO, NUM_PROTO, DTA_ANNULLA, VAR_AUT_ANNULLA FROM PROFILE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE='N' AND CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI='W'

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm2
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = '@param2@' AND CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI = 'W' AND ID_AMM=@param1@

query.name: S_DPARagNotifica
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_RISPOSTA, CHA_TIPO_DEST, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI = 'N' AND VAR_DESC_RAGIONE = 'NOTIFICA' AND (ID_AMM=@idAmm@ OR ID_AMM is null)

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm3
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_RISPOSTA, CHA_TIPO_DEST, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_DOC, VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_FASC, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, CHA_MANTIENI_LETT, CHA_MANTIENI_SCRITT FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm_ALL
S_All_DPARagTrasm
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_RISPOSTA, CHA_TIPO_DEST, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_DOC, VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_FASC, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, CHA_MANTIENI_LETT FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm4
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA a, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM b WHERE a.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.ID_AMM AND ( (UPPER(a.VAR_RAGIONE_TO) = UPPER(b.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE)) OR (UPPER(a.VAR_RAGIONE_CC) = UPPER(b.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE))

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm4Bis
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT ID_RAGIONE_TO, ID_RAGIONE_CC @param2@ FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA a, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM b WHERE a.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.ID_AMM AND ((a.ID_RAGIONE_TO = b.SYSTEM_ID) OR (a.ID_RAGIONE_CC = b.SYSTEM_ID) @param3@

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm5
query.value: SELECT a.SYSTEM_ID, a.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, a.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, a.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, a.CHA_RISPOSTA, a.CHA_TIPO_DEST, a.VAR_NOTE, a.CHA_EREDITA, a.CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, a.VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, a.VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_DOC, a.VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_FASC, a.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, a.CHA_MANTIENI_LETT FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM a, DPA_AMMINISTRA b WHERE a.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND a.ID_AMM = b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.ID_RAGIONE_@param2@

query.name: S_DPARagTrasm6
query.value: SELECT ID_RAGIONE_REFERENTE FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA A, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_AMM AND (A.ID_RAGIONE_REFERENTE = B.SYSTEM_ID)

query.name: S_DPARegProto
query.value: SELECT NUM_RIF FROM DPA_REG_PROTO WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DescRegistroBySystemId
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPAServerPosta
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_SERVER_POP, A.NUM_PORTA_POP, A.VAR_SERVER_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.VAR_DESCRIZIONE, A.VAR_DOMINIO FROM DPA_SERVER_POSTA A ORDER BY A.VAR_DESCRIZIONE

query.name: S_DPAStampaReg
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_REGISTRO, NUM_PROTO_START, NUM_PROTO_END, NUM_ANNO, NUM_ORD_FILE, NUM_PAGINA_END, DOCNUMBER, @param1@ AS DTA_STAMPA FROM DPA_STAMPAREGISTRI WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param2@ ORDER BY NUM_ANNO DESC, NUM_PROTO_END DESC, DTA_STAMPA DESC

query.name: S_DPAStatoinvio
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_DPATCanaleCorr
query.value: SELECT ID_DOCUMENTTYPE FROM DPA_T_CANALE_CORR WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPATCanaleAllCorrDoc
query.value: SELECT d.id_mitt_dest, a.system_id, a.description, a.type_id FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR d, DPA_T_CANALE_CORR b, DOCUMENTTYPES a where d.id_profile = @idProfile@ and (d.cha_tipo_mitt_dest = '@typeDest@' or d.cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'F') and d.id_mitt_dest = b.id_corr_globale and b.id_documenttype = a.system_id and b.cha_preferito = '1'

query.name: S_DPATCanaleCorr1
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.TYPE_ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPES A, DPA_T_CANALE_CORR B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND B.CHA_PREFERITO = '1'

query.name: S_DPATCanaleCorr2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_T_CANALE_CORR WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ @param2@

query.name: S_J_DPA_T_CANALE_CORR__DOCUMENTTYPES
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_T_CANALE_CORR A, DOCUMENTTYPES B WHERE A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.CHA_TIPO_CANALE='F' AND A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND A.CHA_PREFERITO = '1'

query.name: S_J_DPA_T_CANALE_CORR__DOCUMENTTYPES2
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_T_CANALE_CORR A, DOCUMENTTYPES B WHERE A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.CHA_TIPO_CANALE in ( 'M','I') AND A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND A.CHA_PREFERITO = '1'

query.name: S_DPATipoAtto
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPATipoAtto2
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID), VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID not in(select ID_TEMPLATE FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES) AND (DPA_TIPO_ATTO.Abilitato_SI_NO = 1 AND DPA_TIPO_ATTO.In_Esercizio = 'SI') OR DPA_TIPO_ATTO.ID_AMM is null ORDER BY @param1@

query.name: S_DPATipoAtto3
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE upper(VAR_DESC_ATTO) = @param1@

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC WHERE (ID_AMM = @idAmm@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND (In_Esercizio <> 'NO' OR In_Esercizio IS NULL) AND (Abilitato_SI_NO <> 0 OR Abilitato_SI_NO IS NULL)

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_FASC_FROM_RUOLO
query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID, DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC, DPA_TIPO_FASC.Abilitato_SI_NO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.In_Esercizio, DPA_TIPO_FASC.Path_Mod_1, DPA_TIPO_FASC.Path_Mod_2, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IPERFASCICOLO FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC WHERE ( (ID_AMM = @idAmm@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND @paramInEsercizio@
DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC.ID_TIPO_FASC AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC.DIRITTI @diritti@ ) OR ( IPERFASCICOLO = 1 AND (ID_AMM = @idAmm@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL)) ORDER BY DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC

query.name: PD_GET_TIPOATTO_INS_RIC
query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_ATTO,PESO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO, DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC WHERE (ID_AMM = @param2@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND @paramInEsercizio@
DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.ID_TIPO_DOC AND ( DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.ID_RUOLO = 0 OR (DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.ID_RUOLO = @param3@ AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.DIRITTI @param4@) ) @iperdocumento@ ORDER BY peso desc, var_Desc_atto asc

query.name: S_DPATipoAtto4
query.value: SELECT DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE (ID_AMM = @param2@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND (In_Esercizio <> 'NO' OR In_Esercizio IS NULL) AND (Abilitato_SI_NO <> 0 OR Abilitato_SI_NO IS NULL) ORDER BY @param1@

query.name: S_DPATipoFunzione
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_TIPO, A.VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN, A.CHA_VIS FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE A @param1@

query.name: S_DPATipoRuolo
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_AMM, A.ID_PARENT, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_DESC_RUOLO FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO A @param1@

query.name: S_DPATrasmissione
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__TRASM_UTENTE2
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ @param1@, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'SEGNATURA_CODFASC'),vardescribe(id_project,'CODFASC')) ID_SEGN_CODFASC, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'DATADOC'),vardescribe(id_project,'DATA_CREAZ')) DATA_DOC_FASC, z.var_desc_corr, e.full_name, f.var_desc_corr AS desc_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_tipo_ragione, g.var_desc_ragione, g.cha_eredita, g.cha_tipo_diritti, h.FULL_NAME as desc_destinatario, f.var_codice as cod_ruolo_mitt, e.user_id, g.cha_risposta, g.cha_tipo_dest AS tipo_dest_rag, g.var_note, g.cha_tipo_risposta, g.var_notifica_trasm, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_doc, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_fasc, g.cha_cede_diritti, g.cha_mantieni_lett FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B,DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, dpa_corr_globali z, people e, dpa_corr_globali f, dpa_ragione_trasm g, people h @param2@ WHERE @param3@ AND z.system_id = b.id_corr_globale AND e.system_id = a.id_people AND f.system_id = a.id_ruolo_in_uo AND g.system_id = b.id_ragione AND h.system_id = c.id_people ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE DESC, C.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND D.CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA = 'C'

query.name: S_DPATemplTrasm
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_TEMPL_TRASM WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TEMPL_TRASM
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_TRASMISSIONE, A.VAR_TEMPLATE FROM DPA_TEMPL_TRASM A, DPA_TRASMISSIONE B WHERE A.ID_TRASMISSIONE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND @param1@ ORDER BY @param2@

query.name: S_Apps
S_Apps2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, DEFAULT_EXTENSION FROM APPS ORDER BY @param1@

query.name: S_Apps2_new
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, DEFAULT_EXTENSION FROM APPS where DEFAULT_EXTENSION = '@defaul_extension@' ORDER BY @system_id@

query.name: S_Components
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM COMPONENTS WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_J_COMPONENTS__VERSIONS
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_IMPRONTA, B.VERSION FROM COMPONENTS A, VERSIONS B WHERE A.VERSION_ID = B.VERSION_ID AND A.DOCNUMBER = @param1@ ORDER BY B.VERSION DESC

query.name: S_J_GETIMPRONTA_W_ALL
query.value: SELECT getimprontawithallegati(P.DOCNUMBER) AS VAR_IMPRONTA FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: S_J_COMPONENTS__VERSIONS2
S_J_COMPONENTS__VERSIONS3
S_DocumentTypes
query.value: SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DocumentTypes1
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.TYPE_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_CANALE FROM DOCUMENTTYPES A ORDER BY A.DESCRIPTION

query.name: S_DocumentTypes2
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE CHA_TIPO_CANALE IN ('M', 'I')

query.name: S_DocumentTypes3
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, TYPE_ID, DESCRIPTION FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE DISABLED IS NULL

query.name: S_DocumentTypes4
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE TYPE_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DocumentTypes5
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_CANALE FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DocumentTypes6
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE CHA_TIPO_CANALE IN ('I')

query.name: S_NetworkAliases
query.value: SELECT NETWORK_ID FROM NETWORK_ALIASES WHERE PERSONORGROUP = @param1@

query.name: S_Components1
query.value: SELECT PATH FROM COMPONENTS WHERE VERSION_ID = @param1@ AND DOCNUMBER=@param2@

query.name: S_People
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE WHERE @param2@ AND NOT(DISABLED='Y')

query.name: S_People1
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE USER_PASSWORD = @param1@ AND SYSTEM_ID = @param2@ AND NOT(DISABLED='Y')

query.name: S_People_Disabled
query.value: SELECT DISABLED FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_Id) = UPPER('@param1@') @param2@

query.name: S_People_all
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_ID_LOG
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE) = UPPER('@param1@') AND (ID_AMM = @param2@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL)

query.name: S_LOGS
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM @param3@ WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_LOG_ATTIVI
query.value: SELECT a.VAR_CODICE as CODICE, a.VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, a.VAR_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, VAR_METODO as METODO, 1 as ATTIVO, b.NOTIFY AS NOTIFY, case when a.NOTIFICATION is null then '0' else a.NOTIFICATION end as NOTIFICATION, case when a.CONFIGURABLE is null then '0' else a.CONFIGURABLE end as CONFIGURABLE FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG a , DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI b WHERE a.system_id = b.system_id_anagrafica AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND (a.id_amm = @param1@ OR a.id_amm is null) AND a.VAR_CODICE not like 'AMM_%' ORDER BY a.VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: S_LOG_ATTIVI_BY_OGGETTO
query.value: SELECT a.VAR_CODICE as CODICE, a.VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, a.VAR_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, VAR_METODO as METODO, 1 as ATTIVO, b.NOTIFY AS NOTIFY, case when a.NOTIFICATION is null then '0' else a.NOTIFICATION end as NOTIFICATION, case when a.CONFIGURABLE is null then '0' else a.CONFIGURABLE end as CONFIGURABLE FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG a , DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI b WHERE a.system_id = b.system_id_anagrafica AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND (a.id_amm = @param1@ OR a.id_amm is null) AND a.VAR_CODICE not like 'AMM_%' AND VAR_OGGETTO = '@oggetto@' order by a.var_descrizione

query.name: S_LOG_DISATTIVI
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE as CODICE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, VAR_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, VAR_METODO as METODO, 0 as ATTIVO FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG WHERE VAR_CODICE not like 'AMM_%' ORDER BY VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: J_LOG_ATTIVI_DISATTIVI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, a.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, a.VAR_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, VAR_METODO AS METODO, 0 AS ATTIVO, case when a.NOTIFICATION is null then '0' else a.NOTIFICATION end as notification, case when a.CONFIGURABLE is null then '0' else a.CONFIGURABLE end as configurable FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG a , DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI b WHERE a.system_id NOT IN (SELECT system_id_anagrafica FROM DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI WHERE id_amm = @param1@) AND b.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND (a.id_amm = @param1@ OR a.id_amm is null) AND a.VAR_CODICE not like 'AMM_%' ORDER BY a.VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: S_Login
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_Id) = UPPER('@param1@') AND user_password = '@param2@' AND DISABLED = 'N' AND (ID_AMM=@param3@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL)

query.name: S_Login_verificaUser
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_Id) = UPPER('@param1@') AND DISABLED = 'N' AND (ID_AMM=@param2@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL)

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE__SECURITY2
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, C.ID_REGISTRO, C.ID_AMM, A.VAR_NOME, A.VAR_COGNOME, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, B.PERSONORGROUP, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, A.DISABLED FROM PEOPLE A, SECURITY B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE B.THING= @param1@ AND A.SYSTEM_ID=B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.ID_PEOPLE=A.SYSTEM_ID AND C.CHA_TIPO_URP <> 'L'

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__PEOPLE__DELETED_SECURITY_UTENTI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, C.ID_REGISTRO, C.ID_AMM, A.VAR_NOME, A.VAR_COGNOME, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, B.NOTE, B.PERSONORGROUP FROM PEOPLE A, DELETED_SECURITY B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE B.THING= @param1@ AND A.SYSTEM_ID=B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.ID_PEOPLE=A.SYSTEM_ID AND C.CHA_TIPO_URP <> 'L'

query.name: S_J_PEOPLE__PEOPLEGROUPS2
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.USER_ID @param1@ AND A.ID_AMM = @param2@ ORDER BY A.USER_ID

query.name: S_Profile0
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ @param1@ FROM PROFILE WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_Profile1
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT NUM_ANNO_PROTO FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND (CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'P' OR CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'I' OR CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'A') AND NUM_ANNO_PROTO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NUM_ANNO_PROTO

query.name: S_Profile2
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A','P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param1@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_Profile3
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ MAX(NUM_PROTO) AS NUMMAX FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND (CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'P' OR CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'I' OR CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'A')

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__COMPONENTS__VERSIONS
query.value: select * from ( SELECT A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.PATH, B.CHA_FIRMATO AS FIRMATO, B.PATH AS FILENAME, B.FILE_SIZE, B.ID_PEOPLE_PUTFILE, B.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO_PUTFILE, B.DTA_FILE_ACQUIRED, B.CHA_TIPO_FIRMA AS TIPO_FIRMA, C.NUM_PAG_ALLEGATI, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(C.VERSION_LABEL,2,LENGTH(C.VERSION_LABEL))) AS VERSION_INDEX, C.VERSION, C.VERSION_ID, C.SUBVERSION, C.VERSION_LABEL, C.COMMENTS, C.AUTHOR, C.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, A.CREATION_DATE AS DTA_CREAZIONE, C.V_NAME_FN, C.CARTACEO, A.FORWARDING_SOURCE, A.in_librofirma, A.cha_task_status FROM PROFILE A, COMPONENTS B, VERSIONS C WHERE A.DOCNUMBER = B.DOCNUMBER and NVL(a.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0') != '1' AND B.VERSION_ID = C.VERSION_ID AND ( (A.DOCNUMBER = @param1@ AND C.VERSION = 0) ) union SELECT A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.PATH, B.CHA_FIRMATO AS FIRMATO, B.PATH AS FILENAME, B.FILE_SIZE, B.ID_PEOPLE_PUTFILE, B.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO_PUTFILE, B.DTA_FILE_ACQUIRED, B.CHA_TIPO_FIRMA AS TIPO_FIRMA, C.NUM_PAG_ALLEGATI, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(C.VERSION_LABEL,2,LENGTH(C.VERSION_LABEL))) AS VERSION_INDEX, C.VERSION, C.VERSION_ID, C.SUBVERSION, C.VERSION_LABEL, C.COMMENTS, C.AUTHOR, C.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, C.DTA_CREAZIONE, C.V_NAME_FN, C.CARTACEO, A.FORWARDING_SOURCE, A.IN_LIBROFIRMA, A.CHA_TASK_STATUS FROM PROFILE A, COMPONENTS B, VERSIONS C WHERE A.DOCNUMBER = B.DOCNUMBER and NVL(a.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0') != '1' AND B.VERSION_ID = C.VERSION_ID AND ( A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @param1@) AND C.VERSION IN ( SELECT MAX(VERSION) FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER = A.DOCNUMBER )) ) C @filterAllegatiPec@ ORDER BY C.DOCNUMBER ASC, C.VERSION_ID ASC

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__DOCUMENTTYPES
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.PATH, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as CREATION_TIME, B.TYPE_ID, B.DESCRIPTION, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, A.IN_LIBROFIRMA, A.CHA_TASK_STATUS FROM PROFILE A, DOCUMENTTYPES B WHERE A.DOCUMENTTYPE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND @param1@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__DPA_OGGETTARIO
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, @param1@ AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A','P','I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param4@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param5@ ORDER BY A.NUM_PROTO

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__DPA_OGGETTARIO_WITH_FILTERS
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, @param1@ AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, @param4@ AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A','P','I') AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param2@ @param3@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__DPA_OGGETTARIO2
query.value:
select * from ( SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI--, -- TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND A.DTA_ANNULLA @param5@ union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' and ( A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO = '1' AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_PROFILE FROM DPA_OGGETTI_STO WHERE DTA_MODIFICA @param5@))
union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND ( (A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST = '1' OR A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT = '1') AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_PROFILE FROM DPA_CORR_STO WHERE DTA_MODIFICA @param5@)) union
SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM versions v WHERE V.DOCNUMBER = a.DOCNUMBER AND v.DTA_CREAZIONE @param5@) union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM components C WHERE c.DOCNUMBER = a.DOCNUMBER AND c.dta_file_acquired @param5@) union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @param2@ AND A.NUM_PROTO @param3@ AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM versions v, profile p WHERE V.DOCNUMBER = p.DOCNUMBER AND p.id_documento_principale = a.DOCNUMBER AND v.DTA_CREAZIONE @param5@) union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO <=@param2@-1 AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND A.DTA_ANNULLA @param5@
union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO <=@param2@-1 AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ and -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' ( A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO = '1' AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_PROFILE FROM DPA_OGGETTI_STO WHERE DTA_MODIFICA @param5@))
union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO <=@param2@-1 AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND ( (A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST = '1' OR A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT = '1') AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_PROFILE FROM DPA_CORR_STO WHERE DTA_MODIFICA @param5@)) union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO <=@param2@-1 AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM versions v WHERE V.DOCNUMBER = a.DOCNUMBER AND v.DTA_CREAZIONE @param5@) union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO <=@param2@-1 AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM components C WHERE c.DOCNUMBER = a.DOCNUMBER AND c.dta_file_acquired @param5@ ) union SELECT distinct A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_PROTO, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, --CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI CountAllegati_StampaReg (A.DOCNUMBER) AS N_ALLEGATI, TO_CHAR (A.DTA_ANNULLA, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO <=@param2@-1 AND A.ID_REGISTRO = @param4@ -- AND A.CHA_CONGELATO = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM versions v, profile p WHERE V.DOCNUMBER = p.DOCNUMBER AND p.id_documento_principale = a.DOCNUMBER AND v.DTA_CREAZIONE @param5@)
) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_Profile4
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ ID_REGISTRO FROM PROFILE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

listeQuery.query: S_PROJECT_ID_FASCICOLO SELECT ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE_SECURITY_PROJECT_COMPONENTS_DOCUMENTTYPES_NEW
query.value: SELECT a.*, getchafirmato(A.docnumber) as CHA_FIRMATO, getchatipofirma(A.docnumber) as CHA_TIPO_FIRMA, getchaimg(A.docnumber) as CHA_IMG, getinadl (a.system_id, 'D',@param4@,@param3@) AS in_adl @tipo_doc_cond@ ,(SELECT MAX (fc.data_archiviazione) FROM dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc WHERE fc.id_document = a.system_id) AS data_archiviazione, (CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN creation_date ELSE dta_proto --dtaproto END ) AS dta_protocollo_new FROM ( SELECT /*+index(b) use_nl(b,a)*/ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO DESC, A.NUM_PROTO DESC, A.SYSTEM_ID DESC) AS RN, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCNAME, A.STATUS, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.PATH, @param1@ AS CREATION_DATE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.ID_OGGETTO, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.VAR_PROTO_EME, A.DTA_PROTO_EME, A.VAR_COGNOME_EME, A.VAR_NOME_EME, A.ID_PARENT, --A.DTA_PROTO, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS dta_proto, --AS dtaproto, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.CHA_MOD_DEST_OCC, A.DTA_PROTO_IN, A.VAR_PROTO_IN, A.ID_ANNULLATORE, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_AUT_ANNULLA, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.CHA_INVIO_CONFERMA, A.PROT_TIT, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, B.PROJECT_ID, B.LINK, B.TYPE, D.TYPE_ID, D.DESCRIPTION, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, ti.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS desc_tipo_atto FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS B,PROFILE A, DOCUMENTTYPES D, dpa_tipo_atto ti @param6@ WHERE B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ AND B.LINK=A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND (a.id_tipo_atto = ti.system_id(+)) AND @security@ AND NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' @param5@ ) a WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_IN_FASCICOLO
query.value: SELECT /*+ use_nl(b,a)*/ COUNT(B.LINK) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS B, PROFILE A @param6@ WHERE B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ AND @security@ AND B.LINK=A.SYSTEM_ID AND NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' @param5@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__PROJECT_COMPONENTS__OGGETTARIO__DOCUMENTTYPES
