query.value: SELECT /*+ index (d) index (b) index (a) NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) index (e) */ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCNAME, A.STATUS, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.PATH, @param1@ AS CREATION_DATE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.ID_OGGETTO, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.VAR_PROTO_EME, A.DTA_PROTO_EME, A.VAR_COGNOME_EME, A.VAR_NOME_EME, A.ID_PARENT, A.DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.CHA_MOD_DEST_OCC, A.DTA_PROTO_IN, A.VAR_PROTO_IN, A.ID_ANNULLATORE, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_AUT_ANNULLA, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.CHA_INVIO_CONFERMA, A.PROT_TIT, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, B.PROJECT_ID, B.LINK, B.TYPE, A.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO, D.TYPE_ID, D.DESCRIPTION, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@param3@,@param4@) AS IN_ADL, getInConservazione(A.SYSTEM_ID, @param7@,'D', @param4@, @param3@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE, getchafirmato(A.DOCNUMBER) as CHA_FIRMATO, @param8@ (CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN creation_date ELSE dta_proto END ) AS dta_protocollo_new, (select MAX(FC.DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE) from DPA_FASCICOLAZIONE_CARTACEA FC where FC.ID_DOCUMENT = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE A, SECURITY E, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B, DOCUMENTTYPES D @param6@ WHERE B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND A.SYSTEM_ID=E.THING AND A.SYSTEM_ID=B.LINK AND B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ AND (E.PERSONORGROUP= @param3@ OR E.PERSONORGROUP= @param4@ ) AND E.ACCESSRIGHTS >= 0 AND NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and (checkVisibilitaArchivio('D', A.SYSTEM_ID, @param3@) > 0) @param5@ @param9@ ORDER BY A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO DESC, A.NUM_PROTO DESC, A.DOCNUMBER DESC

query.name: S_CHA_TIPO_PROTO
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ CHA_TIPO_PROTO FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__OGGETTARIO
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM SECURITY C, PROFILE A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @idProfile@ AND (checkSecurityDocumento(A.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGroup@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'D') > 0)

query.name: S_SECURITY_VISIBILITA_RUOLI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT PERSONORGROUP,ACCESSRIGHTS FROM SECURITY WHERE (ACCESSRIGHTS >= 0) AND (PERSONORGROUP IN @param1@) AND THING = (SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param2@) ORDER BY ACCESSRIGHTS DESC

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__OGGETTARIO2
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM PROFILE A @param2@ WHERE (checkSecurityDocumento(A.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGruppo@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'D') > 0) @param3@ ORDER BY @param4@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__MFASC
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A indx_profile13) index (C indx_sec5) NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM SECURITY C, PROFILE A @param2@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = C.THING AND @param3@ ORDER BY @param4@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__DAPROT
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (A INDX_PROFILE11) INDEX (C indx_sec5) NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM SECURITY C, PROFILE A @param2@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = C.THING AND @param3@ ORDER BY @param4@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__MIMG
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (a INDX_PROFILE18) INDEX (c indx_sec5) NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM SECURITY C, PROFILE A @param2@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = C.THING AND @param3@ ORDER BY @param4@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__MASS
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (A INDX_PROFILE12) INDEX (C indx_sec5) NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM SECURITY C, PROFILE A @param2@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = C.THING AND @param3@ ORDER BY @param4@

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__DPA_OGGETTARIO3
S_J_PROFILE__DPA_OGGETTARIO4
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM PROFILE A @param2@ WHERE @param3@ ORDER BY @param4@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_LIV1, A.DESCRIPTION, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE FROM PROJECT A WHERE checksecurity(A.SYSTEM_ID,@param2@,@param1@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F')>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T' AND (A.ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR A.ID_REGISTRO=@param3@) @param4@ ORDER BY A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_COD_LIV1

query.name: S_Project0
S_Project1
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (A) */ A.DESCRIPTION, A.ID_PARENT, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE,A.SYSTEM_ID,A.CHA_RW,A.ID_TITOLARIO, A.CHA_BLOCCA_FIGLI, A.CHA_CONTA_PROT_TIT, A.NUM_PROT_TIT FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T' AND @param1@ @param2@

query.name: S_Project2
query.value: SELECT DESCRIPTION, ID_PARENT, NUM_LIVELLO, VAR_CODICE, ID_TITOLARIO, CHA_BLOCCA_FIGLI, CHA_CONTA_PROT_TIT, NUM_PROT_TIT FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID= @param1@

query.name: S_Project3
S_Project4
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE, NUM_LIVELLO FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_Project5
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND VAR_CODICE = '@param1@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@ AND (ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR ID_REGISTRO= @param3@)

query.name: S_Project6
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND ID_PARENT IN ( @param1@)

query.name: SELECT_PROJECT_ID
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ='@param1@' AND UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param2@') AND ID_AMM=@param3@

query.name: S_Project7
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C' AND ID_FASCICOLO IN ( @param1@)

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY2
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A)*/ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO,getcodreg(A.ID_REGISTRO) as CODREG, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, A.DTA_CREAZIONE @param7@, getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PUBBLICO, A.ID_TITOLARIO, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, A.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, getChaConsentiClass(a.id_parent, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.id_fascicolo) as CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS, getChaConsentiFasc(a.id_parent, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.id_fascicolo) as CHA_CONSENTI_FASC, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @param4@, @param5@) AS in_adl FROM PROJECT A @profilazione@ WHERE (A.ID_AMM IS NULL OR A.ID_AMM = @param3@ ) AND @security@ @condFasc@ @param6@ @param8@

query.name: S_GET_INFO_AMMINISTRAZIONE_BY_ID
query.value: select var_codice_amm, var_desc_amm, var_email_res_ipa from dpa_amministra where system_id= @param1@

query.name: GET_STO_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR (a.dta_modifica, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI') AS dta_modifica, a.id_ogg_custom, a.id_people, a.id_ruolo_in_uo, a.var_desc_modifica FROM dpa_profil_sto a, dpa_a_r_ogg_custom_doc g WHERE a.id_template = @id_template@ AND a.id_profile = @id_profile@ AND g.id_oggetto_custom = a.id_ogg_custom AND g.id_template = a.id_template AND g.id_ruolo = @id_ruolo@ ORDER BY dta_modifica DESC, id_ogg_custom ASC

query.name: I_DPA_PROFIL_STO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_PROFIL_STO (SYSTEMID,id_template,dta_modifica,id_profile,id_ogg_custom,id_people,id_ruolo_in_uo, var_desc_modifica) VALUES (@param0@ @param1@, @param2@, @param3@, @param4@, @param5@, @param6@, '@param7@')

query.name: GET_STO_FASCICOLO
query.value: SELECT to_char(dta_modifica,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI') as dta_modifica,id_ogg_custom,id_people,id_ruolo_in_uo,var_desc_modifica FROM DPA_PROFIL_FASC_STO WHERE id_template=@id_template@ AND id_project=@id_project@ ORDER BY dta_modifica desc, id_ogg_custom asc

query.name: I_DPA_PROFIL_FASC_STO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_PROFIL_FASC_STO (SYSTEMID,id_template,dta_modifica,id_project,id_ogg_custom,id_people,id_ruolo_in_uo, var_desc_modifica) VALUES (@param0@ @param1@, @param2@, @param3@, @param4@, @param5@, @param6@, '@param7@')

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY2_BIS
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO,getcodreg(A.ID_REGISTRO) as CODREG, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, A.DTA_CREAZIONE @param7@, getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@,@idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PUBBLICO, A.ID_TITOLARIO, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, A.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, getChaConsentiClass(a.id_parent, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.id_fascicolo) as CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS, getChaConsentiFasc(a.id_parent, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.id_fascicolo) as CHA_CONSENTI_FASC, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl FROM PROJECT A @profilazione@ WHERE (A.ID_AMM IS NULL OR A.ID_AMM = @param3@ ) AND id_titolario in (select system_id from project where id_titolario=0 and cha_stato!='D') AND @security@ @condFasc@ @param6@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY_CLASSIFICHE_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, A.DTA_CREAZIONE @param7@, getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@,@idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, ID_TITOLARIO,A.DTA_SCADENZA, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.CHA_CONTROLLATO FROM PROJECT A WHERE (A.ID_AMM IS NULL OR A.ID_AMM = @param3@ ) AND @security@ AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND (A.ID_REGISTRO @param6@ ) AND UPPER(A.VAR_CODICE)='@param8@' AND A.ID_TITOLARIO = @param9@ and a.system_id=@param10@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY3
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO,A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA, A.CHA_STATO, ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_UO_LF, @param7@ AS DTA_UO_LF, A.ID_REGISTRO @param6@, getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS , A.CARTACEO,A.CHA_PRIVATO,A.ID_TITOLARIO, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.CHA_CONTROLLATO, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param3@ AND checksecurity(A.system_id,@param5@,@param4@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F' )>0

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY4
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA,@param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.VAR_NOTE, A.ID_REGISTRO,getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, ID_TITOLARIO, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, getFascPrimaria(@param3@, A.SYSTEM_ID) as CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT A.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT A, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.PROJECT_ID AND B.LINK=@param3@) AND checksecurity(A.system_id,@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F' )>0 ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY6
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A)*/ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, @param9@ AS DTA_UO_LF, A.DTA_CREAZIONE @param8@, getaccessrights(@param5@,@param4@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @param4@, @param5@) AS in_adl FROM PROJECT A, (SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_AMM = @param3@ AND checksecurity(A.system_id,@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F' )>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND ((A.ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR A.ID_REGISTRO @param6@ ) @param7@) C WHERE (A.ID_AMM IS NULL OR A.ID_AMM = @param3@ ) AND checksecurity(A.system_id,@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F' )>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND ((A.ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR A.ID_REGISTRO @param6@ ) AND (A.ID_PARENT = C.SYSTEM_ID)

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_COMPONENTS__SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.LINK FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS A, SECURITY B WHERE A.PROJECT_ID IN ( @param1@ ) AND B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO='@param2@' AND B.THING=A.LINK

query.name: S_ProjectComponents
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE PROJECT_ID= @param1@ AND LINK= @param2@

query.name: S_ProjectComponents2
query.value: SELECT PROJECT_ID FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE LINK = @param1@

query.name: S_Project8
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT= @param1@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY5
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.*, getAccessRights(@param3@,@param2@, @idRuoloPubblico@,a.system_id) as accessrights FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ and (checkSecurity(A.SYSTEM_ID, @param2@, @param3@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'F') > 0) ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__FOLDERB_AND_CHILD
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A, SECURITY B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND (A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ OR A.SYSTEM_ID=@param2@) AND (checkSecurity(A.SYSTEM_ID, @param3@, @param4@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'F') > 0) AND B.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0 ORDER BY ID_PARENT ASC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY_BY_ID_FASCICOLO
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.*, getAccessRights(@param3@,@param2@, @idRuoloPubblico@,a.system_id) as accessrights FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ and (checkSecurity(A.ID_FASCICOLO, @param2@, @param3@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'F') > 0) ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FOLDERByID
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A WHERE checksecurity(A.system_id,@param2@,@param3@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F' )>0 AND A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FOLDERByID_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__FOLDERB_AND_CHILD_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ OR A.SYSTEM_ID=@param2@ ORDER BY ID_PARENT ASC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FASCICOLOByID
query.value:
SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, @param6@ AS DTA_CREAZIONE,
A.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,
getaccessrights(@param5@,@param4@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO,A.CHA_PRIVATO,ID_TITOLARIO, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.CHA_CONTROLLATO, A.CHA_COD_T_A, A.COD_EXT_APP, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, CHA_PUBBLICO, getChaConsentiFasc(a.id_parent, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.id_fascicolo) as CHA_CONSENTI_FASC FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param3@ AND checksecurity(A.system_id,@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'F' )>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F'

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FASCICOLOByID_LOW_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, @param6@ AS DTA_CREAZIONE, getaccessrights(@param5@,@param4@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO,A.CHA_PRIVATO,ID_TITOLARIO, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.CHA_CONTROLLATO, A.CHA_COD_T_A, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param3@ AND checksecurity(A.id_titolario,@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'T' )>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F'

query.name: S_Project9
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT B.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT B WHERE B.SYSTEM_ID= @param1@)

query.name: S_Project10

query.name: S_ProjectComponents4
query.value: SELECT a.LINK,(case when b.num_proto is not null then b.num_proto when b.num_proto is null then b.docnumber end) AS CODICE FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS a,PROFILE b WHERE a.LINK=b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.PROJECT_ID IN ( @param1@ )

query.name: S_Project11

query.name: S_Project12
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND (NUM_LIVELLO = 0 OR NUM_LIVELLO IS NULL) AND ID_AMM = @param1@

query.name: S_Project13
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT= @param1@

query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE PROJECT_ID IN ( @param1@ )

query.name: S_Security
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SECURITY WHERE PERSONORGROUP IN @param1@ AND THING IN @param2@

query.name: S_Security2
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@param1@ AND PERSONORGROUP=@param2@

query.name: S_Security3

query.name: S_Versions
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM VERSIONS WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_Versions2
query.value: SELECT VERSION_LABEL FROM VERSIONS WHERE @param1@ AND ( VERSION_LABEL NOT LIKE 'PR%' AND VERSION_LABEL NOT LIKE 'ATD') ORDER BY VERSION_LABEL DESC, VERSION_ID DESC

query.name: S_VAR_COD_LIV1
query.value: SELECT VAR_COD_LIV1 FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_AMM='@param1@' AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T' AND @param2@ @param3@

query.name: UPD_SET_TODOLIST_GIA_VISTA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_VISTA = '1', DTA_VISTA = @param4@ WHERE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE DPA_TRASMISSIONE, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE ( DPA_TRASMISSIONE.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA ) AND (DPA_TRASMISSIONE.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL) AND (DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_VALIDA = '1') AND (DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N') AND (DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_VISTA = '0') AND ( (DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_PEOPLE = @param2@) OR DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param3@ ) )

query.name: UPDATE_TODOLIST
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA SET ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALE=@param2@ AND ID_TRASMISSIONE @param2@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@ AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_DTA_ACCETTATA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_ACCETTATA = @param1@, CHA_ACCETTATA='1', CHA_VISTA = '1', DTA_VISTA = @param1@ @param2@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID @param3@ AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: U_DPA_TRASMISSIONE_DTA_INVIO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASMISSIONE SET DTA_INVIO = @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param2@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_CHA_VALIDA_0
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_VALIDA='0' , CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0' WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA IN (SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA A, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND B.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param3@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA and TS.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_TRASM_SINGOLA FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID =@param2@))) AND SYSTEM_ID != @param2@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_DTA_RIFIUTATA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET @param1@ CHA_RIFIUTATA='1' @param2@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID @param3@ AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: U_SMISTADOC_SCARTA_TRASM_UTENTE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_VISTA = @param1@, CHA_VISTA = '1' @param2@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_updateTrasmRispSing
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET ID_TRASM_RISP_SING = @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_updateTrasmUtente
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = @param1@, DTA_VISTA = @param2@, DTA_ACCETTATA = @param3@, DTA_RIFIUTATA = @param4@, DTA_RISPOSTA = @param5@, VAR_NOTE_ACC = '@param6@', VAR_NOTE_RIF = '@param7@' @param8@ @param9@ @param10@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID= @param11@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_updateTrasmSingola
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA SET ID_RAGIONE = @param1@, CHA_TIPO_DEST = '@param2@', ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param3@, VAR_NOTE_SING = '@param4@', CHA_TIPO_TRASM = '@param5@', DTA_SCADENZA = @param6@, HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS = @param8@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param7@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASMISSIONE_updateTrasmissione

query.name: U_DPADettGlob2

query.name: S_COUNT__PROFILE__CHA_IN_CESTINO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE WHERE system_id = @idProfile@ AND NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO, '0') = '1'

query.name: S_DPA_EL_REGISTRI
query.value: select system_id from dpa_el_registri where id_amm=@idAmm@ and cha_rf = '0'

query.name: S_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_IN_CESTINO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, A.VAR_NOTE_CESTINO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE a @param1@ WHERE ( (A.CHA_DA_PROTO='1' AND A.ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) ) OR A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO='G') AND nvl(A.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='1' AND a.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL AND getIdAmm(A.AUTHOR) = @idAmm@ @param2@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__DPA_TRASM_SING__DPA_TRASM_UTENTE__DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: select ut.id_people from dpa_trasmissione trasm, dpa_trasm_singola sing, dpa_trasm_utente ut, dpa_ragione_trasm rag, profile p where trasm.system_id = sing.id_trasmissione and sing.system_id = ut.id_trasm_singola and sing.id_ragione = rag.system_id and trasm.id_profile=p.system_id and p.CHA_DA_PROTO <> 0 and p.NUM_PROTO is null and trasm.id_profile = @idProfile@ @ragione@
