query.value: SELECT /*+ index (a ) index (b ) index (r )*/ a.system_id, a.id_amm, r.var_codice, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.var_codice_amm, a.var_codice_aoo, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, a.var_cognome, a.var_nome, b.var_indirizzo, b.var_cap, b.var_citta, b.var_provincia,b.var_localita, b.var_nazione, b.var_telefono, b.var_telefono2, b.var_fax, id_old, a.var_email,b.VAR_NOTE, b.var_cod_fisc, b.var_cod_pi FROM dpa_corr_globali a, dpa_dett_globali b, dpa_el_registri r WHERE a.system_id = b.id_corr_globali(+) AND a.id_registro = r.system_id(+) AND a.cha_tipo_corr not in ( 'O','C') AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'E' AND a.dta_fine is null AND a.id_amm = @idamm@ AND UPPER(a.var_cod_rubrica) not like UPPER('INTEROP_%') @registri@ ORDER BY a.var_desc_corr

query.name: S_RICERCA_ALL_CORRISPONDENTI
query.value: Select /*+ index (a ) index (b ) index (r )*/ a.system_id, a.id_amm, r.var_codice, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.var_codice_amm, a.var_codice_aoo, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, a.var_cognome, a.var_nome, b.var_indirizzo, b.var_cap, b.var_citta, b.var_provincia,b.var_localita, b.var_nazione, b.var_telefono, b.var_telefono2, B.Var_Fax, Id_Old, MAIL_E_NOTE_CORR_ESTERNI(a.system_id) as VAR_EMAIL, B.Var_Note, B.Var_Cod_Fisc, B.Var_Cod_Pi, dt.description From Dpa_Corr_Globali A, Dpa_Dett_Globali B, Dpa_El_Registri R, Dpa_T_Canale_Corr Tcc, Documenttypes Dt Where A.System_Id = B.Id_Corr_Globali(+) And Tcc.Id_Corr_Globale(+) = A.System_Id And Dt.System_Id=Tcc.Id_Documenttype AND a.id_registro = r.system_id(+) AND a.cha_tipo_corr not in ( 'O','C') AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'E' AND a.dta_fine is null AND a.id_amm = @idamm@ And Upper(A.Var_Cod_Rubrica) Not Like Upper('INTEROP_%') @registri@ Order By 1, A.Var_Desc_Corr

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATES_ARCHIVIO_DEPOSITO
query.value: select distinct(dpa_tipo_atto.system_id), dpa_tipo_atto.VAR_DESC_ATTO, dpa_tipo_atto.Abilitato_SI_NO, dpa_tipo_atto.In_Esercizio, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_Mod_1, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_Mod_2, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_Mod_SU, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_All_1, dpa_tipo_atto.GG_SCADENZA, dpa_tipo_atto.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, dpa_tipo_atto.CHA_PRIVATO from dpa_tipo_atto, dpa_associazione_templates, dpa_oggetti_custom, dpa_tipo_oggetto where dpa_tipo_atto.system_id = dpa_associazione_templates.id_template and dpa_associazione_templates.id_oggetto = dpa_oggetti_custom.system_id and dpa_oggetti_custom.id_tipo_oggetto = dpa_tipo_oggetto.system_id and UPPER(dpa_tipo_oggetto.DESCRIZIONE) like UPPER('%CONTATORE%') and -- UPPER(dpa_oggetti_custom.FORMATO_CONTATORE) like UPPER('%ANNO%') -- and dpa_tipo_atto.id_amm = @idAmm@ @seRepertorio@

query.name: S_PROJECT_TRASFERIMENTO_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (B INDX_SEC5) NO_INDEX (A INDX_PROJ18)*/ DISTINCT SYSTEM_ID, DESCRIPTION, CHA_TIPO_PROJ, VAR_CODICE, ID_AMM, NUM_LIVELLO, CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, ID_FASCICOLO, ID_PARENT, VAR_COD_ULTIMO, VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,CHA_STATO, ID_TIPO_PROC, ID_REGISTRO, getcodreg(ID_REGISTRO) as CODREG, ID_UO_LF, DTA_UO_LF, DTA_CREAZIONE, CARTACEO, CHA_PRIVATO, ID_TITOLARIO, to_char(dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA FROM PROJECT WHERE (ID_AMM IS NULL OR ID_AMM = @param3@ ) AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' and cha_stato='@stato@' and CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='@tipofasc@' and (CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO <> '1')

query.name: S_COUNT_FASCICOLI__TRASFERIMENTO_DEPOSITO
S_FASCICOLI_TRASFERIMENTO_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY dta_creazione desc) as rn, a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note, to_char(A.DTA_APERTURA,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS dta_apertura, to_char(A.DTA_CHIUSURA,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, getCodtit(a.id_parent) as codTit, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, getInConservazione(null, a.system_id,'F', 218, 240) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO, a.AUTHOR, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE FROM project a @tblCL1@ WHERE (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and a.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G' and a.cha_in_archivio <> '1' @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters@ order by a.dta_creazione desc ) WHERE rn BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_DOC_IN_SERIE_TRASFERIMENTO_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT (SELECT to_number(Valore_Oggetto_Db) FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES WHERE ID_OGGETTO = @paramOggetto@ AND Doc_Number = A.DOCNUMBER) as numSerie, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(A.DTA_PROTO,A.CREATION_TIME) AS DATA, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, --getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, (select MAX(FC.DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE) from DPA_FASCICOLAZIONE_CARTACEA FC where FC.ID_DOCUMENT = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE FROM PROFILE a WHERE @filters@ order by numSerie desc

query.name: S_DOCUMENTI_INFASCICOLO_TRASFERIMENTO_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (d) index (b) index (a) NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) index (e) */ DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCNAME, A.STATUS, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.PATH, @param1@ AS CREATION_DATE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.ID_OGGETTO, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.VAR_PROTO_EME, A.DTA_PROTO_EME, A.VAR_COGNOME_EME, A.VAR_NOME_EME, A.ID_PARENT, A.DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.CHA_MOD_DEST_OCC, A.DTA_PROTO_IN, A.VAR_PROTO_IN, A.ID_ANNULLATORE, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_AUT_ANNULLA, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.CHA_INVIO_CONFERMA, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, B.PROJECT_ID, B.LINK, B.TYPE, D.TYPE_ID, D.DESCRIPTION, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@param3@,@param4@) AS IN_ADL, (CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN creation_date ELSE dta_proto END ) AS dta_protocollo_new, (select MAX(FC.DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE) from DPA_FASCICOLAZIONE_CARTACEA FC where FC.ID_DOCUMENT = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE A, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B, DOCUMENTTYPES D @param6@ WHERE B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND A.SYSTEM_ID=B.LINK AND B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ and NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and (checkVisibilitaArchivio('D', A.SYSTEM_ID, @param3@) > 0) @anno@ ORDER BY A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO DESC, A.NUM_PROTO DESC, A.DOCNUMBER DESC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_NO_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_PROJ6) index (B INDX_SEC5) */ DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: GET_ALL_FASC_NO_PAGING
query.value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note,@dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, getAccessRights(@idGrp@,@idPeo@, @idRuoloPubblico@,a.system_id) as accessrights, getCodtit(a.id_parent) as codTit, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, getInConservazione(null, a.system_id,'F', @idPeo@, @idGrp@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE FROM project a @tblCL1@ WHERE exists (select 'x' from security b where a.system_id = b.thing AND (b.personorgroup = @idPeo@ OR b.personorgroup = @idGrp@) AND b.accessrights > 0) AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@ ) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and (checkVisibilitaArchivio('F', A.SYSTEM_ID, @idGrp@) > 0) @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters@ order by a.dta_creazione desc )

query.name: TRASF_DEP_FASC_PROC
query.value: update project set cha_in_archivio=@valore@ where system_id = @system_id@

query.name: TIPO_PROTO_RISPOSTA
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ CHA_TIPO_PROTO FROM PROFILE WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROTO <> 'G' AND (ID_PARENT IS NOT NULL OR ID_PARENT <> 0) AND ID_PARENT=@param1@

query.name: PROFILE_RIMUOVI_CATENA
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET ID_PARENT = NULL WHERE ID_PARENT = @param1@

query.name: D_DPAItemsConservazione
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE WHERE @param@

query.name: S_DPAItemsConservazione
U_AREA_CONS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE SET CHA_STATO='I', VAR_TIPO_SUPPORTO=@idTipoSupp@, VAR_TIPO_CONS=@tipoCons@, VAR_NOTE=@note@, VAR_DESCRIZIONE=@descrizione@, DATA_INVIO=@data@, CONSOLIDA=@consolida@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@sysId@

query.name: S_DPAAreaConservazione
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE WHERE DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE.ID_PEOPLE=@idPeople@ AND DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = (SELECT DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_GRUPPO = @idGruppo@) AND DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE.CHA_STATO='N'

query.name: S_RIC_AREA_CONS
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, CHA_STATO, VAR_TIPO_SUPPORTO, VAR_NOTE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE, DATA_APERTURA, DATA_INVIO, DATA_CONSERVAZIONE FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE WHERE ID_PEOPLE=@idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=@idRuoloInUo@

query.name: D_DPAAreaConservazione
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idIstanza@

query.name: U_ItemsConservazione
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE SET CHA_STATO='I' WHERE ID_CONSERVAZIONE=@idCons@

query.name: U_SizeItemCons
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE SET SIZE_ITEM=@size@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@sysId@

query.name: S_TIPO_SUPPORTO
query.value: SELECT @param@ FROM DPA_TIPO_SUPPORTO

query.name: S_MittDestIndirizzo
query.value: SELECT corrcat_address(@systemID@,'@tipo@') as MITT_DEST from profile where system_id = @systemID@

query.name: U_DPA_ITEMS_CONS
S_DETT_CONS
S_COUNT_FASCICOLI_PAGING_UNION
S_FASCICOLI_PAGING_UNION
query.value: SELECT a.*, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, '0') AS in_adlrole, getaccessrights (@idGruppo@, @idPeople@, @idRuoloPubblico@, a.system_id) AS accessrights, getcodtit (a.id_parent) AS codtit, getinconservazione (NULL, a.system_id, 'F', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@ ) AS in_conservazione, getcodreg(a.id_registro) as AOO, gettestoultimanota ('F',a.system_id, @idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) as ultima_nota, getdiagrammistato (a.system_id, 'F') AS stato, getDescTitolario(a.id_titolario) as cod_titolario, getpeoplename (a.author) as desc_autore, getdesccorr(a.id_ruolo_creatore) as desc_ruolo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_creatore) as desc_uo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_lf) as desc_coll, esisteNotaVisibile('F',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS esiste_nota, a.cha_cod_t_a @contatore@ @valoriCustom@ FROM (SELECT @index@ interna.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note, @dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,a.AUTHOR, a.COD_EXT_APP, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE, a.cha_controllato, a.cha_consenti_class, a.CHA_CONSENTI_FASC, a.ID_RUOLO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_UO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_AUTHOR_CHIUSURA, a.DTA_APERTURA AS DTA_APERTURA_ORDER, a.DTA_CHIUSURA AS DTA_CHIUSURA_ORDER, a.id_titolario, a.num_fascicolo as num_fasc, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, ta.var_desc_fasc AS desc_tipo_atto, a.ID_TIPO_FASC, a.cha_cod_t_a FROM project a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_fasc ta on a.ID_TIPO_FASC = ta.system_id @tblCL1@ WHERE @security@ AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO = 'P' @listDocuments@ @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters@ ORDER BY @order@ )interna @paging@ UNION SELECT a.*, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, '0') AS in_adlrole, getaccessrights (@idGruppo@, @idPeople@, @idRuoloPubblico@, a.system_id) AS accessrights, getcodtit (a.id_parent) AS codtit, getinconservazione (NULL, a.system_id, 'F', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@ ) AS in_conservazione, getcodreg(a.id_registro) as AOO, gettestoultimanota ('F',a.system_id, @idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) as ultima_nota, getdiagrammistato (a.system_id, 'F') AS stato, getDescTitolario(a.id_titolario) as cod_titolario, getpeoplename (a.author) as desc_autore, getdesccorr(a.id_ruolo_creatore) as desc_ruolo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_creatore) as desc_uo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_lf) as desc_coll, esisteNotaVisibile('F',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS esiste_nota, a.cha_cod_t_a @contatore@ @valoriCustom@ FROM (SELECT @index@ interna.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(a)*/ a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note, @dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,a.AUTHOR, a.COD_EXT_APP, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE, a.cha_controllato, a.cha_consenti_class, a.CHA_CONSENTI_FASC, a.ID_RUOLO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_UO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_AUTHOR_CHIUSURA, a.DTA_APERTURA AS DTA_APERTURA_ORDER, a.DTA_CHIUSURA AS DTA_CHIUSURA_ORDER, a.id_titolario, a.num_fascicolo as num_fasc, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, ta.var_desc_fasc AS desc_tipo_atto, a.ID_TIPO_FASC, a.cha_cod_t_a FROM project a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_fasc ta on a.ID_TIPO_FASC = ta.system_id @tblCL1@ WHERE @security@ AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO = 'P' @listDocuments@ @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters1@ ORDER BY @order@ )interna @paging@

query.name: DS_GET_TRASM_DIAGR_AR_2
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_RAGIONE = DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TRASMISSIONE.system_id = DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.system_id = DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND DPA_TRASMISSIONE.SYSTEM_ID = @idTrasmissione@ AND CHA_RIFIUTATA = '1'

query.name: S_GROUPNAME_FROM_GROUPS
query.value: SELECT GROUP_NAME FROM GROUPS WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idGruppo@

query.name: S_GET_LDAP_CONFIG
query.value: SELECT SERVER_NAME, GROUP_DN, USER_NAME, USERID_ATTRIBUTE, EMAIL_ATTRIBUTE, MATRICOLA_ATTRIBUTE, NOME_ATTRIBUTE, COGNOME_ATTRIBUTE, SEDE_ATTRIBUTE FROM DPA_LDAP_CONFIG WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: I_INSERT_LDAP_CONFIG
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_LDAP_CONFIG ( ID_AMM, SERVER_NAME, GROUP_DN, USERID_ATTRIBUTE, EMAIL_ATTRIBUTE, MATRICOLA_ATTRIBUTE, NOME_ATTRIBUTE, COGNOME_ATTRIBUTE, SEDE_ATTRIBUTE ) VALUES ( @idAmm@, '@serverName@', '@groupDN@', '@userId@', '@email@', '@matricola@', '@nome@', '@cognome@', '@sede@' )

query.name: U_UPDATE_LDAP_CONFIG
query.value: UPDATE DPA_LDAP_CONFIG SET SERVER_NAME = '@serverName@', GROUP_DN = '@groupDN@', USERID_ATTRIBUTE = '@userId@', EMAIL_ATTRIBUTE = '@email@', MATRICOLA_ATTRIBUTE = '@matricola@', NOME_ATTRIBUTE = '@nome@', COGNOME_ATTRIBUTE = '@cognome@', SEDE_ATTRIBUTE = '@sede@' WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_CONTAINS_LDAP_CONFIG
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_LDAP_CONFIG WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: U_SET_LDAP_CONFIG_DOMAIN_CREDENTIALS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_LDAP_CONFIG SET USER_NAME = '@userName@', PASSWORD = '@encryptedPassword@' WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_GET_LDAP_CONFIG_DOMAIN_USER_PASSWORD
query.value: SELECT PASSWORD FROM DPA_LDAP_CONFIG WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_GET_LDAP_SYNC_HISTORY
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, USER_ID, SYNC_DATE, ITEMS_SYNCRONIZED, ERROR_DETAILS FROM DPA_LDAP_SYNC_HISTORY WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ ORDER BY SYNC_DATE DESC

query.name: D_DELETE_LDAP_SYNC_HISTORY_ITEM
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LDAP_SYNC_HISTORY WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id@

query.name: I_INSERT_LDAP_SYNC_HISTORY_ITEM
U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_SOSTIT2
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TODOLIST SET ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @param1@ WHERE ID_TRASM_UTENTE IN ( SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param2@ AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0')) )

query.name: GET_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = P.ID_AMM AND P.ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T'

query.name: AMM_S_VISIBILITA_NODO_RUOLI
query.value: SELECT * FROM SECURITY WHERE THING = @thing@ AND PERSONORGROUP = @personorgroup@ AND ACCESSRIGHTS = 255 AND CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'P'

query.name: S_GET_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSORS
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSORS P ORDER BY P.NAME ASC

query.name: S_GET_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR_FOR_ADMIN
query.value: SELECT P.* FROM DPA_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSORS P INNER JOIN DPA_AMMINISTRA A ON P.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @idAdmin@

query.name: S_GET_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR_FOR_USER
query.value: SELECT P.* FROM DPA_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSORS P INNER JOIN PEOPLE PL ON P.SYSTEM_ID = PL.ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR WHERE PL.SYSTEM_ID = @idUser@

query.name: S_DOC_INARCHIVIO
query.value: SELECT CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @ID_DOC@

query.name: S_CONSERVAZIONE1
U_CONSERVAZIONE_DATI_TIMESTAMP
query.value: UPDATE DPA_SUPPORTO SET DATA_APPO_MARCA=TO_DATE('@dataAppoMarca@','MM/DD/YYYY'), DATA_SCADENZA_MARCA=TO_DATE('@dataScadMarca@','MM/DD/YYYY'), VAR_MARCA_TEMPORALE=@marca@, NUM_MARCA=@numeroMarca@ WHERE ID_CONSERVAZIONE=@idCons@

query.name: S_CONSERVAZIONE2
DELETE_DPA_ITEMS_CONS
PD_GET_RUOLI_TIPO_ATTO
query.value: SELECT B.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE ID_TIPO_DOC = @idTipoDoc@ AND A.ID_RUOLO = B.ID_GRUPPO

query.name: PD_GET_RUOLI_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC
query.value: SELECT ID_RUOLO FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggCustom@ AND A.INS_MOD = 1 AND A.ID_RUOLO = B.ID_GRUPPO

query.name: PD_DELETE_ASS_RUOLO_OGGETTO_CUSTOM_DOC
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC WHERE ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_INSERT_ASS_RUOLO_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC
PD_SELECT_ASS_RUOLO_OGGETTO_CUSTOM_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC WHERE ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@ AND @funzione@

query.name: PD_UPDATE_RUOLI_TIPO_DOC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC SET DIRITTI = @diritti@ WHERE ID_TIPO_DOC = @idTipoDoc@ AND ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@

query.name: PD_UPDATE_RUOLI_TIPO_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC SET DIRITTI = @diritti@ WHERE ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@ AND ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_UTENTI_PAGING_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PL.SYSTEM_ID AS ID FROM PEOPLE PL INNER JOIN PEOPLEGROUPS PG ON PL.SYSTEM_ID = PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN GROUPS G ON PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = G.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN SECURITY S ON S.PERSONORGROUP = G.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN PROJECT P ON P.SYSTEM_ID = S.THING INNER JOIN PROJECT P1 ON P.ID_TITOLARIO = P1.SYSTEM_ID WHERE P.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND P.ID_TITOLARIO != 0 AND P.VAR_CODICE IN (@codiciTitolari@) AND P1.DTA_CESSAZIONE IS NULL AND PL.DISABLED = 'N' @filters@ )

query.name: S_GET_UTENTI_PAGING_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USERID ASC) AS RN, ID, USERID, COGNOME, NOME, EMAIL, SEDE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PL.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, PL.USER_ID AS USERID, PL.VAR_COGNOME AS COGNOME, PL.VAR_NOME AS NOME, PL.EMAIL_ADDRESS AS EMAIL, PL.VAR_SEDE AS SEDE FROM PEOPLE PL INNER JOIN PEOPLEGROUPS PG ON PL.SYSTEM_ID = PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN GROUPS G ON PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = G.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN SECURITY S ON S.PERSONORGROUP = G.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN PROJECT P ON P.SYSTEM_ID = S.THING INNER JOIN PROJECT P1 ON P.ID_TITOLARIO = P1.SYSTEM_ID WHERE P.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND P.ID_TITOLARIO != 0 AND P.VAR_CODICE IN (@codiciTitolari@) AND P1.DTA_CESSAZIONE IS NULL AND PL.DISABLED = 'N' @filters@ ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @start@ AND @end@

query.name: S_GET_ID_DOCUMENTI_IN_FASCICOLO
query.value: SELECT link AS ID_DOC FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE project_id IN ( SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE id_fascicolo = (SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE VAR_CODICE = '@codiceFascicolo@') AND cha_tipo_proj = 'C' )

query.name: S_FULLTEXT_GET_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.SYSTEM_ID, P.DOCNUMBER, P.NUM_PROTO, P.VAR_SEGNATURA, @creationDate@ AS DATA, P.CHA_TIPO_PROTO As A_P, P.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, P.ID_REGISTRO AS ID_REGISTRO, getchaimg(P.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, P.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID IN (@param@) ORDER BY P.DOCNUMBER DESC

query.name: S_GET_CURRENT_VERSION_FILE_PATH
query.value: SELECT c.path FROM components c WHERE c.version_id = (SELECT MAX(v.version_id) FROM versions v WHERE v.docnumber = @docNumber@)

query.name: S_COUNT_FASCICOLI_SCARTO
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM project a WHERE checkSecurity(a.system_id,@idPeo@,@idGrp@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F') > 0 AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@ ) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and id_parent = @idParent@ and cha_stato = 'C' and cha_tipo_fascicolo='P' and cha_in_archivio = '1'

query.name: S_FASCICOLI_SCARTO_PAGING
query.value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note,@dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, getAccessRights(@idGrp@,@idPeo@, @idRuoloPubblico@,a.system_id) as accessrights, getCodtit(a.id_parent) as codTit, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, --getInConservazione(null, a.system_id,'F', @idPeo@, @idGrp@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO getInScarto(null, a.system_id,@idPeo@, @idGrp@) AS IN_SCARTO FROM project a WHERE checkSecurity(a.system_id,@idPeo@,@idGrp@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'F') > 0 AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and @idParent@ cha_stato = 'C' and cha_tipo_fascicolo='P' and cha_in_archivio = '1' and months_between(sysdate, a.dta_chiusura) > a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE and getInScarto(null, a.system_id,@idPeo@, @idGrp@) = '0' order by a.dta_creazione desc )

query.name: S_DPAAreaScarto
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT DPA_AREA_SCARTO.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_AREA_SCARTO WHERE DPA_AREA_SCARTO.ID_PEOPLE=@idPeople@ AND DPA_AREA_SCARTO.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = (SELECT DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_GRUPPO = @idGruppo@) AND DPA_AREA_SCARTO.CHA_STATO='N'

query.name: D_DPAItemsScarto
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ITEMS_SCARTO WHERE @param@

query.name: U_DPAAreaScarto
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AREA_SCARTO SET VAR_DESCRIZIONE = '@desc@', VAR_NOTE = '@note@', CHA_STATO = '@stato@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @sysId@

query.name: U_CambiaStatoScarto
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AREA_SCARTO SET CHA_STATO = @stato@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @sysId@

query.name: D_DPAAreaScarto
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_AREA_SCARTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idIstanza@

query.name: S_GET_LISTA_SCARTO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_AMM, ID_PEOPLE, ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, CHA_STATO, VAR_NOTE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE, DATA_APERTURA, @dtasc@ AS DATA_SCARTO, VAR_ESTREMI_RICHIESTA, VAR_ESTREMI_AUTORIZ FROM DPA_AREA_SCARTO WHERE ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = (SELECT DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_GRUPPO = @idRuoloInUO@)

query.name: S_GET_FASC_IN_ISTANZA
query.value: select a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note,@dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, getAccessRights(@idGrp@,@idPeo@, @idRuoloPubblico@,a.system_id) as accessrights, getCodtit(a.id_parent) as codTit, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA from project a where system_id in (select DISTINCT id_project from dpa_items_scarto where id_scarto=@idScarto@)

query.name: S_DOCUMENTI_INFASCICOLO_Scarto
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCNAME, A.STATUS, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.PATH, @param1@ AS CREATION_DATE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.ID_OGGETTO, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.VAR_PROTO_EME, A.DTA_PROTO_EME, A.VAR_COGNOME_EME, A.VAR_NOME_EME, A.ID_PARENT, A.DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.CHA_MOD_DEST_OCC, A.DTA_PROTO_IN, A.VAR_PROTO_IN, A.ID_ANNULLATORE, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_AUT_ANNULLA, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.CHA_INVIO_CONFERMA, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, B.PROJECT_ID, B.LINK, B.TYPE, D.TYPE_ID, D.DESCRIPTION, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@param3@,@param4@) AS IN_ADL, (CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN creation_date ELSE dta_proto END ) AS dta_protocollo_new, (select MAX(FC.DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE) from DPA_FASCICOLAZIONE_CARTACEA FC where FC.ID_DOCUMENT = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE A, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B, DOCUMENTTYPES D @param6@ WHERE B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND A.SYSTEM_ID=B.LINK AND B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ and NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and a.cha_in_archivio = '1' ORDER BY A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO DESC, A.NUM_PROTO DESC, A.DOCNUMBER DESC

query.name: S_GET_SOTTO_FASCICOLI
query.value: select system_id from project a where id_fascicolo in (select system_id from project a where system_id = @system_id@ and cha_tipo_proj='F' and cha_tipo_fascicolo='P') and id_fascicolo <> id_parent

query.name: S_APPS_EXTENSION
query.value: select upper(default_extension) from apps where default_extension not like '%.%' group by default_extension order by default_extension asc

query.name: S_APPS_EXTENSION_FORMATI
query.value: select upper(file_extension) from dpa_formati_documento d where id_amministrazione=@idAmm@ and file_extension not like '%.%' order by file_extension asc

query.name: S_IDRF_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: select a.system_id, a.dta_fine from dpa_corr_globali a, dpa_el_registri b where b.ID_AOO_COLLEGATA = @idRegistro@ and b.SYSTEM_ID = a.ID_RF and b.CHA_RF = 1

query.name: U_IDRF_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: Update DPA_CORR_GLOBALI set DTA_FINE = @param1@ where system_id = @param2@

query.name: D_VIS_TITOLARIO_PER_RUOLO
query.value: delete from security s where s.THING in (select system_id from project where id_titolario = @idTitolario@) and s.PERSONORGROUP = @systemId@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ID_TRASMISSIONE)) FROM DPA_TODOLIST TDL WHERE @docORfasc@ ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWSNONVISTE_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ID_TRASMISSIONE)) FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE (ID_PROFILE > 0 or ID_PROJECT > 0) and ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@

query.name: S_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@) AS RN, ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, DTAINVIO, DTA_SCAD_DESC, DTA_SCAD_ASC, DTA_VISTA, UT_MITT, RUOLO_MITT, UT_DEST, RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, OGGETTO_MITTENTE, TIPO_PROTO, DTA_DOC, NUM_PROTO, ID_PROJECT, DESC_FASC, COD_FASC, DTA_CREAZ, NUM_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM,Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'COMPONENTS_CHA_FIRMATO') AS CHA_FIRMATO, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO FROM ( SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, nvl(DTA_VISTA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_VISTA, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'COMPONENTS_CHA_FIRMATO') AS CHA_FIRMATO, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DTA_CREAZ') AS DTA_CREAZ, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'NUM_FASC') AS NUM_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE @docORFasc@ ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@ ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_EXPORT_TODO_LIST
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, nvl(DTA_VISTA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_VISTA, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DTA_CREAZ') AS DTA_CREAZ, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'NUM_FASC') AS NUM_FASC, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'COMPONENTS_CHA_FIRMATO') AS CHA_FIRMATO FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE @docORFasc@ ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) @filters@ ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_ID_TRASM_UTENTE_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASM_UTENTE FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE @docORFasc@ ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_CHIAVI_CONFIGURAZIONE
query.value: SELECT CC.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CC.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, CC.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, CC.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, CC.VAR_VALORE AS VALORE, CC.CHA_TIPO_CHIAVE AS TIPO, CC.CHA_VISIBILE AS CHA_VIS, CC.CHA_MODIFICABILE AS CHA_MOD, CC.CHA_GLOBALE AS CHA_GLOBALE, CC.CHA_CONSERVAZIONE AS CHA_CONSERVAZIONE FROM DPA_CHIAVI_CONFIGURAZIONE CC WHERE CC.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ ORDER BY CC.VAR_CODICE

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_CHIAVE_CONFIGURAZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CHIAVI_CONFIGURAZIONE SET VAR_DESCRIZIONE='@descrizione@', VAR_VALORE='@valore@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: I_CHIAVI_CONFIG_NEW_AMM
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CHIAVI_CONFIGURAZIONE ( @param1@ VAR_CODICE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE, VAR_VALORE, CHA_VISIBILE, CHA_MODIFICABILE, CHA_TIPO_CHIAVE, CHA_GLOBALE, ID_AMM ) SELECT @param2@ VAR_CODICE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE, VAR_VALORE, CHA_VISIBILE, CHA_MODIFICABILE, CHA_TIPO_CHIAVE, '0', @param3@ FROM DPA_CHIAVI_CONFIG_TEMPLATE

query.name: AMM_S_GET_CHIAVE_CONFIGURAZIONE
query.value: SELECT CC.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CC.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, CC.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, CC.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, CC.VAR_VALORE AS VALORE, CC.CHA_TIPO_CHIAVE AS TIPO, CC.CHA_VISIBILE AS CHA_VIS, CC.CHA_MODIFICABILE AS CHA_MOD, CC.CHA_GLOBALE AS CHA_GLOBALE FROM DPA_CHIAVI_CONFIGURAZIONE CC WHERE CC.SYSTEM_ID=@idChiave@

query.name: S_MODELLI_ASS_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: select distinct m.SYSTEM_ID, m.NOME, m.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, m.ID_REGISTRO, m.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI, m.ID_PEOPLE, m.SINGLE, m.ID_AMM, m.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, m.ID_PEOPLE_NEW_OWNER, m.ID_GROUP_NEW_OWNER from DPA_MODELLI_TRASM m, dpa_ass_diagrammi d where m.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ and @filters@ order by m.id_registro,m.single,m.nome

query.name: GET_CORRISPONDENTE_RF
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_CORR, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, A.VAR_NOME, A.VAR_COGNOME, A.CHA_DETTAGLI, A.CHA_PA, A.CHA_TIPO_URP, A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO, A.VAR_EMAIL, A.VAR_SMTP, A.NUM_PORTA_SMTP, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM, A.VAR_CODICE_AOO, A.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, A.ID_PARENT, A.ID_UO, A.DTA_FINE, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.CHA_TIPO_CORR, A.CHA_TIPO_IE, A.ID_RF FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND ((A.ID_AMM IS NULL) OR (A.ID_AMM='@param2@'))

query.name: GET_CHECK_INTEROP_CORRISPONDENTE
query.value: SELECT A.VAR_INSERT_BY_INTEROP FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_COD_RF_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: select a.system_id from dpa_el_registri a, dpa_corr_globali b where upper(b.var_cod_rubrica) = '@param1@' and b.ID_RF = a.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: GET_CORRISPONDENTE_BY_RF
query.value: select c.id_ruolo_in_uo, d.id_amm from dpa_l_ruolo_reg c, dpa_el_registri d where c.id_registro in ( select a.system_id from dpa_el_registri a, dpa_corr_globali b where b.id_rf = a.SYSTEM_ID and upper(a.VAR_CODICE) = '@param1@') and c.id_registro = d.system_id

query.name: GET_CORRISPONDENTE_BY_DESC_RF
query.value: select c.id_ruolo_in_uo, d.id_amm from dpa_l_ruolo_reg c, dpa_el_registri d where c.id_registro in ( select a.system_id from dpa_el_registri a, dpa_corr_globali b where b.id_rf = a.SYSTEM_ID and upper(a.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO) = '@param1@') and c.id_registro = d.system_id

query.name: LS_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_BY_DESC_LISTA
query.value: SELECT ID_DPA_CORR, L.ID_AMM FROM DPA_LISTE_DISTR, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI L,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE UPPER(L.VAR_DESC_CORR) = upper('@param1@') AND L.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_LISTA_DPA_CORR AND C.SYSTEM_ID=DPA_LISTE_DISTR.ID_DPA_CORR AND C.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: LS_GET_SYSTEM_ID_LISTA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = '@param1@'

query.name: U_ET_TITOLARIO
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET ET_TITOLARIO = '@etTitolario@', ET_LIVELLO1 = '@etLivello1@', ET_LIVELLO2 = '@etLivello2@', ET_LIVELLO3 = '@etLivello3@', ET_LIVELLO4 = '@etLivello4@', ET_LIVELLO5 = '@etLivello5@', ET_LIVELLO6 = '@etLivello6@' WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND ID_PARENT = 0 AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T'

query.name: I_DPA_PROTO_TIT
D_DPA_PROTO_TIT
query.value: DELETE DPA_PROTO_TIT WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_DPA_PROTO_TIT
query.value: SELECT NUM_RIF FROM DPA_PROTO_TIT WHERE @param1@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_PROTO_TIT.NUM_RIF

query.name: S_PROJECT_PROTO_TIT
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE @param1@

query.name: U_DPA_PROTO_TIT
query.value: UPDATE DPA_PROTO_TIT SET NUM_RIF = @numProtoTit@ WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_PROFILE_PROTO_TIT
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROFILE WHERE @param1@

query.name: U_PROFILE_PROTO_TIT
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET PROT_TIT = '@protoTitolario@', LAST_EDIT_DATE = SYSDATE, NUM_IN_FASC = @numInFasc@, ID_FASC_PROT_TIT = @idFascProtTit@, NUM_PROT_TIT = @numProtTit@, ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@, DTA_PROTO_TIT = @dataProtoTit@ WHERE @param1@

query.name: U_PROJC_PROTO_TIT
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT_COMPONENTS SET PROT_TIT = '@protoTit@' WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_PROJC_PROTO_TIT
query.value: SELECT PROT_TIT FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE PROJECT_ID = @projectId@ AND PROT_TIT IS NOT NULL FOR UPDATE OF PROJECT_COMPONENTS.PROT_TIT

query.name: S_MAX_NUM_DOC_IN_FASC
query.value: SELECT MAX(NUM_IN_FASC) AS MAX_NUM_IN_FASC FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_FASC_PROT_TIT = @idFascicolo@

query.name: S_NODI_FROM_NUM_PROT_TIT
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE @paramRegistro@ ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND ID_TITOLARIO IN (@idTitolario@) AND NUM_PROT_TIT = @numProtTit@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T'

query.name: S_GET_DATA_ULTIMA_TRASMISSIONE_EFFETTUATA
query.value: SELECT dta_invio FROM ( SELECT t.dta_invio FROM dpa_trasmissione t INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_singola ts ON t.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione WHERE cha_tipo_oggetto = '@tipoOggetto@' AND @filtroIdOggetto@ AND ts.id_corr_globale = @idDestinatario@ ORDER BY t.system_id DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_GET_DATA_ULTIMA_SPEDIZIONE_DOCUMENTO_EFFETTUATA
query.value: SELECT DTA_SPEDIZIONE FROM ( SELECT I.DTA_SPEDIZIONE FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO I INNER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C ON I.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = C.SYSTEM_ID WHERE I.ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @destinatario@ ORDER BY I.SYSTEM_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: U_UPDATE_DATA_SPEDIZIONE_DOCUMENTO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_STATO_INVIO SET DTA_SPEDIZIONE = @dtaSpedizione@, VAR_INDIRIZZO = @mail@, STATUS_C_MASK = (select getstatoinviomaskbytypeid(id_documenttype) from dpa_stato_invio where id_corr_globale= @idDestinatario@ and id_profile= @idProfile@) WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @idDestinatario@

query.name: SET_DETTAGLI_ALL_TODOLIST
query.value: BEGIN SP_DPA_COUNT_TODOLIST(@IDPEOPLE@,@IDGRUPPO@,'@TIMESTAMP@'); END;

query.name: GET_DETTAGLI_ALL_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT TOT_DOC, TOT_DOC_NO_LETTI, TOT_DOC_NO_ACCETTATI, TOT_FASC, TOT_FASC_NO_LETTI, TOT_FASC_NO_ACCETTATI, TOT_DOC_PREDISPOSTI FROM DPA_COUNT_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PEOPLE=@IDPEOPLE@ AND TS_STAMPA=TO_DATE('@TIMESTAMP@','dd/MM/yyyy:hh24:mi:ss')

query.name: SET_DETTAGLI_ALL_TODOLIST_NO_REG
query.value: BEGIN SP_DPA_COUNT_TODOLIST_NO_REG(@IDPEOPLE@,@IDGRUPPO@,'@TIMESTAMP@'); END;

query.name: S_IDAMM_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE (ID_PARENT = 0 OR ID_PARENT = NULL) AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID ASC

query.name: S_AMM_GET_UTENTI
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, c.system_id AS IDPEOPLE, c.user_id AS USERID, a.var_nome AS NOME, a.var_cognome AS COGNOME, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, c.cha_amministratore AS AMMINISTRATORE, a.var_email AS EMAIL, c.from_email_address AS FROM_EMAIL, c.disabled AS ABILITATO, (SELECT b.network_id FROM NETWORK_ALIASES b WHERE b.personorgroup = c.system_id) AS DOMINIO, c.var_sede AS SEDE, c.cha_notifica AS NOTIFICA, c.cha_notifica_con_allegato AS ALLEGATO_NOTIFICA, a.id_amm AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, c.password_never_expire as NESSUNA_SCADENZA_PASSWORD, c.ldap_never_sync, c.ldap_id_sync, c.ldap_authenticated, c.ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR, c.IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT, c.CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, c.smart_client_pdf_conv_on_scan, C.ABILITATO_CENTRO_SERVIZI, c.id_dispositivo_stampa, c.matricola, c.abilitato_chiavi_config FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE c WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_people = c.system_id

query.name: S_RICERCA_TIPO_URP
query.value: select cha_tipo_urp from dpa_corr_globali where UPPER(var_cod_rubrica) = UPPER('@param1@') and cha_tipo_ie = '@param2@' and id_amm = @param3@ and dta_fine is null

query.name: S_RICERCA_FIGLI_ELEMENTO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT dpa2.* FROM PEOPLEGROUPS INNER JOIN dpa_corr_globali ON peoplegroups.groups_system_id = dpa_corr_globali.id_gruppo INNER JOIN PEOPLE ON peoplegroups.people_system_id = people.system_id INNER JOIN dpa_corr_globali dpa2 on people.system_id = dpa2.id_people where PEOPLEGROUPS.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND dpa_corr_globali.system_id=@param1@

query.name: S_RICERCA_FIGLI_ELEMENTO_UO
query.value: SELECT dpa_corr_globali.* FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE upper(cha_tipo_urp) = 'R' AND DTA_FINE IS NULL AND id_uo = @param1@

query.name: S_RICERCA_RUOLI_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT c.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE b, PEOPLEGROUPS c, GROUPS d WHERE a.id_people = b.system_id AND b.system_id = c.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND c.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = d.system_id AND a.cha_tipo_urp='P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND UPPER(b.user_id) = UPPER('@param2@')

query.name: I_DPA_DELEGHE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_DELEGHE ( @colID@ ID_PEOPLE_DELEGANTE, ID_RUOLO_DELEGANTE, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, ID_RUOLO_DELEGATO, ID_UO_DELEGATO, COD_PEOPLE_DELEGANTE, COD_RUOLO_DELEGANTE, COD_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, COD_RUOLO_DELEGATO, DATA_DECORRENZA, DATA_SCADENZA, CHA_IN_ESERCIZIO ) VALUES ( @id@ @param1@ )

query.name: S_DELEGHE_ASSEGNATE
S_COUNT_DELEGHE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_DELEGHE @param1@

query.name: S_DELEGHE_PAGING
U_REVOCA_DELEGA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DELEGHE SET DATA_SCADENZA = SYSDATE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id_delega@

query.name: U_MODIFICA_DELEGA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DELEGHE SET @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id_delega@

query.name: U_DISMETTI_DELEGA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DELEGHE SET cha_in_esercizio='0' WHERE @param1@

query.name: DELETE_DELEGA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_DELEGHE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id_delega@

query.name: CONTA_DELEGHE_ATTIVE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_DELEGHE WHERE @param1@

query.name: DELEGHE_IN_ESERCIZIO
query.value: SELECT cha_in_esercizio FROM DPA_DELEGHE WHERE @param1@

query.name: LOCK_USER_LOGIN_DELEGATO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_LOGIN (USER_ID,ID_AMM,IP_ADDRESS,DTA_CONNESSIONE, SESSION_ID,DST, CHA_DELEGA, USER_ID_DELEGATO) VALUES (UPPER('@param1@'),@param2@,'@param3@',@param4@, '@param5@','@param6@', '1', UPPER('@param7@'))

query.name: S_REPORT_CONTATORI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select dpa_oggetti_custom.DESCRIZIONE, dpa_tipo_atto.VAR_DESC_ATTO, dpa_oggetti_custom.REPERTORIO, case dpa_oggetti_custom.CHA_TIPO_TAR when 'T' then 'Tipologia' when 'A' then 'AOO' when 'R' then 'RF' end as CHA_TIPO_TAR, dpa_contatori_doc.ANNO, dpa_contatori_doc.VALORE, getCodReg(dpa_contatori_doc.ID_AOO) as COD_AOO, getCodReg(dpa_contatori_doc.ID_RF) as COD_RF from dpa_tipo_atto, dpa_contatori_doc, dpa_oggetti_custom where dpa_tipo_atto.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ and dpa_tipo_atto.IN_ESERCIZIO = 'SI' and dpa_tipo_atto.ABILITATO_SI_NO = 1 and dpa_tipo_atto.SYSTEM_ID = dpa_contatori_doc.ID_TIPOLOGIA and dpa_contatori_doc.ID_OGG = dpa_oggetti_custom.SYSTEM_ID and dpa_contatori_doc.ANNO=@anno@

query.name: S_REPORT_CONTATORI_FASCICOLO
query.value: select dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc.descrizione, dpa_tipo_fasc.VAR_DESC_FASC, dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc.REPERTORIO, case dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc.CHA_TIPO_TAR when 'T' then 'Tipologia' when 'A' then 'AOO' when 'R' then 'RF' end as CHA_TIPO_TAR, dpa_contatori_fasc.ANNO, dpa_contatori_fasc.VALORE, getCodReg(dpa_contatori_fasc.ID_AOO) as COD_AOO, getCodReg(dpa_contatori_fasc.ID_RF) as COD_RF from dpa_tipo_fasc, dpa_contatori_fasc, dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc where dpa_tipo_fasc.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ and dpa_tipo_fasc.IN_ESERCIZIO = 'SI' and dpa_tipo_fasc.ABILITATO_SI_NO = 1 and dpa_tipo_fasc.SYSTEM_ID = dpa_contatori_fasc.ID_TIPOLOGIA and dpa_contatori_fasc.ID_OGG = dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc.SYSTEM_ID and dpa_contatori_fasc.ANNO=@anno@

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC_CAMPI_COMUNI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC WHERE DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT IS NULL and id_oggetto in ( SELECT DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC WHERE ( (ID_AMM = @idAmm@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND (In_Esercizio <> 'NO' OR In_Esercizio IS NULL) AND (Abilitato_SI_NO <> 0 OR Abilitato_SI_NO IS NULL) AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC.ID_TIPO_FASC AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_FASC.DIRITTI IN (1,2) ) AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT IS NULL AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID ) ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE

query.name: U_AMM_NEWS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET NEWS = '@news@', ENABLE_NEWS = '@enable_news@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idAmm@

query.name: S_AMM_NEWS
query.value: SELECT ENABLE_NEWS || '^' || NEWS FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idAmm@

query.name: UPDATE_ESITO_DPA_ITEMS_CONS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE SET CHA_ESITO=@param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param2@

query.name: S_CONSERVAZIONE_DOC_NUMBER_TRASM
query.value: select docNumber from profile p, dpa_area_conservazione c where c.ID_PROFILE_TRASMISSIONE=p.SYSTEM_ID and c.SYSTEM_ID=@idIstanza@

query.name: I_dpa_cons_verifica
S_REPORT_CONS_VERIFICHE
query.value: SELECT NUM_VER, ID_SUPPORTO, ID_ISTANZA, DATA_VER, ESITO, PERCENTUALE, VAR_NOTE AS NOTE FROM DPA_CONS_VERIFICA WHERE ID_SUPPORTO=@idSupporto@ AND ID_ISTANZA = @idIstanza@ order by data_ver desc

query.name: S_FIRST_DAY_WEEK
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (1 - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D')), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DAY FROM DUAL

query.name: S_FIRST_DAY_MONTH
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DAY FROM DUAL

query.name: S_LAST_DAY_WEEK
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (7 - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'D')), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DAY FROM DUAL

query.name: S_LAST_DAY_MONTH
query.value: select to_char(last_day(sysdate), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as DAY from dual

query.name: S_TODAY
query.value: select to_char(sysdate, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as DAY from dual

query.name: S_YESTERDAY
query.value: select to_char(sysdate - 1, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DAY FROM DUAL

query.name: S_LAST_THIRTY_ONE_DAY
query.value: select to_char(sysdate - 31, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DAY FROM DUAL

query.name: S_LAST_SEVEN_DAY
query.value: select to_char(sysdate - 7, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DAY FROM DUAL

query.name: S_PROFILE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: select ID_PROFILE_TRASMISSIONE from DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@IdCons@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_TITOLARI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, DESCRIPTION, ET_TITOLARIO FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_TITOLARIO=0 AND ID_AMM=@idAmm@

query.name: S_REPORT_PROTOCOLLO_ARMA
query.value: select project.NUM_PROT_TIT, @paramDate@ as DTA_APERTURA, project.DESCRIPTION as OGGETTO, project.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE from project where num_prot_tit is not null and cha_tipo_proj = 'T' and id_titolario = @idTitolario@ and project.id_amm = @idAmm@ and @idReg@ order by num_prot_tit asc

query.name: S_REPORT_DETTAGLIO_PRATICA
query.value: SELECT p.NUM_FASCICOLO, p.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIZIONE, @paramDate@ as DTA_CREAZIONE FROM PROJECT p WHERE id_parent in (SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE (@idReg@) AND ID_TITOLARIO =@idTitolario@ AND NUM_PROT_TIT = @numPratica@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@ and CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T') and p.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO ='P' order by num_fascicolo

query.name: S_REPORT_GIORNALE_RISCONTRI
query.value: select dpa_riscontri_classifica.RIFF_MITT as CLASSIFICA_MITTENTE, dpa_corr_globali.VAR_DESC_CORR as DESCRIZIONE_MITTENTE, (select project.DESCRIPTION from project where system_id = dpa_riscontri_classifica.ID_TITOLARIO_DEST and project.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' and project.id_titolario = 0) as TITOLARIO_INTERNO, dpa_riscontri_classifica.PROT_TIT_DEST as PRATICA_INTERNA, dpa_riscontri_classifica.CLASS_DEST as CLASSIFICA_INTERNA, (select project.DESCRIPTION from project where num_prot_tit = dpa_riscontri_classifica.prot_tit_dest and project.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' and project.id_titolario = dpa_riscontri_classifica.ID_TITOLARIO_DEST) as DESC_PRATICA_INTERNA from dpa_riscontri_classifica, dpa_corr_globali where dpa_corr_globali.SYSTEM_ID= dpa_riscontri_classifica.ID_CORR_GLOB and dpa_corr_globali.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ and @idReg@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_DOC_SPEDITI
query.value: select count(profile.system_id) as tot_documenti from dpa_stato_invio, profile, dpa_corr_globali c where dpa_stato_invio.ID_PROFILE=profile.SYSTEM_ID and dpa_stato_invio.ID_CORR_GLOBALE=c.SYSTEM_ID and GETIDAMM(profile.AUTHOR)=@idAmm@ @filters@

query.name: S_REPORT_DOC_SPEDITI_INTEROP
query.value: select profile.VAR_SEGNATURA, profile.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, dpa_stato_invio.DTA_SPEDIZIONE, c.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESTINATARIO, dpa_stato_invio.VAR_PROTO_DEST AS PROTO_DEST from dpa_stato_invio, profile, dpa_corr_globali c where dpa_stato_invio.ID_PROFILE=profile.SYSTEM_ID and dpa_stato_invio.ID_CORR_GLOBALE=c.SYSTEM_ID and GETIDAMM(profile.AUTHOR)=@idAmm@ @filters@

query.name: S_COUNT_DOC_FASCICOLATO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE LINK = @param1@

query.name: S_COUNT_DOC_FASCICOLATO_2
query.value: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM project_components WHERE LINK = @id_documento@ AND project_id = (SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE id_fascicolo = @id_fascicolo@ AND id_parent = id_fascicolo)

query.name: INSERT_DPA_RISCONTRI_CLASSIFICA
SELECT_DPA_RISCONTRI_CLASSIFICA
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_RISCONTRI_CLASSIFICA WHERE ID_CORR_GLOB = @idCorrGlob@

query.name: DELETE_DPA_RISCONTRI_CLASSIFICA
query.value: DELETE DPA_RISCONTRI_CLASSIFICA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: U_PROFILE_RIF_MIT
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET CHA_RIFF_MITT = '@riffMitt@', LAST_EDIT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWSNONVISTE_PRED_TODOLIST
query.value: select count(a.id_trasmissione) from ( SELECT DISTINCT id_trasmissione FROM dpa_todolist a, PROFILE b WHERE (a.id_profile > 0 OR a.id_project > 0) AND ( (a.id_people_dest = @idPeople@ AND a.id_ruolo_dest = @idGruppo@) OR (a.id_people_dest = @idPeople@ AND a.id_ruolo_dest = 0) ) AND a.id_profile = b.system_id AND b.cha_da_proto = 1 @filters@ UNION SELECT DISTINCT id_trasmissione FROM dpa_todolist a, PROFILE b WHERE (a.id_profile > 0 OR a.id_project > 0) AND ( (a.id_people_dest = @idPeople@ AND a.id_ruolo_dest = @idGruppo@) OR (a.id_people_dest = @idPeople@ AND a.id_ruolo_dest = 0) ) AND a.id_profile = b.system_id AND b.cha_da_proto = 1 AND ( a.id_trasm_utente IN (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_trasm_utente WHERE cha_accettata = '0') ) ) a

query.name: S_DOCTYPES_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR
query.value: SELECT B.SYSTEM_ID, B.DESCRIPTION, B.TYPE_ID, B.CHA_TIPO_CANALE FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR A, DOCUMENTTYPES B WHERE A.ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND A.ID_MITT_DEST = @idDestinatario@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPES = B.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_SEGN_AMMINISTRA
query.value: select COL_SEGN from DPA_AMMINISTRA a where a.SYSTEM_ID = @idAmm@

query.name: U_COL_SEGN_DPA_AMMINISTRA
query.value: update DPA_AMMINISTRA set COL_SEGN = @param1@ where system_id = @idAmm@

query.name: S_NUM_FOLDER_DOC
query.value: select count(*) from project_components where link=@idProfile@

query.name: S_PROTO_DEST
query.value: select VAR_PROTO_DEST from DPA_STATO_INVIO b where b.ID_CORR_GLOBALE=@idCorrDest@ and b.ID_PROFILE=@idProfile@

query.name: I_PROTO_TIT_NUM_DOC_IN_FASC
U_PROTO_TIT_NUM_DOC_IN_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_PROTO_TIT SET NUM_DOC_IN_FASC = @numDocInFasc@ WHERE ID_FASC = @idFasc@

query.name: S_PROTO_TIT_NUM_DOC_IN_FASC
query.value: SELECT NUM_DOC_IN_FASC FROM DPA_PROTO_TIT WHERE ID_FASC = @idFasc@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_PROTO_TIT.NUM_DOC_IN_FASC

query.name: SELECT_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE UPPER(A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA)=@codRubrica@ and ((A.ID_AMM IS NULL) OR (A.ID_AMM=@idAmm@))

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_DATI_UTENTI
query.value: SELECT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_CORR_GLOBALI, P.EMAIL_ADDRESS AS EMAIL_UTENTE, P.CHA_NOTIFICA, P.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO, P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_PEOPLE from people P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG where CG.ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@ and P.SYSTEM_ID=CG.ID_PEOPLE

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_UTENTI_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT c.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, a.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_CORR_GLOBALI, c.USER_ID AS CODICE_UTENTE, c.FULL_NAME AS DESCRIZIONE_UTENTE, c.EMAIL_ADDRESS AS EMAIL_UTENTE, c.CHA_NOTIFICA, c.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO, a.VAR_COGNOME FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLEGROUPS b, PEOPLE c WHERE a.id_people = b.people_system_id AND b.people_system_id = c.system_id AND c.disabled = 'N' AND a.dta_fine is NULL AND b.dta_fine is NULL AND a.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND @param1@ ORDER BY a.var_cognome

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_RUOLI_UO
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS ID, a.var_desc_corr AS DESCRIZIONE, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.CHA_RIFERIMENTO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.dta_fine is null AND a.id_uo=@param1@ ORDER BY DESCRIZIONE ASC

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_ALL_RAGIONI_TRASM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_TIPO_DEST, CHA_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_DOC, VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_FASC FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.CHA_VIS = '1' AND ID_AMM = @param1@ ORDER BY VAR_NOTE ASC

query.name: CHECK_ADMIN_USER_LOGIN_ON_SESSION_ID
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(SESSION_ID) = UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_FRIEND_APPLICATION
query.value: SELECT DPA_FRIEND_APPLICATION.COD_APPLICAZIONE, DPA_FRIEND_APPLICATION.COD_REGISTRO, DPA_EL_REGISTRI.ID_PEOPLE_FACTORY, DPA_EL_REGISTRI.ID_GRUPPO_FACTORY, DPA_EL_REGISTRI.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_REGISTRO FROM DPA_FRIEND_APPLICATION, DPA_EL_REGISTRI, PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(DPA_FRIEND_APPLICATION.COD_APPLICAZIONE) = UPPER('@friendApplication@') AND UPPER(DPA_FRIEND_APPLICATION.COD_REGISTRO) = UPPER('@codRegistro@') AND DPA_FRIEND_APPLICATION.ID_REGISTRO = DPA_EL_REGISTRI.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_EL_REGISTRI.ID_PEOPLE_FACTORY = PEOPLE.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(PEOPLE.FACTORY_USER) = UPPER('Y')

query.name: GET_NOMECOGNOMEUTENTE
query.value: SELECT VAR_NOME, VAR_COGNOME FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_id)=UPPER('@userId@') AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: GET_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI WHERE UPPER(COD_FUNZIONE)=UPPER('@codFunzione@') AND DISABLED = 'N'

query.name: S_GET_STATO_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT TU.CHA_VISTA AS VISTA, TU.CHA_ACCETTATA AS ACCETTATA, TU.CHA_RIFIUTATA AS RIFIUTATA, TU.CHA_IN_TODOLIST AS IN_TODOLIST FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU WHERE TU.SYSTEM_ID = @idTrasmissioneSingola@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__DOC_ARRIVO_PAR_NEW
query.value: SELECT a.*, b.cha_tipo_mitt_dest, d.system_id AS id_documenttypes, d.description, d.type_id, d.cha_tipo_canale, s.SYSTEM_ID as SYSTEM_ID_INVIO, s.VAR_CODICE_AOO as VAR_CODICE_AOO_INVIO, s.VAR_CODICE_AMM as VAR_CODICE_AMM_INVIO, s.DTA_SPEDIZIONE, s.VAR_PROTO_DEST, s.DTA_PROTO_DEST, s.ID_CORR_GLOBALE, s.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE, s.CHA_ANNULLATO, s.VAR_MOTIVO_ANNULLA, s.VAR_PROVVEDIMENTO, C.CHA_NOTIFICA, C.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO FROM dpa_corr_globali a, dpa_doc_arrivo_par b, PROFILE p, dpa_stato_invio s, documenttypes d, PEOPLE C WHERE p.cha_tipo_proto in ('P','I') AND p.system_id = b.id_profile AND a.system_id = b.id_mitt_dest AND d.system_id(+) = b.id_documenttypes AND p.system_id = @system_id@ AND s.id_corr_globale(+) = a.system_id AND s.id_profile(+) = @system_id@ AND C.SYSTEM_ID(+) = A.ID_PEOPLE ORDER BY b.system_id asc

query.name: S_ATTRIBUTI_TIPOFASC
query.value: select system_id, descrizione from dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc where system_id in (select id_ogg_custom from dpa_ogg_custom_comp_fasc where id_template=@id_template@)

query.name: S_TIPOOGGETTO_TIPOFASC
query.value: select tipo from dpa_tipo_oggetto_fasc where system_id in (select id_tipo_oggetto from dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc where system_id = @id_oggetto@)

query.name: S_GET_UO_IN_AOO_NO_REG
query.value: select dpa_corr_globali.var_cod_rubrica as CODICE, dpa_corr_globali.system_id as IDCORRGLOBALE, dpa_corr_globali.var_desc_corr as DESCRIZIONE from dpa_corr_globali, dpa_uo_reg where dpa_uo_reg.id_uo = dpa_corr_globali.system_id and dpa_corr_globali.cha_system_role != '1' order by var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr asc

query.name: S_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_BY_EMAIL
query.value: SELECT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.id_gruppo, a.id_people, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.var_codice_amm, a.var_codice_aoo FROM dpa_corr_globali a--, dpa_mail_corr_esterni m WHERE (UPPER(a.var_email) = UPPER('@email@') AND UPPER(a.CHA_TIPO_IE) = 'I') AND (id_amm = @idAmministrazione@ OR id_amm IS NULL) AND (id_registro IS NULL OR id_registro = @idRegistro@) AND dta_fine IS NULL union SELECT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.id_gruppo, a.id_people, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.var_codice_amm, a.var_codice_aoo FROM dpa_corr_globali a, dpa_mail_corr_esterni m where a.system_id = m.id_corr AND UPPER(m.var_email) = UPPER('@email@') AND (id_amm = @idAmministrazione@ OR id_amm IS NULL) AND (id_registro IS NULL OR id_registro = @idRegistro@ ) AND dta_fine IS NULL

query.name: S_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_BY_EMAIL2
query.value: SELECT a.system_id, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.id_gruppo, a.id_people, a.cha_tipo_ie FROM dpa_corr_globali a WHERE (UPPER(a.var_email) = UPPER('@email@') AND UPPER(a.CHA_TIPO_IE) = 'I' and a.cha_tipo_urp < > 'P' and a.cha_tipo_corr < > 'O') AND (id_amm = @idAmministrazione@ OR id_amm IS NULL) AND (id_registro IS NULL OR id_registro = @idRegistro@) AND dta_fine IS NULL union SELECT a.system_id, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.id_gruppo, a.id_people, a.cha_tipo_ie FROM dpa_corr_globali a, dpa_mail_corr_esterni m where a.system_id = m.id_corr AND UPPER(m.var_email) = UPPER('@email@') AND a.cha_tipo_corr < > 'O' AND (id_amm = @idAmministrazione@ OR id_amm IS NULL) AND (id_registro IS NULL OR id_registro = @idRegistro@) AND dta_fine IS NULL

query.name: GET_BASE_INFO_DOC
query.value: SELECT p.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, p.DOCNAME, p.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO, p.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, c.FILE_SIZE, c.PATH, c.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE, c.CHA_FIRMATO, v.VERSION_LABEL, v.VERSION, v.VERSION_ID, p.DOCNUMBER, p.SYSTEM_ID FROM profile p, components c, versions v WHERE p.DOCNUMBER = c.DOCNUMBER AND c.DOCNUMBER IN ( SELECT doc.DOCNUMBER FROM profile doc WHERE doc.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = @idProfile@ OR doc.DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@ ) AND c.VERSION_ID = v.VERSION_ID ORDER BY c.VERSION_ID ASC

query.name: PD_GET_RUOLI_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC
query.value: SELECT ID_RUOLO FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggCustom@ AND A.INS_MOD = 1 AND A.ID_RUOLO = B.ID_GRUPPO

query.name: PD_DELETE_ASS_RUOLO_OGGETTO_CUSTOM_FASC
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC WHERE ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_INSERT_ASS_RUOLO_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC
PD_GET_A_R_CAMPI_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC WHERE ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ and ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@

query.name: PD_DEL_A_R_CAMPI_DOC
query.value: DELETE DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_INS_A_R_CAMPI_DOC
PD_UPDATE_A_R_CAMPI_DOC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC SET INS_MOD = @insMod@, VIS = @vis@, DEL_REP = @delRep@ WHERE ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ and ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_GET_A_R_CAMPO_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@ and ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@

query.name: PD_GET_A_R_CAMPI_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC WHERE ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ and ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@

query.name: PD_DEL_A_R_CAMPI_FASC
query.value: DELETE DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_INS_A_R_CAMPI_FASC
PD_UPDATE_A_R_CAMPI_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC SET INS_MOD = @insMod@, VIS = @vis@ WHERE ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ and ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_GET_A_R_CAMPO_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@ and ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@

query.name: PD_GET_A_R_RUOLI_FROM_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_DOC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_GET_A_R_RUOLI_FROM_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_A_R_OGG_CUSTOM_FASC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ and ID_OGGETTO_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: S_ISCORRISPONDENTEINTERNO
query.value: SELECT iscorrispondenteinterno(@idcorrglobali@,@idregistro@) as risultato FROM DUAL

query.name: S_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_COUNT_NAME
query.value: select count(*) from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE where upper(VAR_DESCRIZIONE) = '@param1@' and (id_people = @idPeople@ or id_gruppo = @idGruppo@) and var_pagina_ric = '@pagina@'

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_RF_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: DELETE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_RF = @idRF@

query.name: S_DPA_ELENCO_NOTE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ELENCO_NOTE @param1@ order by id_reg_rf, var_desc_nota

query.name: S_GET_NOTA_DA_ELENCO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_REG_RF, COD_REG_RF, VAR_DESC_NOTA FROM DPA_ELENCO_NOTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id@

query.name: I_DPA_ELENCO_NOTE
U_DPA_ELENCO_NOTE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ELENCO_NOTE SET ID_REG_RF = @idRegRf@, VAR_DESC_NOTA = '@varDescNota@', COD_REG_RF = '@codRegRf@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @system_id@

query.name: D_DPA_ELENCO_NOTE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ELENCO_NOTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idNota@

query.name: S_COUNT_DPA_ELENCO_NOTE
S_NOTA_PRESENTE_IN_ELENCO
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM DPA_ELENCO_NOTE where ID_REG_RF = @idRegRf@ and VAR_DESC_NOTA = '@desc@' and COD_REG_RF = '@codRegRf@'

query.name: S_SYSTEM_ID_DPA_EL_REGISTRI
query.value: select system_id from dpa_el_registri where upper(var_codice) = '@var_codice@'

query.name: S_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI

query.name: S_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI_ASS
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASS_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI ALD INNER JOIN DPA_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI LD ON ALD.ID_LETTERADOC = LD.SYSTEM_ID WHERE ID_AMM = '@idAmministrazione@' ORDER BY ID_LETTERADOC

query.name: S_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI_AMMIN
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASS_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI WHERE ID_AMM = '@idAmministrazione@' ORDER BY ID_LETTERADOC

query.name: UPDATE_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI_AMMIN
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ASS_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI SET DESCRIZIONE='@descrizione@', etichetta = '@etichetta@' WHERE ID_LETTERADOC='@letteradoc@' AND ID_AMM='@idAmministrazione@'

query.name: INSERT_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI_AMMIN
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_ASS_LETTERE_DOCUMENTI VALUES('@idAmministrazione@','@letteradoc@','@descrizione@','@etichetta@')

query.name: ESTRAZIONE_IDPEOPLEGROUP
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_URP, NVL(id_gruppo,id_people)AS idPeopleGroup FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idCorr@

query.name: S_DOC_IN_ADL
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_AREA_LAVORO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idDoc@ AND ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_AUTORIZZATI
query.value: select * from dpa_modelli_trasm mod where mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '1' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and not exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm) @paramautorizzato@ ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_AUTORIZZATI_1
query.value: select mod.* from dpa_modelli_trasm mod, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest mittDest where mod.system_id = mittDest.id_modello and (mod.id_people = @idPeople@ or mod.id_people is null) and ( mittDest.id_corr_globali =0 or mittDest.id_corr_globali = @idCorrGlobali@) and mittDest.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST = 'M' and mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '0' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and not exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm) @paramautorizzato@ ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_AUTORIZZATI_2
query.value: select * from dpa_modelli_trasm mod where mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '1' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm and @tipoAssDiagramma@ @paramautorizzato@ @condizione@ ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_AUTORIZZATI_3
query.value: select mod.* from dpa_modelli_trasm mod, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest mittDest where mod.system_id = mittDest.id_modello and (mod.id_people = @idPeople@ or mittDest.id_corr_globali = @idCorrGlobali@) and mittDest.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST = 'M' and mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '0' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm and @tipoAssDiagramma@ @paramautorizzato@ @condizione@ ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: U_DPACorrGlobaliStor
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET dta_fine = @param1@, var_cod_rubrica = @param2@, var_codice = @param3@, id_parent = NULL WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param4@

query.name: U_DPACorrGlobaliReset
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET var_insert_by_interop = @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: U_DPACorrGlobaliResetCodRubrica
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET var_cod_rubrica = '@param1@', var_codice = '@param1@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: D_CLEAR_NOTE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTE N WHERE N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO = @idOggetto@ AND N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO = '@tipoOggetto@'

query.name: S_J_PROFILESTAMPAREG__DPA_OGGETTARIO4
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT @param1@ FROM PROFILE A,DPA_STAMPAREGISTRI R @param2@ WHERE @param3@

query.name: S_J_PROFILESTAMPAREG__SECURITY__OGGETTARIO2
PD_IS_IN_USE_CAMPO_COMUNE_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES WHERE ID_TEMPLATE < > @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGGETTO = @idOggetto@ AND DOC_NUMBER IS NULL

query.name: PD_GET_CAMPI_COMUNI_DOC
query.value: SELECT DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM WHERE DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER IS NULL AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_COMUNE = 1

query.name: PD_DELETE_CAMPI_COMUNI_DOC
query.value: DELETE DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGGETTO = @idOggettoCustom@ AND DOC_NUMBER IS NULL

query.name: PD_UPDATE_DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP
query.value: UPDATE DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP SET POSIZIONE = @posizione@ WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGG_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_CAMPI_COMUNI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP WHERE DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER IS NULL AND ID_OGGETTO IN ( SELECT DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO, DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES WHERE ( (ID_AMM = @idAmm@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) AND (In_Esercizio <> 'NO' OR In_Esercizio IS NULL) AND (Abilitato_SI_NO <> 0 OR Abilitato_SI_NO IS NULL) AND DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.ID_TIPO_DOC AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND DPA_VIS_TIPO_DOC.DIRITTI IN (1,2) ) AND DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER IS NULL AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID ) ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATE_DOC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO) AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_ATTO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE AS SYSTEM_ID_TEMPLATE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_OGGETTO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.VAR_DESC_ATTO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.ABILITATO_SI_NO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.IN_ESERCIZIO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.EXT_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.EXT_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_SU, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_EXC, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_ALL_1, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.GG_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.CHA_PRIVATO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.ID_AMM, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.COD_CLASS, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.COD_MOD_TRASM, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.IPERDOCUMENTO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_XSD_ASSOCIATO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.IS_TYPE_INSTANCE, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.CHA_INVIO_CONSERVAZIONE, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.CHA_ASSOC_MANUALE, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.ID_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE, ( SELECT VALORE_OGGETTO_DB FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES DPA_TD, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TD.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TD.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS VALORE_OGGETTO_DB, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.CODICE_DB, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.MANUAL_INSERT, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ANNO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_AOO_RF, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.VALORE_SC, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ANNO_ACC, ( SELECT DTA_INS FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES DPA_TD, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TD.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TD.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_INS, ( SELECT DTA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES DPA_TD, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TD.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TD.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_ANNULLAMENTO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_DI_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_OBBLIGATORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.DESCRIZIONE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.MULTILINEA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.NUMERO_DI_CARATTERI, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.NUMERO_DI_LINEE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.ORIZZONTALE_VERTICALE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.RESET_ANNO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.FORMATO_CONTATORE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.RICERCA_CORR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.ID_R_DEFAULT, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_COMUNE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CHA_TIPO_TAR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CONTA_DOPO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.REPERTORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.FORMATO_ORA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.TIPO_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.TIPO_OBJ_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.MODULO_SOTTOCONTATORE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CHA_CONSOLIDAMENTO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CHA_CONSERVAZIONE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CHA_CONS_REPERTORIO, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.CAMPO_XML_ASSOC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.OPZIONI_XML_ASSOC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO.DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE_TIPO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO WHERE DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE @docNumber@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATE_FASC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO) AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM, DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE AS SYSTEM_ID_TEMPLATE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_OGGETTO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC, DPA_TIPO_FASC.ABILITATO_SI_NO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IN_ESERCIZIO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.PATH_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_FASC.PATH_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.CHA_PRIVATO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.ID_AMM, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IPERFASCICOLO, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT, ( SELECT VALORE_OGGETTO_DB FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC DPA_TF, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TF.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TF.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS VALORE_OGGETTO_DB, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.CODICE_DB, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.MANUAL_INSERT, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ANNO, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_AOO_RF, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ANNO_ACC, ( SELECT DTA_INS FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC DPA_TF, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TF.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TF.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_INS, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_DI_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_OBBLIGATORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.DESCRIZIONE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.MULTILINEA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.NUMERO_DI_CARATTERI, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.NUMERO_DI_LINEE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ORIZZONTALE_VERTICALE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.RESET_ANNO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.FORMATO_CONTATORE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.RICERCA_CORR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_R_DEFAULT, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_COMUNE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CHA_TIPO_TAR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CONTA_DOPO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.REPERTORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.FORMATO_ORA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.TIPO_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.TIPO_OBJ_LINK, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE_TIPO FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC WHERE DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE @idProject@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE

query.name: S_CAMPI_COMUNI_DOC_FASC
query.value: SELECT Y.* FROM ( SELECT X.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY X.DTA_ORDER DESC) AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ AS TIPO, A.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_SEGNATURA, TO_CHAR( A.DTA_CREAZIONE,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_CREAZIONE, A.DTA_CREAZIONE AS DTA_ORDER FROM project a WHERE EXISTS (select 'x' from security e where a.system_id=e.thing and e.PERSONORGROUP in ( @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) and e.ACCESSRIGHTS>0) AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@ ) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' @condIdRegistri@ @condIdTitolari@ @condProfilazioneFascicoli@ UNION SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO AS TIPO, NVL(A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.DOCNUMBER) AS CODICE_SEGNATURA, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_CREAZIONE, A.CREATION_TIME AS DTA_ORDER FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id WHERE (checkSecurityDocumento(A.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGruppo@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'D') > 0) AND ( ( cha_tipo_proto in ('A','P','I') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='1' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('G') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NOT NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('G') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('P') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('A') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('I') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) ) AND NVL(A.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' @condIdRegistri@ AND (NVL(A.DTA_PROTO,A.CREATION_TIME) BETWEEN to_date('@startDateDoc@','dd/mm/yyyy') AND to_date('@endDateDoc@','dd/mm/yyyy') ) @condProfilazioneDocumenti@ ) X ) Y WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_COUNT_CAMPI_COMUNI_DOC_FASC
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ AS TIPO, A.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_SEGNATURA, TO_CHAR( A.DTA_CREAZIONE,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_CREAZIONE, A.DTA_CREAZIONE AS DTA_ORDER FROM project a WHERE EXISTS (select 'x' from security e where a.system_id=e.thing and e.PERSONORGROUP in ( @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) and e.ACCESSRIGHTS>0) AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@ ) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' @condIdRegistri@ @condIdTitolari@ @condProfilazioneFascicoli@ UNION SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO AS TIPO, NVL(A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.DOCNUMBER) AS CODICE_SEGNATURA, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA_CREAZIONE, A.CREATION_TIME AS DTA_ORDER FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id WHERE (checkSecurityDocumento(A.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGruppo@, @idRuoloPubblico@,'D') > 0) AND ( ( cha_tipo_proto in ('A','P','I') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='1' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('G') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NOT NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('G') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('P') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('A') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto in ('I') AND CHA_DA_PROTO='0' AND ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL ) ) AND NVL(A.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' @condIdRegistri@ AND (NVL(A.DTA_PROTO,A.CREATION_TIME) BETWEEN to_date('@startDateDoc@','dd/mm/yyyy') AND to_date('@endDateDoc@','dd/mm/yyyy') ) @condProfilazioneDocumenti@ ) ALIAS_TABLE

query.name: S_GET_CONTROLLATO_FOLDER
