query.value: SELECT (corrcat(p.docnumber,p.CHA_TIPO_PROTO)) as corr FROM PROFILE p, dpa_tipo_atto, security s, dpa_associazione_templates, dpa_oggetti_custom WHERE s.thing=p.system_id and p.id_tipo_atto = dpa_tipo_atto.system_id AND UPPER(dpa_tipo_atto.var_desc_atto) = UPPER('CONTROLLO PREVENTIVO SRC') and s.personorgroup IN (@ufficio@) and s.ACCESSRIGHTS = '255' and s.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO='P' @filterCond@

query.name: CDC_PAROLE_CHIAVE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_PAROLE WHERE UPPER(VAR_DESC_PAROLA) LIKE UPPER('%@WORD@%') AND (ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR ID_REGISTRO = '@ID_REG@')

query.name: S_RF_CODE_DESCRIPTION_AND_INFO
query.value: SELECT var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr, var_indirizzo, var_citta, var_cap, var_nazione, var_provincia, var_telefono, var_telefono2, var_fax, var_note, var_cod_fisc, var_cod_pi, corrGlob.id_amm, GetCodReg(registri.id_aoo_collegata) as AOO FROM dpa_el_registri registri Inner Join dpa_corr_globali corrGlob On registri.system_id = corrGlob.id_rf LEFT OUTER JOIN dpa_dett_globali dettGlob ON corrglob.system_id = dettglob.id_corr_globali WHERE corrGlob.id_rf = @idRf@ and corrGlob.dta_fine is null

query.name: S_GET_RF_CORR_GLOB_ID_FROM_ID_RF
query.value: Select system_id From dpa_corr_globali Where dta_fine is null And id_rf = @idRf@

query.name: S_VERIFY_POLICY_STAMPE
query.value: SELECT f.system_id FROM PROFILE f WHERE getchaimg (f.docnumber) != '0' AND f.system_id IN (SELECT a.system_id FROM PROFILE a,@tableFrom@ WHERE a.docnumber = r.docnumber AND a.cha_tipo_proto ='@tipoStampa@' @filtri@) AND f.system_id = @idProfile@

query.name: S_GET_STAMPE_WITH_POLICY
query.value: SELECT /*+INDEX(a)*/ distinct(a.system_id), a.docnumber from profile a, @from@ where getchaimg (a.docnumber)!='0' and getIdAmm(a.author) = @idAmm@ AND a.docnumber = r.docnumber AND a.cha_tipo_proto ='@tipoStampa@' AND a.system_id not in (select n.ID_PROFILE from DPA_DETT_POLICY_ESECUZIONE n where n.id_profile = a.system_id and n.ID_POLICY=@idPolicy@ AND n.ESITO =1) @filtri@ order by a.system_id asc

query.name: S_GET_DOCNUMBER_BY_VALORE_CAMPO_PROFILATO
query.value: select at.Doc_Number from profile p inner join DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES at on p.docnumber = at.doc_number inner join DPA_TIPO_ATTO ta on at.ID_TEMPLATE = ta.SYSTEM_ID inner join DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM oc on at.ID_OGGETTO = oc.SYSTEM_ID where p.CHA_IN_CESTINO is null AND upper(ta.VAR_DESC_ATTO) = upper('@descrizioneTipoAtto@') @filtroCampiProfilati@ order by at.Doc_Number desc

query.name: S_GET_DOCNUMBER_BY_VALORE_CAMPO_PROFILATO_E_STATO
query.value: select at.Doc_Number from PROFILE P inner join DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES at on p.docnumber = at.doc_number inner join DPA_TIPO_ATTO ta on at.ID_TEMPLATE = ta.SYSTEM_ID inner join DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM oc on at.ID_OGGETTO = oc.SYSTEM_ID inner join DPA_DIAGRAMMI d on d.doc_number = at.doc_number inner join DPA_STATI s on d.Id_stato = s.SYSTEM_ID where p.CHA_IN_CESTINO is null AND upper(ta.VAR_DESC_ATTO) = upper('@descrizioneTipoAtto@') AND upper(s.var_descrizione) = upper('@descrizioneStato@') @filtroCampiProfilati@ order by at.Doc_Number desc

query.name: S_GET_DOCNUMBER_BY_VALORE_CAMPO_PROFILATO_E_STATO_DIVERSO_DA
query.value: select at.Doc_Number from PROFILE p inner join DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES at on p.docnumber = at.doc_number inner join DPA_TIPO_ATTO ta on at.ID_TEMPLATE = ta.SYSTEM_ID inner join DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM oc on at.ID_OGGETTO = oc.SYSTEM_ID inner join DPA_DIAGRAMMI d on d.doc_number = at.doc_number inner join DPA_STATI s on d.Id_stato = s.SYSTEM_ID where p.CHA_IN_CESTINO is null AND upper(ta.VAR_DESC_ATTO) = upper('@descrizioneTipoAtto@') AND upper(s.var_descrizione) != upper('@descrizioneStato@') @filtroCampiProfilati@ order by at.Doc_Number desc

query.name: S_DOCUMENT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_FROM_CODE
query.value: Select Description, Type_Id, System_id From DocumentTypes Where type_id = '@param1@'

query.name: S_ROLE_WITH_FUNCTION
query.value: Select id_ruolo_in_uo From dpa_l_ruolo_reg Where id_registro = @registryId@ And id_ruolo_in_uo In ( Select id_ruolo_in_uo From dpa_tipo_f_ruolo Where id_tipo_funz In (Select id_tipo_funzione From dpa_funzioni Where cod_funzione = '@functionName@' ) )

query.name: U_SET_RECEIVED_PROOF_DATA
query.value: Update dpa_stato_invio Set var_proto_dest = '@receiverProtoRec@', dta_proto_dest = to_date('@receiverProtoDate@', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), status_c_mask ='VNVVANN', CHA_ANNULLATO = NULL, VAR_MOTIVO_ANNULLA = NULL Where system_id in ( Select si.system_id From profile p Inner Join dpa_stato_invio si On p.system_id = si.id_profile Where p.num_proto = @senderRecordNumber@ And p.dta_proto = to_date('@senderProtoDate@', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') And p.id_registro = (Select system_id From dpa_el_registri Where var_codice = '@senderAooCode@' And id_amm = (Select system_id From dpa_amministra Where var_codice_amm = '@senderAdmCode@')) And UPPER(var_codice_amm) = UPPER('@receiverAdmCode@') And UPPER(var_codice_aoo) = UPPER('@receiverAooCode@') And UPPER(var_indirizzo) = UPPER('@receiverUrl@') And si.id_corr_globale In (@receiverCode@) )

query.name: S_LOAD_INFO_FOR_DELIVERED_PROOF
query.value: Select p.system_id, p.author, p.id_ruolo_creatore From profile p Where system_id = @documentId@

query.name: U_SET_DROPPED_PROOF_DATA
query.value: Update dpa_stato_invio Set cha_annullato = '@value@', var_motivo_annulla = '@reason@', status_c_mask='@statusmask@' Where system_id In (Select si.system_id From profile p Inner Join dpa_stato_invio si On p.system_id = si.id_profile Where p.num_proto = @senderRecordNumber@ And p.dta_proto = to_date('@senderProtoDate@', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') And p.id_registro = (Select system_id From dpa_el_registri Where var_codice = '@senderAooCode@' And id_amm = (Select system_id From dpa_amministra Where var_codice_amm = '@senderAdmCode@' ) ) And UPPER(var_codice_amm) = UPPER('@receiverAdmCode@') And UPPER(var_codice_aoo) = UPPER('@receiverAooCode@') And UPPER(var_indirizzo) = UPPER('@receiverUrl@') And si.id_corr_globale In (@receiverCode@) )

query.name: AMM_U_MAIL_FOR_REGISTRO_MAIL
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET VAR_EMAIL = '@VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO@' WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' and CHA_TIPO_IE ='I' and VAR_CODICE_AOO = '@VAR_CODICE@'

query.name: S_DPA_RUOLO_BY_CODICE
query.value: SELECT CG.SYSTEM_ID, CG.ID_REGISTRO, CG.ID_AMM, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR, CG.ID_OLD, CG.DTA_FINE, CG.VAR_CODICE, CG.ID_GRUPPO, CG.CHA_TIPO_CORR, CG.CHA_TIPO_IE, CG.CHA_TIPO_URP, CG.VAR_CODICE_AOO, CG.VAR_CODICE_AMM, CG.VAR_CODICE_ISTAT, CG.VAR_EMAIL, CG.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE UPPER(CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = UPPER('@codice@') AND CG.CHA_TIPO_URP='R'

query.name: S_LOAD_DOCUMENT_ID_FROM_PROTO_INFO
query.value: Select profile.system_id From profile Where dta_proto = to_date('@protoDate@', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') And num_proto = @numProto@ And id_registro = ( Select system_id From dpa_el_registri Where var_codice = '@regCode@' And id_amm = ( Select system_id From dpa_amministra Where var_codice_amm = '@ammCode@'))

query.name: S_LOAD_DOCUMENT_INFO_FROM_PROTO_INFO
query.value: Select @attribute@ From profile Where dta_proto = to_date('@protoDate@', 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') And num_proto = @numProto@ And id_registro = ( Select system_id From dpa_el_registri Where var_codice = '@regCode@' And id_amm = ( Select system_id From dpa_amministra Where var_codice_amm = '@ammCode@'))

query.name: S_GET_SENDER_INFO_FROM_UO_ID
query.value: Select (Select var_codice_amm From dpa_amministra Where system_id = (Select id_amm From dpa_el_registri Where system_id = InteropRegistryId)) || '-' || nvl((Select var_codice From dpa_el_registri Where system_id = InteropRfId), var_cod_rubrica) From dpa_corr_globali Where system_id = @uoId@

query.name: R_COPIA_VISIBILITA
query.value: SELECT ts_copy dta_azione, Getdocnameorcodfasc(thing) id_segn_codice, getcodruolo (id_ruolo_orig) codice_orig, getdescruolo (id_ruolo_orig) descrizione_orig, getcodruolo (id_ruolo_dest) codice_dest, getdescruolo (id_ruolo_dest) descrizione_dest, (CASE accessrights WHEN 63 then 'Scrittura' WHEN 45 then 'Lettura' WHEN 255 THEN 'Propriet' WHEN 0 THEN 'Propriet' WHEN 20 then 'In attesa di accettazione' END ) diritto, var_note_sec motivo FROM DPA_COPY_LOG

query.name: S_RUOLI_CON_VISIBILITA_SU_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select groups.system_id from security Inner Join Groups On security.personorgroup = groups.system_id where thing = @idProfile@

query.name: S_GET_LIST_UO_BY_QUALIFICHE_UTENTE
query.value: select distinct cgUO.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, cgUO.VAR_CODICE as CODICE, cgUO.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE, cgUO.CLASSIFICA_UO as CLASSIFICA_UO, cgUO.NUM_LIVELLO as LIVELLO from dpa_corr_globali cgUO inner join DPA_PEOPLEGROUPS_QUALIFICHE pgq on cgUO.SYSTEM_ID = pgq.ID_UO inner join DPA_QUALIFICHE q on pgq.ID_QUALIFICA = q.SYSTEM_ID where cgUO.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' and cgUO.DTA_FINE is null and q.CHA_COD in (@qualifiche@) order by cgUO.NUM_LIVELLO asc

query.name: S_GET_UTENTI_RESPONSABILI_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: SELECT p.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, p.USER_ID AS USER_ID, p.VAR_COGNOME AS COGNOME, p.VAR_NOME AS NOME, p.FULL_NAME AS NOME_COMPLETO, p.MATRICOLA AS MATRICOLA, cgu.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_UO, CGU.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_UO, CGU.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_UO FROM PEOPLE p inner join PEOPLEGROUPS pg on P.SYSTEM_ID = pg.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID inner join DPA_CORR_GLOBALI cgR on pg.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = cgr.ID_GRUPPO inner join DPA_CORR_GLOBALI cgU on cgR.ID_UO = cgU.SYSTEM_ID WHERE p.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND pg.DTA_FINE is null AND cgR.CHA_RESPONSABILE ='1' AND cgR.DTA_FINE IS NULL ORDER BY P.FULL_NAME ASC

query.name: S_GET_LIST_UO_UTENTE
query.value: select ID_UO from dpa_corr_globali cgR inner join PEOPLEGROUPS pg on cgR.ID_GRUPPO = pg.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID where pg.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @idPeople@ and pg.DTA_FINE is null

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATE_DOC_BY_DESC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO) AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_ATTO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE AS SYSTEM_ID_TEMPLATE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_OGGETTO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.VAR_DESC_ATTO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.ABILITATO_SI_NO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.IN_ESERCIZIO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.EXT_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.EXT_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_SU, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_MOD_EXC, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_ALL_1, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.GG_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.CHA_PRIVATO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.ID_AMM, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.COD_CLASS, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.COD_MOD_TRASM, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.IPERDOCUMENTO, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.PATH_XSD_ASSOCIATO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER, DPA_TIPO_ATTO.CHA_ASSOC_MANUALE, ( SELECT VALORE_OGGETTO_DB FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES DPA_TD, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TD.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TD.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS VALORE_OGGETTO_DB, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.CODICE_DB, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.MANUAL_INSERT, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ANNO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_AOO_RF, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.VALORE_SC, ( SELECT DTA_INS FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES DPA_TD, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TD.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TD.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_INS, ( SELECT DTA_ANNULLAMENTO FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES DPA_TD, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TD.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TD.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_ANNULLAMENTO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_DI_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_OBBLIGATORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.DESCRIZIONE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.MULTILINEA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.NUMERO_DI_CARATTERI, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.NUMERO_DI_LINEE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.ORIZZONTALE_VERTICALE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.RESET_ANNO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.FORMATO_CONTATORE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.RICERCA_CORR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.ID_R_DEFAULT, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CAMPO_COMUNE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CHA_TIPO_TAR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.CONTA_DOPO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.REPERTORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.FORMATO_ORA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.TIPO_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.TIPO_OBJ_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.MODULO_SOTTOCONTATORE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.CAMPO_XML_ASSOC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.OPZIONI_XML_ASSOC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO.DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE_TIPO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO WHERE UPPER(DPA_TIPO_ATTO.VAR_DESC_ATTO) = UPPER('@descrizioneTemplate@') AND DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE @docNumber@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_GET_DPA_TEMPLATE_2_BY_DESC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE VAR_DESC_ATTO = '@descrizioneTemplate@'

query.name: CDC_COUNT_TIPO_OGG_FROM_TIPOLOGIA_FASC
query.VALUE: Select count(*) From DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC Where upper(DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.Tipo) = '@oggetto@' And DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID And DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM And DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID And DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = @tipologia@

query.name: S_ACTUAL_CORR_CODE_BY_CODE
query.value: Select var_cod_rubrica From dpa_corr_globali Where dta_fine Is Null Connect By Prior system_id = id_old Start With var_cod_rubrica = '@corrCode@'

query.name: S_CORR_IDS_BY_ID
query.value: Select system_id From dpa_corr_globali cg Connect By Prior cg.id_old = cg.system_id Start With var_cod_rubrica = @corrCode@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_PEOPLE_CON_QUALIFICA
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_UTENTE, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, p.VAR_COGNOME AS COGNOME, p.VAR_NOME AS NOME, P.FULL_NAME AS NOME_COMPLETO, P.MATRICOLA AS MATRICOLA, PQ.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_PEOPLEGROUPS FROM PEOPLE P INNER JOIN DPA_PEOPLEGROUPS_QUALIFICHE PQ ON P.SYSTEM_ID = PQ.ID_PEOPLE INNER JOIN DPA_QUALIFICHE Q ON PQ.ID_QUALIFICA = Q.SYSTEM_ID WHERE P.DISABLED = 'N' AND Q.CHA_COD = '@codiceQualifica@' @customParams@ ORDER BY P.FULL_NAME ASC

query.name: S_GET_FASCICOLI_DA_CODICE_CONSEC
query.value: select p.system_id, p.var_codice, getdesctitolario (p.id_titolario) AS cod_titolario, p.description, p.ID_TITOLARIO from project p where var_codice = '@codFasc@' and p.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ and EXISTS (select 'x' from security e where p.system_id=e.thing and e.PERSONORGROUP in ( @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) and e.ACCESSRIGHTS>0) @altro@ order by p.VAR_COD_LIV1 asc

query.name: S_VERIFICA_GESTIONE_CHIAVI
query.value: select abilitato_chiavi_config from people where system_id = @idPeople@

query.name: S_GET_REGISTRO_BY_CODICE
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE @param2@

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATE_FASC_BY_DESC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO) AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM, DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE AS SYSTEM_ID_TEMPLATE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_OGGETTO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC, DPA_TIPO_FASC.ABILITATO_SI_NO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IN_ESERCIZIO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.PATH_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_FASC.PATH_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.CHA_PRIVATO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.ID_AMM, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IPERFASCICOLO, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT, ( SELECT VALORE_OGGETTO_DB FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC DPA_TF, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TF.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TF.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS VALORE_OGGETTO_DB, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.CODICE_DB, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.MANUAL_INSERT, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ANNO, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_AOO_RF, ( SELECT DTA_INS FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC DPA_TF, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TF.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TF.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_INS, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_DI_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_OBBLIGATORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.DESCRIZIONE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.MULTILINEA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.NUMERO_DI_CARATTERI, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.NUMERO_DI_LINEE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ORIZZONTALE_VERTICALE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.RESET_ANNO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.FORMATO_CONTATORE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.RICERCA_CORR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_R_DEFAULT, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_COMUNE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CHA_TIPO_TAR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CONTA_DOPO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.REPERTORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.FORMATO_ORA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.TIPO_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.TIPO_OBJ_LINK, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE_TIPO FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC WHERE DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC = '@descrizione@' AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE @idProject@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_GET_DPA_TEMPLATE_2_FASC_BY_DESC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC WHERE VAR_DESC_FASC = '@descrizione@'

query.name: S_People_PIS
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID, P.USER_ID, P.ID_AMM, P.VAR_COGNOME, P.VAR_NOME, P.VAR_TELEFONO, P.EMAIL_ADDRESS, P.FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS, P.CHA_NOTIFICA, P.CHA_AMMINISTRATORE,P.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO,P.VAR_SEDE,P.MATRICOLA FROM PEOPLE P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)='@userName@' and UPPER(A.VAR_CODICE_AMM)='@codiceAmm@' and P.ID_AMM=A.SYSTEM_ID AND NOT(P.DISABLED='Y')

query.name: S_DPADETTGLOBALIBYID
query.value: select d.VAR_INDIRIZZO,d.VAR_CAP,d.VAR_PROVINCIA,d.VAR_NAZIONE,d.VAR_COD_FISC,d.VAR_TELEFONO,d.VAR_FAX,d.VAR_NOTE,d.VAR_CITTA, d.VAR_COD_PI, d.VAR_LOCALITA from dpa_dett_globali d where d.ID_CORR_GLOBALI=@idCorr@

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_UTENTI_CON_NOTIFICA_SOLO_NOTIFICA
query.value: select p.system_id as ID, p.user_id as CODICE, p.FULL_NAME as UTENTE, cg.VAR_DESC_CORR as RUOLO, getflagnotifica(@id_mod_mitt_dest@,p.system_id) as FLAG_NOTIFICA, p.var_cognome from people p, peoplegroups pg, dpa_corr_globali cg where cg.system_id = @id_corr_glob_ruolo@ and cg.id_gruppo = pg.groups_system_id and pg.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = p.system_id and pg.DTA_FINE is null and getflagnotifica(@id_mod_mitt_dest@,p.system_id)=1 order by p.var_cognome asc

query.name: S_GET_CONTATORI_DOCUMENTI_PER_TIPOLOGIA
query.value: SELECT TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS DESCRIZIONE, CASE WHEN T1.TOTALE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE T1.TOTALE END AS TOTALE FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS DESCRIZIONE, COUNT(*) AS TOTALE FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA INNER JOIN PROFILE P ON TA.SYSTEM_ID = P.ID_TIPO_ATTO INNER JOIN PEOPLE PL ON P.AUTHOR = PL.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN PEOPLEGROUPS PG ON PL.SYSTEM_ID = PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CGR ON PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = CGR.ID_GRUPPO INNER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CGUO ON CGR.ID_UO = CGUO.SYSTEM_ID WHERE CGR.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CGUO.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CGUO.SYSTEM_ID = @idUO@ AND P.CREATION_DATE BETWEEN @dataInizio@ AND @dataFine@ GROUP BY TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO ) T1 ON TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO = T1.DESCRIZIONE WHERE TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO IN (@descrizioneTipiDocumento@) ORDER BY TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO ASC

query.name: S_GET_DATI_SEGNATURA_TIMBRO
query.value: select a.VAR_SEGNATURA, GetCodReg(a.ID_REGISTRO) as COD_REG, GETcodUO(a.ID_UO_CREATORE) as UO_CREATORE, d.VAR_CODICE_AMM, a.NUM_ANNO_PROTO as ANNO, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'hh:mm:ss') AS ORA_PROTO, a.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, a.NUM_PROTO, CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(a.DOCNUMBER) as allegati, classcat(a.SYSTEM_ID) cod_fasc, a.DOCNUMBER, Getcodicerfbyprofileid(a.system_id) as COD_RF from profile a, dpa_amministra d where a.system_id=@system_id@ and d.SYSTEM_ID = Getidamm(a.ID_PEOPLE_PROT)

query.name: S_GET_INFO_DOCUMENT
query.value: select a.NUM_PROTO, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, TO_CHAR (a.CREATION_DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE from profile a where a.system_id=@system_id@

query.name: S_GET_GERARCHIA_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT getgerarchia(A.Id_Amm,A.Var_Cod_Rubrica,a.CHA_TIPO_IE,D.System_Id) As Gerarchia FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE b, PEOPLEGROUPS c, GROUPS d WHERE a.id_people = b.system_id AND b.system_id = c.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND c.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = d.system_id AND a.cha_tipo_ie = '@tipo@' AND a.id_amm = @idAmm@ AND a.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND UPPER(b.user_id) = UPPER('@codice@')

query.name: S_DPA_UTENTE_APPLICAZIONI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_CODE,DESCRIPTION FROM DPA_EXT_APPS, DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS WHERE DPA_EXT_APPS.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS.ID_EXT_APP AND DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS.ID_PEOPLE = @idUtente@

query.name: S_DPA_APPLICAZIONI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_CODE,DESCRIPTION FROM DPA_EXT_APPS

query.name: I_DPA_APPLICAZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_EXT_APPS (@paramA@ VAR_CODE,DESCRIPTION) VALUES (@paramB@ '@param1@','@param2@')

query.name: U_DPA_APPLICAZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_EXT_APPS SET VAR_CODE = '@param1@', DESCRIPTION = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: D_DPA_APPLICAZIONE
query.value: DELETE DPA_EXT_APPS WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: I_DPA_REL_APP_UTENTE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS (ID_PEOPLE,ID_EXT_APP) VALUES (@param1@,@param2@)

query.name: I_DPA_REL_APP_UTENTI
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS (ID_EXT_APP,ID_PEOPLE) SELECT (@param1@, SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN (@param2@))

query.name: D_DPA_REL_APP_UTENTE
query.value: DELETE DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS WHERE ID_EXT_APP = @param1@

query.name: I_EXTEND_VISIBILITY
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY ( THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS, TS_INSERIMENTO, VAR_NOTE_SEC ) (SELECT @documentId@, cg4.id_gruppo, 63, NULL, 'A', NULL, to_timestamp(sysdate), NULL FROM dpa_corr_globali cg4 INNER JOIN dpa_tipo_ruolo ON cg4.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id WHERE Exists (SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_corr_globali cg3 WHERE cg3.dta_fine IS NULL and cg4.id_uo = cg3.system_id CONNECT BY PRIOR cg3.id_parent = cg3.system_id START WITH cg3.system_id = (SELECT cg2.id_uo FROM dpa_corr_globali cg2 WHERE cg2.id_gruppo = @roleId@ ) ) AND cg4.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND cg4.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND cg4.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello < (SELECT dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello FROM dpa_corr_globali cg1 INNER JOIN dpa_tipo_ruolo ON cg1.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id WHERE cg1.id_gruppo = @roleId@ ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM security WHERE thing = @documentId@ AND personorgroup = cg4.id_gruppo ) )

query.name: V_PROTO_PREGRESSI
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(NUM_PROTO) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND TO_CHAR(DTA_PROTO,'YYYY') = '@param3@' AND NUM_PROTO @param2@ UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL @param2@ AND ESITO IS NULL

query.name: S_UTE_RUOL_BY_COD
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_PEOPLE, G.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_RUOLO FROM PEOPLE P, GROUPS G, PEOPLEGROUPS PG WHERE UPPER(P.USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') AND UPPER(G.GROUP_ID) = UPPER('@param2@') AND PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = G.SYSTEM_ID AND PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = P.SYSTEM_ID AND P.ID_AMM = @param3@

query.name: S_GET_REPORT_PREGRESSO_BY_SYSTEMID
query.value: select p.SYSTEM_ID, p.ID_AMM, p.ID_UTENTE_CREATORE, p.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, to_char(p.DATA_ESECUZIONE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DATA_ESECUZIONE, to_char(p.DATA_FINE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DATA_FINE, p.NUM_DOC from DPA_PREGRESSI p where p.SYSTEM_ID = @system_id@

query.name: S_GET_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSO_BY_SYSTEMID
query.value: select a.SYSTEM_ID, a.ID_PREGRESSO, a.ID_REGISTRO, a.ID_DOCUMENTO, a.ID_UTENTE, a.ID_RUOLO, a.TIPO_OPERAZIONE, to_char(a.DATA,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DATA, a.ERRORE, a.ESITO, a.ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL from DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI a where a.ID_PREGRESSO = @id_report@ and a.ESITO IS NOT NULL order by a.DATA asc

query.name: S_GET_ALL_REPORT_PREGRESSO
query.value: /* Formatted on 2012/07/23 15:59 (Formatter Plus v4.8.8) */ SELECT p.system_id, p.id_amm, p.id_utente_creatore, p.id_ruolo_creatore, TO_CHAR (p.data_esecuzione, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss' ) AS data_esecuzione, TO_CHAR (p.data_fine, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') AS data_fine, p.num_doc, p.descrizione, SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'E' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS elaborati, SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'E' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS errori FROM dpa_pregressi p, dpa_ass_pregressi a WHERE p.id_amm = @id_amm@ AND p.system_id = a.id_pregresso(+) AND p.id_amm = @id_amm@ @daAmm@ GROUP BY (p.system_id, p.id_amm, p.id_utente_creatore, p.id_ruolo_creatore, p.data_esecuzione, p.data_fine, p.num_doc, p.descrizione ) ORDER BY (p.system_id) DESC

query.name: S_GET_ALLEGATI_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI_BY_SYSTEMID
query.value: select a.SYSTEM_ID, a.ID_ITEM, a.ERRORE, a.ESITO from DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO a where a.ID_ITEM = @id_item@ order by a.SYSTEM_ID asc

query.name: S_GET_ID_ITEM_DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI
query.value: select a.SYSTEM_ID from DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI a where a.ID_PREGRESSO = @id_report@ order by a.SYSTEM_ID asc

query.name: I_DPA_PREGRESSI
I_DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI
I_DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO
D_DELETE_ALLEGATO_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO WHERE ID_ITEM=@id_item@

query.name: D_DELETE_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI WHERE ID_PREGRESSO=@id_pregresso@

query.name: D_DELETE_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_PREGRESSI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: U_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: update DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI set ID_DOCUMENTO=@id_documento@, ERRORE='@errore@', ESITO='@esito@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: U_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: update DPA_PREGRESSI set DATA_FINE=@data_fine@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: U_ALLEGATO_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: update DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO set ID_ITEM=@id_item@, ERRORE='@errore@', ESITO='@esito@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: S_GET_DETTAGLIO_DOCUMENTO_NO_SECURITY_BY_NUM_PROTO_E_REG
query.value:
SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ a.system_id, a.docnumber, a.docname, a.status, a.docserver_loc, a.PATH, @creationDate@ AS creation_date, @creationTime@ as creation_time, a.id_registro, a.cha_tipo_proto, a.id_oggetto, a.num_proto, a.num_anno_proto, a.var_proto_eme, @dta_proto_eme@ as dta_proto_eme, a.cha_assegnato, a.var_cognome_eme, a.var_nome_eme, a.id_parent, @dta_proto@ as dta_proto, a.cha_mod_oggetto, a.cha_mod_mitt_dest, a.cha_mod_mitt_int, a.var_proto_in, a.id_annullatore, a.var_aut_annulla, a.cha_invio_conferma, @dta_proto_in@ as dta_proto_in, @dta_annulla@ as dta_annulla, a.var_segnatura, a.cha_da_proto, a.var_note, a.cha_fascicolato, a.id_tipo_atto, a.cha_privato, a.cha_evidenza, a.var_prof_oggetto AS var_desc_oggetto, a.id_people_prot, a.id_ruolo_prot, a.id_uo_prot, '255' as accessrights, d.type_id, d.description, d.system_id AS sys_doctypes, a.author, a.id_ruolo_creatore, a.id_uo_creatore, a.cha_interop, a.dta_scadenza, a.cha_personale, a.cha_in_cestino, a.id_documento_principale, a.prot_tit, a.num_in_fasc, a.id_fasc_prot_tit, a.num_prot_tit, a.id_titolario, a.cha_riff_mitt, a.id_people_delegato, a.CHA_DOCUMENTO_DA_PEC, a.LAST_FORWARD, a.PRINTS_NUM, a.CHA_COD_T_A,
A.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,
a.COD_EXT_APP, a.IN_LIBROFIRMA, a.CHA_TASK_STATUS FROM PROFILE a, DOCUMENTTYPES d WHERE @docNumber@ and a.documenttype=d.system_id

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_DOCNUMER
query.value: delete from profile where docnumber = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_COMPONENTS
query.value: delete from components where docnumber = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_VERSIONS
query.value: delete from versions where docnumber = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_DOCARRIVOPAR
query.value: delete from dpa_doc_arrivo_par where id_profile = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_DPA_NOTE
query.value: delete from dpa_note where tipooggettoassociato = 'D' and idoggettoassociato= @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_PROJECT_COMPONENTS
query.value: delete from project_components where link = @iDdoc@

query.name: U_DATA_CREATION_DOC_GRIGIO
query.value: update PROFILE set CREATION_DATE=@creation_date@, CREATION_TIME=@creation_time@, LAST_EDIT_DATE=@last_edit_date@, ID_VECCHIO_DOCUMENTO=@id_vecchio_documento@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: S_VERIFICA_INTERVALLO_LOG_PROTOCOLLO
query.value: SELECT userid_operatore, dta_azione, var_oggetto, var_desc_oggetto, var_desc_azione, cha_esito, id_people_operatore, id_gruppo_operatore, id_amm, id_oggetto, var_cod_azione FROM dpa_log, DUAL WHERE id_amm = 361 AND dta_azione >= SYSDATE - NUMTODSINTERVAL(@intervallo@, 'SECOND') AND var_oggetto = 'DOCUMENTO' AND (var_cod_azione = 'AGG_PROT' or var_cod_azione ='PUT_FILE') AND var_cod_azione NOT LIKE 'AMM_%' ORDER BY dta_azione DESC

query.name: V_IDVECCHIO_PREGRESSI
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(ID_VECCHIO_DOCUMENTO) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_VECCHIO_DOCUMENTO @param1@ UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI WHERE ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL @param1@ AND ESITO IS NULL

query.name: U_SET_FLAG_ALLEGATI_ESTERNI
query.value: UPDATE versions SET cha_allegati_esterno='1' WHERE version_id=@version_id@ AND docnumber=@docnumber@

query.name: U_SET_FLAG_ALLEGATI_PEC_IS_EXT
query.value: UPDATE versions SET cha_allegati_esterno='@flagChar@' WHERE version_id=@version_id@ AND docnumber=@docnumber@

query.name: S_ALLEGATO_ESTERNO
query.value: SELECT CHA_ALLEGATI_ESTERNO FROM VERSIONS WHERE version_id=@version_id@

query.name: S_ASS_RUOLI_STATI_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT ID_GRUPPO, ID_DIAGRAMMA, ID_STATO, CHA_NOT_VIS FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@

query.name: S_ASS_RUOLO_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_GRUPPO = @idRuolo@ AND ID_STATO = 0

query.name: S_ASS_RUOLO_STATO_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_GRUPPO = @idRuolo@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: S_GET_APPLICATION_NAME
query.value: SELECT * from ( SELECT ID_VERSIONS_U FROM DPA_DOCSPA ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_GET_LOGIN_MESSAGE
query.value: SELECT * from ( SELECT VAR_MESSAGGIO_LOGIN FROM DPA_DOCSPA ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: U_LOGIN_MESSAGE
query.value: UPDATE dpa_docspa SET VAR_MESSAGGIO_LOGIN='@msg@' where system_id = (select max(system_id) from dpa_docspa)

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_WITH_FILTERS
query.value:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_amm, a.var_desc_corr, b.cha_tipo_diritto as cha_tipo_diritto, a.id_people, a.id_gruppo, b.accessrights as accessrights, a.id_uo, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, descuo (a.id_uo) AS desc_uo, a.cha_system_role as diSistema, getcodrubricacorr (a.id_uo) AS var_cod_uo, b.ts_inserimento, b.var_note_sec as note,b.PERSONORGROUP, b.cha_copia_visibilita, (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dpa_role_history WHERE original_corr_id = a.original_id AND action != 'C') AS showhistory, a.dta_fine, '0' AS rimosso, (CASE WHEN b.accessrights = 0 THEN 256 ELSE b.accessrights END ) AS orderAcc, --Aggiunto per Ordinamento MEV ACL (CASE WHEN b.accessrights = 0 THEN 256 --Proprietario WHEN b.accessrights = 63 AND b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'A' AND b.VAR_NOTE_SEC IS NULL THEN 63 -- Acquisito WHEN b.accessrights = 45 AND b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'A' AND b.VAR_NOTE_SEC IS NULL THEN 45 -- Acquisito WHEN b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'T' THEN 35 --Trasmesso WHEN b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'F' THEN 30 --Inserimento in Fascicolo WHEN b.accessrights = 20 AND b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'A' THEN 15 --Attesa di Accettazione --WHEN b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'A' AND b.accessrights = 20 AND b.VAR_NOTE_SEC = 'ACQUISITO PER COPIA VISIBILITA' THEN 10 --Acquisito per copia Visibilita WHEN b.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'A' AND b.VAR_NOTE_SEC = 'ACQUISITO PER COPIA VISIBILITA' THEN 10 --Acquisito per copia Visibilita ELSE b.accessrights END ) AS orderTipo --End MEV FROM dpa_corr_globali a, security b WHERE a.id_amm = @idAmm@ AND ( a.id_people = b.personorgroup OR a.id_gruppo = b.personorgroup ) AND b.thing = @idProfile@ @query1@ UNION SELECT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_amm, a.var_desc_corr, d.cha_tipo_diritto as cha_tipo_diritto, a.id_people, a.id_gruppo, d.accessrights as accessrights, a.id_uo, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, descuo (a.id_uo) AS desc_uo, a.cha_system_role as diSistema, getcodrubricacorr (a.id_uo) AS var_cod_uo, d.dta_revoca, d.note as note,d.PERSONORGROUP, d.cha_copia_visibilita, (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dpa_role_history WHERE original_corr_id = a.original_id AND action != 'C') AS showhistory, a.dta_fine, '1' AS rimosso, (CASE WHEN d.accessrights = 0 THEN 256 ELSE d.accessrights END ) AS orderAcc,
-- Mev Editing ACL (CASE WHEN d.accessrights = 0 THEN 256 ELSE d.accessrights END ) AS orderTipo -- End MEV
FROM dpa_corr_globali a, deleted_security d WHERE a.id_amm = @idAmm@ AND ( a.id_people = d.personorgroup OR a.id_gruppo = d.personorgroup ) AND d.thing = @idProfile@ @query2@ ) ORDER BY rimosso ASC,
--MEV Editing ACL orderTipo DESC, --decode(cha_tipo_diritto,'P','A', --'A','B', --'T','C', --'F','F') asc, --End MEV
orderacc desc, cha_tipo_urp DESC, ts_inserimento asc

query.name: GET_TIPO_COMPONENTI
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, DESCRIZIONE FROM TIPO_COMPONENTI

query.name: S_PEOPLE_CENTRO_SERVIZI_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE @param2@ --AND P.ABILITATO_CENTRO_SERVIZI ='1' AND A.ID_PEOPLE = P.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_AMM = P.ID_AMM AND (P.ABILITATO_CENTRO_SERVIZI ='1' OR P.ABILITATO_ESIBIZIONE = '1') AND A.ID_PEOPLE = P.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_AMM = P.ID_AMM

query.name: S_People_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE @param2@ AND NOT(P.DISABLED='Y') AND A.ID_PEOPLE = P.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_AMM = P.ID_AMM

query.name: S_CORRESPONDENT_DETAILS
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_CORR_GLOBALI, VAR_INDIRIZZO, VAR_CAP, VAR_PROVINCIA , VAR_NAZIONE, VAR_TELEFONO, VAR_TELEFONO2, VAR_FAX, VAR_NOTE, VAR_COD_FISC , VAR_CITTA, VAR_LOCALITA, VAR_LUOGO_NASCITA, DTA_NASCITA , VAR_TITOLO, VAR_COD_PI, VAR_COD_IPA, VAR_COD_FISCALE FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALI=@param1@

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATES_DOC_LITE_BY_ROLE
query.value: SELECT distinct d.system_id, d.var_desc_atto, di.ID_DIAGRAMMA FROM dpa_vis_tipo_doc vis , dpa_tipo_atto d LEFT JOIN dpa_ass_diagrammi di ON di.ID_TIPO_DOC= d.SYSTEM_ID WHERE id_amm = @idAmm@ AND abilitato_si_no = '1' AND d.SYSTEM_ID= vis.ID_TIPO_DOC AND vis.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND vis.DIRITTI != '0' ORDER BY d.var_desc_atto

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATES_FASC_LITE_BY_ROLE
query.value: SELECT distinct d.system_id, d.var_desc_fasc, di.ID_DIAGRAMMA FROM dpa_vis_tipo_fasc vis , dpa_tipo_fasc d LEFT JOIN dpa_ass_diagrammi di ON di.ID_TIPO_FASC= d.SYSTEM_ID WHERE id_amm = @idAmm@ AND abilitato_si_no = '1' AND d.SYSTEM_ID= vis.ID_TIPO_FASC AND vis.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND vis.DIRITTI != '0' ORDER BY d.var_desc_fasc

query.name: COUNT_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ AND id_stato = @idStato@ AND id_gruppo = @idGruppo@

query.name: DELETE_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ AND id_stato = @idStato@ AND id_gruppo = @idGruppo@

query.name: UPDATE_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA SET cha_not_vis = '1' WHERE id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ AND id_stato = @idStato@ AND id_gruppo = @idGruppo@

query.name: INSERT_DIAGRAMMI
S_LOG_FASC_FILTER
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO,A.DESC_PRODUCER FROM DPA_LOG A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE @param1@ AND A.VAR_OGGETTO IN ('FOLDER', 'FASCICOLO') AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ UNION ALL SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO,A.DESC_PRODUCER FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE @param1@ AND A.VAR_OGGETTO IN ('FOLDER', 'FASCICOLO') AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ ) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_LOG_DOC_FILTER
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO, A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE, A.DESC_PRODUCER FROM DPA_LOG A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND (A.VAR_OGGETTO = '@param2@' @param4@) AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE != 'OPEN_DET_DOC' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ UNION ALL SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO, A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE, A.DESC_PRODUCER FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND (A.VAR_OGGETTO = '@param2@' @param4@) AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE != 'OPEN_DET_DOC' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ ) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_GET_DOCUMENT_TAB
query.value: Select ( SELECT COUNT (a.system_id) FROM project a where a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND a.system_id IN ( SELECT a.id_fascicolo FROM project a, project_components b WHERE a.system_id = b.project_id AND b.LINK = @documentId@ ) ) AS prj, (SELECT COUNT (a.system_id) FROM dpa_trasmissione a WHERE a.id_profile = @documentId@) AS trans, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELETED_SECURITY s WHERE THING = @documentId@ And Not Exists (Select 'x' From security sec Where sec.thing = s.thing And sec.accessrights > 20 And sec.personorgroup = s.personorgroup)) as deleteSecurity from dual

query.name: S_GET_PROJECT_TAB
query.value: Select (SELECT COUNT (a.system_id) FROM dpa_trasmissione a WHERE a.id_project = @projectId@) AS trans, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELETED_SECURITY s WHERE THING = @projectId@ And Not Exists (Select 'x' From security sec Where sec.thing = s.thing And sec.accessrights > 20 And sec.personorgroup = s.personorgroup)) as deleteSecurity from dual

query.name: SELECT_VAR_CODICE_AMM_IPA
query.value: SELECT var_codice_amm_ipa FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE system_id=@param1@

query.name: SELECT_VAR_CODICE_AOO_IPA
query.value: SELECT var_codice_aoo_ipa FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE var_codice='@param1@' AND CHA_RF=0

query.name: SELECT_SYSTEM_ID_DPA_TIPO_ATTO
query.value: SELECT System_Id FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ AND upper(var_desc_atto) = upper('Fattura elettronica')

query.name: SELECT_CODICE_UAC_DPA_EL_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT codice_uac FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ AND var_codice = '@param2@'

query.name: SELECT_CODICE_CLASSIFICAZIONE_DPA_EL_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT codice_classificazione FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ AND var_codice = '@param2@'

query.name: S_GET_IDTITOLARY_BY_CODEFASC_OR_DESCRIPTION
query.value: SELECT id_titolario FROM project WHERE cha_stato = 'A' AND ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@ AND ID_REGISTRO = @idRegistro@ @condizioniWhere@

query.name: S_PROJECT_DOCUMENTS_COUNT_VISIBLE_NOTVISIBLE
query.value:
Select ( SELECT COUNT (a.system_id) FROM PROFILE a, project_components b, documenttypes d WHERE b.project_id = @id@ AND B.LINK=A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND b.TYPE = 'D' AND a.documenttype = d.system_id AND a.dta_annulla IS NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'x' FROM security e WHERE a.system_id = e.thing AND e.personorgroup IN (@idgruppo@, @idpeople@) AND e.accessrights > 0) AND NVL (cha_in_cestino, '0') = '0') as visible, (
SELECT COUNT (a.system_id) FROM PROFILE a, project_components b, documenttypes d WHERE b.project_id = @id@ AND B.LINK=A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND b.TYPE = 'D' AND a.documenttype = d.system_id AND NVL (cha_in_cestino, '0') = '0') as notvisible from dual

query.name: U_PROJECT_MOVE_FOLDER
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET ID_PARENT=@id_parent@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: I_DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX(id, idjob, iduser, idrole, idreg, mail) values(seq.nextval ,@idJob@, @idUser@, @idRole@, @idReg@, '@mail@')

query.name: S_DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX
query.value: SELECT r.var_codice as registerCode, m.mail, m.errormessage, m.mailserver, m.mailuserid, m.DTA_CONCLUDED FROM DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX m JOIN DPA_EL_REGISTRI r ON( m.id = @id@ and m.idreg = r.system_id)

query.name: S_DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX_ID
query.value: SELECT max(id) FROM DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX WHERE IDJOB=@idJob@ AND IDUSER=@idUser@ AND IDROLE=@idRole@ AND IDREG=@idReg@ AND MAIL='@mail@'

query.name: S_DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX_WHERE_CONDITION
query.value: SELECT @fields@ FROM DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX WHERE @whereCondition@

query.name: U_DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX SET @param1@ WHERE id=@id@

query.name: I_DPA_JOBS
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_JOBS VALUES(seq.nextval)

query.name: S_DPA_JOBS
query.value: SELECT max(id) FROM DPA_JOBS

query.name: I_DPA_REPORT_MAILBOX
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REPORT_MAILBOX( ID, ID_CHECK_MAILBOX, MAILID, TYPE, RECEIPT, DATE_MAIL, FROM_MAIL, ERROR, COUNT_ATTACHMENTS, SUBJECT) values(@param1@)

query.name: D_DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CHECK_MAILBOX WHERE ID = @idCheckMailbox@

query.name: S_DPA_REPORT_MAILBOX
query.value: SELECT MAILID, TYPE, RECEIPT, DATE_MAIL, FROM_MAIL, ERROR, COUNT_ATTACHMENTS, SUBJECT FROM DPA_REPORT_MAILBOX WHERE ID_CHECK_MAILBOX = @id@

query.name: S_DAY_YEAR_BEFORE
query.value: select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-12),'DD/MM/YYYY') as DAY from dual

query.name: S_REGISTRO_DA_PEC
query.value: select @param1@ from profile p, dpa_ass_doc_mail_interop a, dpa_el_registri e where p.SYSTEM_ID = a.ID_PROFILE and a.ID_REGISTRO = e.SYSTEM_ID and p.SYSTEM_ID = @idProfile@

query.name: AMM_S_DELETE_PEOPLEGROUPS_QUALIFICHE_BY_RUOLO_BY_UTENTE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_PEOPLEGROUPS_QUALIFICHE WHERE ID_PEOPLE=@idPeople@ AND ID_GRUPPO=@idGruppo@

query.name: S_GET_DOCUMENT_TRASM_TO_CC
query.value: Select ( SELECT COUNT (a.id_profile) as Trasm FROM dpa_trasmissione a, dpa_doc_arrivo_par b, dpa_trasm_singola c WHERE a.id_profile = @idProfile@ AND B.id_profile = A.ID_Profile AND C.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = b.id_mitt_Dest AND C.ID_TRASMISSIONE = A.system_id AND B.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST IN ('D', 'C') ) AS trans from dual

query.name: S_ANAGRAFICA_LOG
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE as CODICE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, VAR_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, VAR_METODO as METODO, 0 as ATTIVO, 'NN' as NOTIFY, NOTIFICATION, CONFIGURABLE FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG WHERE VAR_CODICE not like 'AMM_%' AND (ID_AMM = @param1@ OR ID_AMM IS NULL) ORDER BY VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: S_DPA_NOTIFY
query.value: SELECT system_id as ID_NOTIFY, id_event, desc_producer as PRODUCER, id_people_receiver as ID_PEOPLE, id_group_receiver as ID_GROUP, type_notify as TYPE_NOTIFICATION, dta_notify, field_1 as ITEM1, field_2 as ITEM2, field_3 as ITEM3, field_4 as ITEM4, multiplicity, specialized_field as ITEM_SPECIALIZED, type_event, domainobject, id_object, id_specialized_object, dta_event, read_notification, color, notes, getchaimg(id_object) as EXTENSION, getchafirmato(id_object) as SIGNED FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @idPeople@ AND (ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = @idGroup@ OR ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = 0) ORDER BY DTA_EVENT desc

query.name: S_DPA_NOTIFY_PAGE
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DTA_EVENT DESC) AS RN, system_id as ID_NOTIFY, id_event, desc_producer as PRODUCER, id_people_receiver as ID_PEOPLE, id_group_receiver as ID_GROUP, type_notify as TYPE_NOTIFICATION, dta_notify, field_1 as ITEM1, field_2 as ITEM2, field_3 as ITEM3, field_4 as ITEM4, multiplicity, specialized_field as ITEM_SPECIALIZED, type_event, domainobject, id_object, id_specialized_object, dta_event, read_notification, color, notes, getchaimg(id_object) as EXTENSION, getchafirmato(id_object) as SIGNED ,(select max(accessrights) from security where thing = id_object and personorgroup in (@idPeople@,@idGruppo@)) as ACCESSRIGHTS FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @idPeople@ AND (ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = @idGruppo@ OR ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = 0) ORDER BY DTA_EVENT desc ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_DPA_NOTIFY_BY_ID_OBJECT
query.value: SELECT system_id as ID_NOTIFY, id_event, desc_producer as PRODUCER, id_people_receiver as ID_PEOPLE, id_group_receiver as ID_GROUP, type_notify as TYPE_NOTIFICATION, dta_notify, field_1 as ITEM1, field_2 as ITEM2, field_3 as ITEM3, field_4 as ITEM4, multiplicity, specialized_field as ITEM_SPECIALIZED, type_event, domainobject, id_object, id_specialized_object, dta_event, read_notification, color, notes, getchaimg(id_object) as EXTENSION FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_OBJECT = @idObject@ AND DOMAINOBJECT = '@domainObject@' ORDER BY DTA_EVENT desc

query.name: D_DPA_NOTIFY
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idNotification@

query.name: S_DPA_NOTIFY_NO_WF
query.value: SELECT n.system_id, n.id_specialized_object from DPA_NOTIFY n WHERE n.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @param1@ AND (n.ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = @param2@ OR ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = 0) AND n.DTA_NOTIFY < @param3@ AND ((n.TYPE_EVENT not like 'TRASM_DOC_%' AND n.TYPE_EVENT not like 'TRASM_FOLDER_%') OR (( select rt.cha_tipo_ragione from DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA ts join DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM rt on ts.id_ragione = rt.system_id where ts.system_id = n.id_specialized_object ) NOT IN ('W') ) )

query.name: U_DATE_REMOVE_FROM_NC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST = sysdate, CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = @idTrasmSing@ AND ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@ )

query.name: S_DPA_NOTIFY_NUMBER_NOTIFY_OTHER_ROLES
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_NOTIFY N LEFT JOIN PEOPLEGROUPS P ON(P.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID= @idPeople@ AND P.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = N.ID_GROUP_RECEIVER AND P.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND NOT(N.ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = @idGroup@)) WHERE N.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @idPeople@ AND (N.ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = 0 OR N.ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = P.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID)

query.name: I_DPA_NOTIFY_HISTORY
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_NOTIFY_HISTORY VALUES(@values@)

query.name: U_DPA_NOTIFY_READ_NOTIFICATION
query.value: UPDATE DPA_NOTIFY SET READ_NOTIFICATION = 1 WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idNotify@

query.name: U_DPA_NOTIFY
query.value: UPDATE DPA_NOTIFY SET FIELD_1 = '@field_1@', FIELD_2 = '@field_2@', FIELD_3 = '@field_3@', FIELD_4 = '@field_4@', SPECIALIZED_FIELD = '@specializeItem@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idNotification@

query.name: S_DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM_BY_ID_NOTIFY
query.value: SELECT r.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM r JOIN DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA s ON s.ID_RAGIONE=r.SYSTEM_ID JOIN DPA_NOTIFY n ON n.ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT = s.SYSTEM_ID WHERE n.SYSTEM_ID=@idNotify@ AND NOT(r.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE='W') AND NOT(r.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE='S')

query.name: D_DPA_NOTIFY_MULTIPLICITY_ONE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_EVENT = @idEvent@

query.name: D_DPA_NOTIFY_MULTIPLICITY_ALL
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_EVENT = @idEvent@ AND ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @idPeople@ AND ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = @idGroup@

query.name: I_DPA_NOTIFY_HISTORY_MULTIPLE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_NOTIFY_HISTORY ( SYSTEM_ID, ID_NOTIFY, ID_EVENT, DESC_PRODUCER, ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER, ID_GROUP_RECEIVER, TYPE_NOTIFY, DTA_NOTIFY, FIELD_1, FIELD_2, FIELD_3, FIELD_4, MULTIPLICITY, SPECIALIZED_FIELD, TYPE_EVENT, DOMAINOBJECT, ID_OBJECT, ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT, DTA_EVENT, READ_NOTIFICATION, NOTES ) SELECT seq.nextval, SYSTEM_ID, ID_EVENT, DESC_PRODUCER, ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER, ID_GROUP_RECEIVER, TYPE_NOTIFY, DTA_NOTIFY, FIELD_1, FIELD_2, FIELD_3, FIELD_4, MULTIPLICITY, SPECIALIZED_FIELD, TYPE_EVENT, DOMAINOBJECT, ID_OBJECT, ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT, DTA_EVENT, READ_NOTIFICATION, NOTES FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE @condition@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY5_DEPOSITO
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.*, getAccessRights(@param3@,@param2@,@idRuoloPubblico@,a.system_id) as accessrights FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ and (checkSecurity(A.SYSTEM_ID, @param2@, @param3@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'F') > 0) ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: I_DPA_NOTIFY_HISTORY_TRASM_OTHER_PEOPLE_GROUP
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_NOTIFY_HISTORY ( SYSTEM_ID, ID_NOTIFY, ID_EVENT, DESC_PRODUCER, ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER, ID_GROUP_RECEIVER, TYPE_NOTIFY, DTA_NOTIFY, FIELD_1, FIELD_2, FIELD_3, FIELD_4, MULTIPLICITY, SPECIALIZED_FIELD, TYPE_EVENT, DOMAINOBJECT, ID_OBJECT, ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT, DTA_EVENT, READ_NOTIFICATION, NOTES ) SELECT seq.nextval, SYSTEM_ID, ID_EVENT, DESC_PRODUCER, ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER, ID_GROUP_RECEIVER, TYPE_NOTIFY, DTA_NOTIFY, FIELD_1, FIELD_2, FIELD_3, FIELD_4, MULTIPLICITY, SPECIALIZED_FIELD, TYPE_EVENT, DOMAINOBJECT, ID_OBJECT, ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT, DTA_EVENT, READ_NOTIFICATION, NOTES FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT IN (SELECT TS.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU, DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@idPeople@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID =TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID =@idTrasm@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID =TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND (TS.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_TRASM_SINGOLA FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID =@idTrasmUser@ ) OR TS.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TS1.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS1 JOIN DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU1 ON TS1.SYSTEM_ID = TU1.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE TU1.ID_PEOPLE =@idPeople@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID =TS1.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TS1.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U' AND TS1.ID_RAGIONE = (SELECT TS2.ID_RAGIONE FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS2 JOIN DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU2 ON TS2.SYSTEM_ID = TU2.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE TU2.SYSTEM_ID =@idTrasmUser@ ) ) ) ) @condition@

query.name: U_DPA_NOTIFY_NOTES
query.value: UPDATE DPA_NOTIFY SET NOTES='@notes@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idNotification@

query.name: D_DPA_NOTIFY_OTHER_TRASM_GROUP
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_SPECIALIZED_OBJECT IN (SELECT TS.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU, DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@idPeople@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID =TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID =@idTrasm@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID =TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND (TS.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_TRASM_SINGOLA FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID =@idTrasmUser@ ) OR TS.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TS1.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS1 JOIN DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU1 ON TS1.SYSTEM_ID = TU1.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE TU1.ID_PEOPLE =@idPeople@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID =TS1.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TS1.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U' AND TS1.ID_RAGIONE = (SELECT TS2.ID_RAGIONE FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS2 JOIN DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU2 ON TS2.SYSTEM_ID = TU2.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE TU2.SYSTEM_ID =@idTrasmUser@ ) ) ) ) @condition@

query.name: I_INSERT_REGISTRO_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REGISTRO_CONSERVAZIONE ( @colSystemId@ VAR_COD_AZIONE , VAR_DESC_AZIONE , ID_ISTANZA , ID_OGGETTO , CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO , USERID_OPERATORE , CHA_ESITO , ID_AMM , DTA_OPERAZIONE , CHA_TIPO_AZIONE , CHA_PRINTED ) VALUES ( @systemId@ '@codAzione@', '@descAzione@', @idIstanza@, @idOggetto@, '@tipoOggetto@', '@userId@', '@esito@', @idAmministrazione@, SYSDATE, '@tipoAzione@', '0' )

query.name: U_VALIDAZIONE_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: Update DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE @parametro@ where system_id = @sysId@

query.name: S_SEGNATURA_ID_DOC
query.value: select vardescribe(@idDoc@,'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') from profile where system_id = @idDoc@

query.name: S_PROFILE_SYSTEM_ID_BY_FILTER_NOTIFICATION
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE p, COMPONENTS c WHERE @condition@

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_ID_TRASM_SINGOLA_BY_FILTER_NOTIFICATION
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASM_SINGOLA FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE tu JOIN DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA ts ON tu.id_trasm_singola = ts.system_id AND tu.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA IN (@listIdTransUser@) JOIN DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM rt ON ts.id_ragione = rt.system_id AND rt.cha_tipo_ragione = 'W' WHERE tu.ID_PEOPLE =@idPeople@ AND tu.DTA_ACCETTATA IS NULL AND tu.DTA_RIFIUTATA IS NULL

query.name: S_DOC_IN_ADLROLE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_AREA_LAVORO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idDoc@ AND ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @idRole@ and id_people = 0

query.name: S_FASC_IN_ADLROLE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_AREA_LAVORO WHERE ID_PROJECT = @idFasc@ AND ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @idRole@ and id_people = 0

query.name: I_DPA_UA_INFO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_UA_INFO (USER_ID, ID_PEOPLE, DTA_LOGIN, IP, BROWSER_TYPE, BROWSER_VERSION, ACTIVEX, JAVASCRIPT, JAVAAPPLET, USER_AGENT) VALUES ('@userId@', @idPeople@, sysdate, '@ip@', '@browserType@', '@browserVersion@', @activex@, @javascript@, @javaapplet@, '@userAgent@')

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_LIST_DOCUMENTI_IN_NOTIFY
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS id_trasmissione, a.id_profile AS id_documento, rt.cha_tipo_ragione AS tipo_ragione, s.system_id AS id_trasmissione_singola, u.system_id AS id_trasmissione_utente, a.var_note_generali AS note_generali, s.VAR_NOTE_SING AS note_individuali, rt.var_desc_ragione AS ragione_trasm, @getDescCorr@ as role, @getPeopleName@ as people FROM dpa_trasmissione a, dpa_trasm_singola s, dpa_trasm_utente u, dpa_ragione_trasm rt where u.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = s.SYSTEM_ID @param2@ and s.ID_TRASMISSIONE = a.SYSTEM_ID and s.ID_RAGIONE = rt.SYSTEM_ID and u.ID_PEOPLE = @param1@ order by a.DTA_INVIO desc

query.name: S_DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS
query.value: SELECT TA.SYSTEM_ID, TA.ID_TYPE_EVENT, TA.DESC_TYPE_EVENT, TA.ID_AUR, TA.DESC_AUR, TA.TYPE_AUR, TA.TYPE_NOTIFY, TA.IS_EXERCISE, TA.ID_AMM, A.NOTIFY FROM DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS TA JOIN DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI A ON TA.ID_TYPE_EVENT = A.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA AND TA.ID_AMM = A.ID_AMM AND TA.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ ORDER BY TA.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_TYPE_EVENT_CONFIGURABLE
query.value: SELECT al.system_id, al.var_descrizione as desc_type_event FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG al join DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI la on AL.SYSTEM_ID = LA.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA AND la.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND la.NOTIFY = 'CON'

query.name: I_DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS VALUES(@value@)

query.name: D_DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN (@listSystemIdAssertion@)

query.name: S_ASSERTIONS_COUNT_DUPLICATE
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS WHERE ID_TYPE_EVENT = @idTypeEvent@ AND ID_AUR = @idAur@ AND TYPE_AUR = @typeAur@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: I_DPA_SEND_STO
S_DPA_SEND_STO_BY_IDDOCUMENT
query.value: SELECT B.DOCNUMBER AS ID_DOCUMENT, B.var_prof_oggetto AS OGGETTO_DOCUMENTO , c.var_desc_corr AS CORRISPONDENTE, d.description AS MEZZO, A.mail AS MAIL, A.mail_mittente AS MAIL_MITTENTE, A.esito AS ESITO, a.dta_spedizione AS DTA_SPEDIZIONE, a.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, a.ID_GROUP_SENDER as ID_GROUP_SENDER FROM DPA_SEND_STO A, PROFILE B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C , DOCUMENTTYPES D WHERE a.id_profile = B.system_id AND a.id_corr_globale= c.system_id AND a.id_documenttype= d.system_id AND A.ID_PROFILE=@idDocument@ ORDER BY CORRISPONDENTE, DTA_SPEDIZIONE DESC

query.name: U_DPA_SEND_STO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_SEND_STO SET ESITO=@esito@, DTA_SPEDIZIONE= SYSDATE WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @idCorrispondente@ AND ID_GROUP_SENDER = @idRuolo@ AND ESITO = 'In fase di spedizione'

query.name: U_DPA_SEND_STO_ERRORE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_SEND_STO SET ESITO=@esito@, DTA_SPEDIZIONE= SYSDATE WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND ID_GROUP_SENDER = @idRuolo@ AND ESITO = 'In fase di spedizione'

query.name: S_DPASI_STATUSMASK
query.value: SELECT A.STATUS_C_MASK AS STATUSMASK, B.TYPE_ID AS TIPO FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO A, DOCUMENTTYPES B WHERE UPPER(A.VAR_INDIRIZZO)=UPPER('@address@') AND A.ID_PROFILE=@idprofile@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE=B.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_SEARCH_AUR_TR
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_codice as code, var_desc_ruolo as descr FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO WHERE upper(var_codice) like upper('%@code@%') AND upper(var_desc_ruolo) like upper('%@description@%') AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_SEARCH_AUR_RF
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_codice as code, var_desc_registro as descr FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE upper(var_codice) like upper('%@code@%') AND upper(var_desc_registro) like upper('%@description@%') AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_SEARCH_AUR_ROLE
query.value: SELECT g.system_id, c.var_cod_rubrica as code, c.var_desc_corr as descr FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI c join GROUPS g on upper(c.var_cod_rubrica) like upper('%@code@%') AND upper(c.var_desc_corr) like upper('%@description@%') AND c.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND c.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND C.ID_GRUPPO = g.system_id

query.name: S_SEARCH_AUR_UO
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_cod_rubrica as code, var_desc_corr as descr FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE upper(var_cod_rubrica) like upper('%@code@%') AND upper(var_desc_corr) like upper('%@description@%') AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: U_DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_EVENT_TYPE_ASSERTIONS SET ID_TYPE_EVENT = @idTypeEvent@, DESC_TYPE_EVENT = '@descTypeEvent@', ID_AUR = @idAur@, DESC_AUR = '@descAur@', TYPE_AUR = '@typeAur@', TYPE_NOTIFY = '@typeNotify@', IS_EXERCISE = '@isExercise@', ID_AMM = @idAmm@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: S_REG_CONS_GET_NUM_ENABLED
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS N_AMM FROM dpa_config_stampa_cons WHERE disabled=0

query.name: S_REG_CONS_GET_LIST_ENABLED_AMM
query.value: SELECT c.id_amm, c.print_freq, c.printer_user_id, c.printer_role_id, c.dta_last_print, c.dta_next_print, c.print_hour, c.id_last_printed_event, r.id_last_event_to_print FROM dpa_config_stampa_cons c INNER JOIN (SELECT id_amm, MAX(system_id) AS id_last_event_to_print FROM dpa_registro_conservazione GROUP BY id_amm) r ON c.id_amm=r.id_amm WHERE disabled=0

query.name: S_REG_CONS_VERIFY_SYS_ID
query.value: SELECT COUNT(system_id) AS totId FROM dpa_registro_conservazione WHERE id_amm = @id_amm@ AND system_id > @system_id@ AND cha_printed = 0

query.name: S_REG_CONS_GET_INFOUTENTE
query.value: SELECT id_people, system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE var_codice = @user_id@

query.name: S_REG_CONS_GET_LIST_ISTANZE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(id_istanza) FROM dpa_registro_conservazione WHERE id_amm = @id_amm@ AND system_id > @next_system_id@ AND system_id <= @last_system_id@

query.name: S_REG_CONS_GET_LIST_DOC_ISTANZE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(id_oggetto) FROM dpa_registro_conservazione WHERE id_amm = @id_amm@ AND system_id > @next_system_id@ AND system_id <= @last_system_id@ AND cha_tipo_oggetto = 'D' AND id_istanza = @id_istanza@ AND id_oggetto IS NOT NULL

query.name: S_REG_CONS_STAMPA_ISTANZA
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT rc.system_id, rc.var_desc_azione, rc.userid_operatore, TO_CHAR(rc.dta_operazione, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as dta_operazione, rc.cha_esito, rc.cha_tipo_oggetto FROM dpa_registro_conservazione rc --INNER JOIN dpa_anagrafica_log al ON rc.var_cod_azione=al.var_codice WHERE rc.id_amm = @id_amm@ AND rc.system_id > @next_system_id@ AND rc.system_id <= @last_system_id@ AND rc.id_istanza = @id_istanza@ AND rc.cha_tipo_oggetto='I' ORDER BY rc.dta_operazione

query.name: S_REG_CONS_STAMPA_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT rc.system_id, rc.var_desc_azione, rc.userid_operatore, TO_CHAR(rc.dta_operazione, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as dta_operazione, rc.cha_esito, rc.cha_tipo_oggetto FROM dpa_registro_conservazione rc --INNER JOIN dpa_anagrafica_log al ON rc.var_cod_azione=al.var_codice WHERE rc.id_amm = @id_amm@ AND rc.system_id > @next_system_id@ AND rc.system_id <= @last_system_id@ AND rc.id_istanza = @id_istanza@ AND rc.id_oggetto = @id_oggetto@ AND rc.cha_tipo_oggetto='D' ORDER BY rc.dta_operazione

query.name: U_REG_CONS_UPDATE_CONFIG
query.value: UPDATE dpa_config_stampa_cons SET dta_last_print=TO_DATE('@lastPrintDate@', 'DD/MM/YYYY'), dta_next_print=TO_DATE('@nextPrintDate@', 'DD/MM/YYYY'), id_last_printed_event=@idLastPrintedEvent@ WHERE id_amm=@idAmm@

query.name: U_REG_CONS_MOD_NEXT_PRINT_DATE
query.value: UPDATE dpa_config_stampa_cons SET dta_next_print=TO_DATE('@ndate@', 'DD/MM/YYYY') WHERE id_amm=@idAmm@

query.name: I_REG_CONS_SAVE_PRINT
query.value: INSERT INTO dpa_stampa_conservazione (system_id, id_amm, print_date, id_profile, id_last_printed_event, id_first_printed_event) VALUES (SEQ_DPA_STAMPA_CONSERVAZIONE.NextVal, @id_amm@, SYSDATE, @id_profile@, @next_system_id@, @last_system_id@)

query.name: U_REG_CONS_PRINTED_ITEMS
query.value: UPDATE dpa_registro_conservazione SET cha_printed=1 WHERE id_amm = @id_amm@ AND system_id > @next_system_id@ AND system_id <= @last_system_id@

query.name: S_REG_CONS_SUMMARY_DATA_IST
query.value: SELECT i.var_descrizione, i.data_apertura, i.data_invio, d.n_doc, d.tot_size FROM dpa_area_conservazione i, ( SELECT COUNT(*) as n_doc, SUM(size_item) as tot_size, id_conservazione FROM dpa_items_conservazione GROUP BY id_conservazione ) d WHERE i.system_id = d.id_conservazione AND i.system_id=@id_istanza@

query.name: S_REG_CONS_SUMMARY_DATA_DOC
query.value: SELECT data_ins, var_oggetto, cod_fasc, numero_allegati, var_tipo_file, size_item FROM dpa_items_conservazione WHERE id_profile=@id_doc@

query.name: U_REG_CONS_TIPO_PROTO
query.value: UPDATE profile SET cha_tipo_proto = '@tipo_proto@' WHERE system_id = @docnumber@

query.name: S_SEGNATURA_ID_DOC
query.value: select vardescribe(@idDoc@,'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') from profile where system_id = @idDoc@

query.name: S_REG_CONS_RICERCA_STAMPE_CONS
query.value: SELECT sc.system_id, sc.print_date, p.var_prof_oggetto, sc.id_profile, p.cha_firmato FROM dpa_stampa_conservazione sc, profile p WHERE id_amm = @id_amm@ AND p.system_id = sc.id_profile @p_firma@ @p_data@ ORDER BY sc.print_date ASC

query.name: S_REPORT_ISTANZE_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT AC.SYSTEM_ID as ID_ISTANZA, AC.VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, DATA_INVIO,DATA_CONSERVAZIONE AS DATA_CHIUSURA, AC.DATA_RIFIUTO, (SELECT COUNT(IC.SYSTEM_ID) from DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE IC where AC.SYSTEM_ID = IC.ID_CONSERVAZIONE) as NUMERO_DOCUMENTI, (SELECT trunc(SUM(IC.SIZE_ITEM)/1048576, 2) from DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE IC where AC.SYSTEM_ID = IC.ID_CONSERVAZIONE) as DIMENSIONE, trunc(ac.DATA_CONSERVAZIONE - ac.DATA_INVIO) as GIORNI_LAVORAZIONE_C, trunc(ac.DATA_RIFIUTO - ac.DATA_INVIO) as GIORNI_LAVORAZIONE_R FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE AC , DPA_ITEMS_CONSERVAZIONE IC where AC.SYSTEM_ID = IC.ID_CONSERVAZIONE @filterParam@ ORDER BY ID_ISTANZA

query.name: S_REPORT_VER_PERIODICHE_ISTANZE_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: SELECT a.ID_ISTANZA, a.ID_SUPPORTO, d.VAR_DESCRIZIONE, to_char(DATA_INVIO,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DATA_INVIO, to_char(DATA_PRODUZIONE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DATA_CREAZIONE_SUPP, to_char(DATA_CONSERVAZIONE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DATA_CHIUSURA, to_char(DATA_VER,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as DATA_VERIFICA, a.VAR_NOTE as DESC_VER,a.PERCENTUALE, a.ESITO from DPA_CONS_VERIFICA a, DPA_SUPPORTO b, DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE c, DPA_TIPO_SUPPORTO d where a.ID_SUPPORTO = b.SYSTEM_ID and b.ID_CONSERVAZIONE = c.SYSTEM_ID and b.ID_TIPO_SUPPORTO = d.SYSTEM_ID and a.ID_ISTANZA = c.SYSTEM_ID @filterParam@ ORDER BY ID_ISTANZA,DATA_VERIFICA

query.name: S_REPORT_STORIA_ISTANZE_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT c.SYSTEM_ID as ID_ISTANZA,r.DTA_OPERAZIONE as DATA_OPERAZIONE,r.USERID_OPERATORE as OPERATORE, r.VAR_DESC_AZIONE as DETTAGLI,r.CHA_ESITO as ESITO FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE C, DPA_REGISTRO_CONSERVAZIONE R WHERE r.ID_ISTANZA = c.SYSTEM_ID AND r.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'I' @filterParam@ ORDER BY ID_ISTANZA,DATA_OPERAZIONE

query.name: S_REPORT_STORIA_DOCUMENTI_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT Vardescribe(p.system_id, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') as ID_DOCUMENTO, c.SYSTEM_ID as ID_ISTANZA,r.DTA_OPERAZIONE as DATA_OPERAZIONE,r.USERID_OPERATORE as OPERATORE, r.VAR_DESC_AZIONE as DETTAGLI,r.CHA_ESITO as ESITO FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE C, DPA_REGISTRO_CONSERVAZIONE R, PROFILE P WHERE r.ID_ISTANZA = c.SYSTEM_ID AND r.ID_OGGETTO = p.SYSTEM_ID AND r.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' @filterParam@ ORDER BY ID_DOCUMENTO,DATA_OPERAZIONE

query.name: S_REPORT_VERIFICHE_IN_FASE
query.value: select c.system_id as id_istanza,to_char(c.data_invio,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as data_invio, DOC_TOT.NUM_DOC as N_DOCUMENTI, DOC_VALIDI.NUM_DOCVALIDI as N_DOCUMENTI_VALIDI, DOC_FNONVALIDI.NUM_DOCFNONVALIDI as N_DOCUMENTI_FORM_NVALIDO,DOC_FIRMAINVALIDA.NUM_FIRMANONVALIDA as N_DOCUMENTI_FIRMA_NVALIDA, DOC_MARCANONVALIDA.NUM_MARCANONVALIDA as N_DOCUMENTI_MARCA_NVALIDA,DOC_PNONVALIDA.NUM_PNONVALIDA as N_DOCUMENTI_PNONCONFORME, VER.percentuale as VER_LEGG_DIM_CAMP,TO_CHAR(VER.esito) as VER_LEGG_ESITO from dpa_area_conservazione c left outer join ( select ID_CONSERVAZIONE, count(*) NUM_DOC from dpa_items_conservazione where not id_profile is null group by id_conservazione ) DOC_TOT on c.system_id = DOC_TOT.ID_CONSERVAZIONE left outer join ( select ID_CONSERVAZIONE, count(*) NUM_DOCVALIDI from dpa_items_conservazione where validazione_formato= '1' AND (validazione_marca = '1' OR validazione_marca is null) AND (esito_firma = '1' OR esito_firma is null) AND ((validazione_firma!='4') AND (validazione_firma!='5') AND (validazione_firma!='6') AND (validazione_firma!='7') or (validazione_firma is null) ) group by id_conservazione ) DOC_VALIDI on c.system_id = DOC_VALIDI.ID_CONSERVAZIONE left outer join ( select ID_CONSERVAZIONE, count(*) NUM_DOCFNONVALIDI from dpa_items_conservazione where validazione_firma = '4' or validazione_firma = '5' or validazione_firma = '6' or validazione_firma = '7' group by id_conservazione ) DOC_FNONVALIDI on c.system_id = DOC_FNONVALIDI.ID_CONSERVAZIONE left outer join ( select ID_CONSERVAZIONE, count(*) NUM_FIRMANONVALIDA from dpa_items_conservazione where validazione_firma = '2' or validazione_firma = '6' group by id_conservazione ) DOC_FIRMAINVALIDA on c.system_id = DOC_FIRMAINVALIDA.ID_CONSERVAZIONE left outer join ( select ID_CONSERVAZIONE, count(*) NUM_MARCANONVALIDA from dpa_items_conservazione where validazione_firma = '3' or validazione_firma = '7' or validazione_marca = '0' group by id_conservazione ) DOC_MARCANONVALIDA on c.system_id = DOC_MARCANONVALIDA.ID_CONSERVAZIONE left outer join ( select ID_CONSERVAZIONE, count(*) NUM_PNONVALIDA from dpa_items_conservazione where policy_valida = '1' group by id_conservazione ) DOC_PNONVALIDA on c.system_id = DOC_PNONVALIDA.ID_CONSERVAZIONE left outer join ( select id_istanza, percentuale, esito from dpa_cons_verifica where var_note = 'Verifica Leggibilit per chiusura' ) VER on c.system_id = VER.id_istanza WHERE c.DATA_INVIO is not null @filterParam@ order by c.system_id

query.name: GET_REPORT_SPEDIZIONI_MASTER
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.ID_PROFILE AS IDDOCUMENT, MAX(A.dta_spedizione) AS DTA_ULTIMA_SPED FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO A, PROFILE B, DOCUMENTTYPES C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D WHERE A.ID_PROFILE= B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE= C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND EXISTS (select 'x' from security e where b.system_id=e.thing and e.PERSONORGROUP in (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@) and e.ACCESSRIGHTS>0) @filters@ @filtersEsito@ GROUP BY A.ID_PROFILE ORDER BY MAX(A.DTA_SPEDIZIONE) DESC

query.name: GET_REPORT_SPEDIZIONI_DETAILS
query.value: SELECT A.ID_PROFILE AS IDDOCUMENT, B.DOCNAME AS PROTOCOLLO, b.NUM_PROTO as NUM_PROTOCOLLO, B.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, C.DESCRIPTION AS MEZZO, D.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESTINATARIO, A.VAR_INDIRIZZO AS MAIL, A.DTA_SPEDIZIONE AS DATASPEDIZIONE, A.STATUS_C_MASK AS MASK, E.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST AS TIPO_DEST, A.VAR_PROTO_DEST AS PROTO_DEST, A.DTA_PROTO_DEST AS DATA_PROTO_DEST, A.VAR_MOTIVO_ANNULLA AS MOTIVO_ANNULLA, (SELECT MAX(mail_mittente) FROM DPA_SEND_STO k WHERE k.esito='Spedito' and k.dta_spedizione>=a.dta_spedizione and k.id_profile=a.id_profile and k.id_corr_globale=a.id_corr_globale) AS MAIL_MITTENTE FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO A, PROFILE B, DOCUMENTTYPES C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR E WHERE A.ID_PROFILE= B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE= C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND E.ID_PROFILE= A.ID_PROFILE AND E.ID_MITT_DEST= A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE @filters@ ORDER BY A.ID_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR

query.name: GET_REPORT_SPEDIZIONI_BY_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT A.ID_PROFILE AS IDDOCUMENT, B.DOCNAME AS PROTOCOLLO, b.NUM_PROTO as NUM_PROTOCOLLO, B.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, C.DESCRIPTION AS MEZZO, D.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESTINATARIO, A.VAR_INDIRIZZO AS MAIL, A.DTA_SPEDIZIONE AS DATASPEDIZIONE, A.STATUS_C_MASK AS MASK, E.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST AS TIPO_DEST, A.VAR_PROTO_DEST AS PROTO_DEST, A.DTA_PROTO_DEST AS DATA_PROTO_DEST, A.VAR_MOTIVO_ANNULLA AS MOTIVO_ANNULLA, (SELECT MAX(mail_mittente) FROM DPA_SEND_STO k WHERE k.esito='Spedito' and k.dta_spedizione>=a.dta_spedizione and k.id_profile=a.id_profile and k.id_corr_globale=a.id_corr_globale) AS MAIL_MITTENTE FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO A, PROFILE B, DOCUMENTTYPES C, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI D, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR E WHERE A.ID_PROFILE= B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPE= C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND E.ID_PROFILE= A.ID_PROFILE AND E.ID_MITT_DEST= A.ID_CORR_GLOBALE @filters@ AND A.ID_PROFILE = @iddocumento@ ORDER BY A.ID_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_SING_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT c.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA a, dpa_corr_globali c WHERE a.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = c.SYSTEM_ID and a.cha_tipo_dest = 'R' @param1@

query.name: S_CODA_PROCESSO_FILEINFO
query.value:
SELECT * from (
SELECT C.DOCNUMBER, C.VERSION_ID, C.PATH, C.CHA_FIRMATO, PE.ID_AMM, P.AUTHOR, P.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, C.FILE_INFO FROM COMPONENTS C , PROFILE P, PEOPLE PE WHERE FILE_INFO LIKE '%8' and C.CHA_FIRMATO = '1' AND C.DOCNUMBER = P.DOCNUMBER AND P.AUTHOR = PE.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY C.DTA_FILE_ACQUIRED DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10000

query.name: S_CODA_PROCESSO_SIGN_TYPE
query.value:
SELECT * from (
SELECT C.DOCNUMBER, C.VERSION_ID, C.PATH, C.CHA_FIRMATO, C.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE, PE.ID_AMM, P.AUTHOR, P.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, C.CHA_TIPO_FIRMA FROM COMPONENTS C , PROFILE P, PEOPLE PE WHERE C.CHA_TIPO_FIRMA IS NULL and C.CHA_FIRMATO = '1' AND C.DOCNUMBER = P.DOCNUMBER AND P.AUTHOR = PE.SYSTEM_ID AND C.VERSION_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER = C.DOCNUMBER ) ORDER BY C.DTA_FILE_ACQUIRED DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= @rowCount@

query.name: I_DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS
U_DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS SET DISABLED = @disbled@, PRINT_FREQ = @print_freq@, DTA_NEXT_PRINT = TO_DATE('@dta_next_print@','dd/mm/yyyy'), PRINT_HOUR = @print_hour@ WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS
query.value: SELECT S.PRINT_FREQ||'_'||s.DISABLED AS FREQUENZA_DISABLED FROM DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS S WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS_ORA_STAMPA
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(s.dta_next_print, 'DD/MM/YYYY')||'_'||s.print_hour as info_next_print FROM dpa_config_stampa_cons s WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_DTA_LAST_PRINT_FROM_DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS
query.value: SELECT S.DTA_LAST_PRINT AS FREQUENZA_DISABLED FROM DPA_CONFIG_STAMPA_CONS S WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: U_UPDATE_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES_FROM_PGU
query.value: UPDATE DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SET FILE_TYPE_PRESERVATION = @fileTypePreservation@, FILE_TYPE_VALIDATION = @fileTypeValidation@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: S_LOG_CONSERVAZIONE_AZIONE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT var_codice, var_descrizione FROM dpa_anagrafica_log WHERE var_oggetto='CONSERVAZIONE' AND var_codice NOT LIKE 'AMM_%' ORDER BY var_descrizione

query.name: S_SIMPLE_SEARCH_GET_COUNT_DOC
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, CODICE FROM ( SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, (CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NOT NULL THEN a.num_proto WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN a.docnumber END) AS codice FROM PROFILE a WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM security e WHERE a.system_id = e.thing AND e.PERSONORGROUP IN (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AND e.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0) AND ( ( @tipiDoc@) AND NVL (A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, '0') = '0' @dataFrom@ @dataTo@ AND ( @simplesearchoggetto@ )) union (SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, (CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NOT NULL THEN a.num_proto WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN a.docnumber END) AS codice FROM PROFILE a WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM security e WHERE a.system_id = e.thing AND e.PERSONORGROUP IN (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AND e.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0) AND ( ( @tipiDoc@) AND NVL (A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, '0') = '0' @dataFrom@ @dataTo@ and a.num_proto = @simplesearchnumber@) union ( SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID,(CASE WHEN a.num_proto IS NOT NULL THEN a.num_proto WHEN a.num_proto IS NULL THEN a.docnumber END) AS codice FROM PROFILE a WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM security e WHERE a.system_id = e.thing AND e.PERSONORGROUP IN (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AND e.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0) AND ( ( @tipiDoc@) AND NVL (A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, '0') = '0' @dataFrom@ @dataTo@ and(EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par dp,dpa_corr_globali sim WHERE a.system_id = dp.id_profile AND sim.system_id = dp.id_mitt_dest AND a.SYSTEM_ID = dp.ID_PROFILE AND @simplesearchmittdest@)))) @fulltext@ ))

query.name: S_RIC_DOC_SIMPLE_SEARCH
S_NOTIFICHE_RIFIUTO_REPORT
query.value: SELECT cha_tipo_doc AS TIPO_DOC, var_oggetto AS OGGETTO, cod_fasc, TO_CHAR(data_ins, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATA_INS, Vardescribe(dpa_items_conservazione.id_profile, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') as SEGNATURA, Vardescribe(dpa_items_conservazione.id_profile, 'DATADOC') as DATA_PROT_OR_CREA, size_item, validazione_firma, esito_firma, validazione_marca, validazione_formato FROM dpa_items_conservazione WHERE id_conservazione = @idIst@ ORDER BY cod_fasc

query.name: S_NOTIFICHE_RIFIUTO_REPORT_POLICY
query.value: SELECT cha_tipo_doc AS TIPO_DOC, var_oggetto AS OGGETTO, cod_fasc, TO_CHAR(data_ins, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATA_INS, Vardescribe(dpa_items_conservazione.id_profile, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') as SEGNATURA, Vardescribe(dpa_items_conservazione.id_profile, 'DATADOC') as DATA_PROT_OR_CREA, mask_validazione_policy FROM dpa_items_conservazione WHERE id_conservazione = @idIst@ ORDER BY cod_fasc

query.name: S_FIRSTDAY_YEAR
query.value: select concat('01/01/', to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')) as DAY from dual

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE
query.value: select ae.cha_stato as stato, ae.cha_certificazione as certificata, count(ae.system_id) as totale from dpa_area_esibizione ae inner join dpa_amministra a on ae.id_amm = a.system_id where upper(a.var_codice_amm) = upper('@codiceAmministrazione@') and ae.id_ruolo_in_uo = @idRuoloInUo@ and ae.id_people = @idPeople@ group by ae.cha_stato, ae.cha_certificazione

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE_CONSERVAZIONE
query.value: select ae.cha_stato as stato, ae.cha_certificazione as certificata, count(ae.system_id) as totale from dpa_area_esibizione ae inner join dpa_amministra a on ae.id_amm = a.system_id where upper(a.var_codice_amm) = upper('@codiceAmministrazione@') --and ae.id_ruolo_in_uo = @idRuoloInUo@ --and ae.id_people = @idPeople@ group by ae.cha_stato, ae.cha_certificazione

query.name: U_SizeItemEsib
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE SET SIZE_ITEM=@size@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@sysId@

query.name: U_DPA_ITEMS_ESIB
S_getInEsibizione
query.value: select getInEsibizione(@idProfile@, @idProject@, '@typeId@', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@, @idIstanzaConservazione@) as inEsibizione from dual

query.name: S_ISTANZE_ESIBIZIONE
S_ESIBIZIONE1
D_ELIMINA_DOC_ESIBIZIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_items_esibizione WHERE system_id IN (@idDoc@)

query.name: D_ELIMINA_ISTANZA_ESIBIZIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_area_esibizione WHERE system_id IN (@idEsib@)

query.name: D_ELIMINA_DOC_ISTANZA_ESIBIZIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_items_esibizione WHERE id_esibizione IN (@idEsib@)

query.name: U_ESIBIZIONE_FIELDS
U_ESIBIZIONE_RICHIEDI_CERTIF
query.value: UPDATE dpa_area_esibizione SET cha_stato='I', cha_certificazione='1', id_profile_certificazione=@docNumber@ WHERE system_id=@idEs@

query.name: S_ESIBIZIONE_CERTIF
query.value: SELECT Vardescribe(DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE.ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') AS SEGNATURA, Vardescribe(DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE.ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DATA_PROT_OR_CREA, DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE.var_oggetto, C.var_impronta FROM DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE, components C WHERE DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE.id_esibizione=@idEsib@ AND DPA_ITEMS_ESIBIZIONE.id_profile = C.docnumber

query.name: U_ESIBIZIONE_SALVA_CERT
query.value: UPDATE dpa_area_esibizione SET cha_stato='@stato@', data_certificazione=@dataCert@, id_people_certificatore='@idPeopleCert@' WHERE system_id = @idEsib@

query.name: U_ESIBIZIONE_RIFIUTA_CERT
query.value: UPDATE dpa_area_esibizione SET cha_stato='R', data_rifiuto=@dataRif@, var_note_rifiuto='@noteRif@', id_people_certificatore='@idPeopleCert@' WHERE system_id=@idEsib@

query.name: D_ESIBIZIONE_ELIMINA_ISTANZA
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_area_esibizione WHERE system_id = @idEsib@

query.name: U_ESIBIZIONE_RIABILITA_ITEMS
query.value: UPDATE dpa_items_esibizione SET id_esibizione = @newId@ WHERE id_esibizione = @oldId@

query.name: I_ISTANZE_ESIBIZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO dpa_area_esibizione ( system_id, id_amm, id_people, id_ruolo_in_uo, cha_stato, var_note, var_descrizione, data_creazione, data_rifiuto ) VALUES ( SEQ_dpa_area_esibizione.nextval, @idAmm@, @idPeople@, @idRuolo@, 'N', '@note@', '@descr@', @dataCreaz@, @dataRif@ )

query.name: U_ESIBIZIONE_STATO
query.value: UPDATE dpa_area_conservazione SET cha_stato='@stato@' @params@ WHERE system_id=@idEsib@

query.name: S_ESIBIZIONE_GET_ID_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE id_gruppo = @idgruppo@

query.name: I_INST_ACC
query.value: INSERT INTO INST_ACC VALUES(@value@)

query.name: I_INST_ACC_DOC
query.value: INSERT INTO INST_ACC_DOC VALUES(@value@)

query.name: I_INST_ACC_ATT
query.value: INSERT INTO INST_ACC_ATT VALUES(@value@)

query.name: S_INST_ACC_STATE_DOWNLOAD
query.value: SELECT cha_stato_download_inoltro AS STATE_DOWNLOAD_FORWARD FROM INST_ACC WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idInstanceAccess@

query.name: S_INST_ACC_ID_PROFILE_DOWNLOAD
