query.value: Update Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma Set Concluso_Il = @dataConclusione@, stato='@stato@', CHA_INTERROTTO_DA='@interrottoDa@', MOTIVO_RESPINGIMENTO='@noteInterruption@' where Id_Istanza = @idIstanza@

query.name: U_DPA_ISTANZA_PASSI_FIRMA_STOP
query.value: Update Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma SET stato_passo = '@stato@' Where Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma.id_istanza_Processo = @idIstanza@ AND NUMERO_SEQUENZA >= @numPasso@

query.name: S_DOC_IN_LIBRO_FIRMA
query.value: SELECT IN_LIBROFIRMA FROM PROFILE WHERE Docnumber = '@docnumber@' AND In_Librofirma = '1'

query.name: S_DOC_ALL_IN_LIBRO_FIRMA
query.value: SELECT IN_LIBROFIRMA FROM PROFILE WHERE (Docnumber = @docnumber@ OR ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = @docnumber@) AND In_Librofirma = '1'

query.name: S_DPA_ELEMENTO_LIBRO_FIRMA_TYPE_SIGNATURE
query.value: SELECT TIPO_FIRMA FROM DPA_ELEMENTO_IN_LIBRO_FIRMA WHERE DOC_NUMBER = @docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID = @versionId@

query.name: S_GET_INFO_DOCUMENTO_LITE
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE A WHERE (A.SYSTEM_ID = @docnumber@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL) OR (A.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@docnumber@))

query.name: S_DPA_ISTANZA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_DOC_ATTACH
query.value: SELECT I.ID_ISTANZA, I.ID_DOCUMENTO, I.DOC_ALL, I.NUM_ALL, I.DESCRIZIONE, P.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO FROM DPA_ISTANZA_PROCESSO_FIRMA I INNER JOIN PROFILE P ON I.ID_DOCUMENTO = P.DOCNUMBER WHERE I.CONCLUSO_IL IS NULL AND (P.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = @docnumber@ OR P.DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@)

query.name: S_ISTANZA_WAIT
query.value: Select Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma.Id_Istanza_Passo, Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Version_Id, Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Id_Istanza, Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma.Numero_Sequenza, Dpa_Elemento_In_Libro_Firma.Id_Doc_Principale, Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.note, Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Id_Ruolo_Proponente, Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Id_Utente_Proponente From Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma Inner Join Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma On Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma.Id_Istanza_Processo = Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Id_Istanza Inner Join Dpa_Elemento_In_Libro_Firma On Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Id_Documento = Dpa_Elemento_In_Libro_Firma.Id_Doc_Principale Where Dpa_Elemento_In_Libro_Firma.Id_Istanza_Passo = @idIstanzaPasso@ And Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma.Concluso_Il Is Null And Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma.Tipo_Firma = 'WAITING' And Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma.Stato_Passo = 'LOOK'

query.name: S_DPA_ISTANZA_PASSO_EXECUTE_OPERATION
query.value: SELECT ID_ELEMENTO FROM DPA_ELEMENTO_IN_LIBRO_FIRMA E WHERE E.DOC_NUMBER = @docnumber@ AND E.TIPO_FIRMA ='@tipoOperazione@' AND DTA_ESECUZIONE IS NULL AND ID_RUOLO_TITOLARE = @idRuolo@ AND (ID_UTENTE_TITOLARE IS NULL OR ID_UTENTE_TITOLARE = @idPeople@) AND (ID_UTENTE_LOCKER IS NULL OR ID_UTENTE_LOCKER = @idPeople@)

query.name: S_DPA_ISTANZA_PASSO_FIRMA_CUT
query.value: SELECT ID_ISTANZA_PASSO FROM DPA_ISTANZA_PASSO_FIRMA WHERE ID_ISTANZA_PROCESSO = @idIstanzaProcesso@ AND STATO_PASSO='CUT' AND ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_RUOLO_TITOLARE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.ID_PROCESSO, P.NOME, getcodRuolo(P.RUOLO_AUTORE) AS RUOLO_AUTORE FROM DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA P INNER JOIN DPA_PASSO_DI_FIRMA PF ON P.ID_PROCESSO = PF.ID_PROCESSO WHERE PF.ID_RUOLO_COINVOLTO = @idRuoloTitolare@ AND (P.TICK is null Or P.Tick = 0) ORDER BY P.ID_PROCESSO DESC

query.name: S_COUNT_DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_RUOLO_TITOLARE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.ID_PROCESSO) FROM DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA P INNER JOIN DPA_PASSO_DI_FIRMA PF ON P.ID_PROCESSO = PF.ID_PROCESSO WHERE PF.ID_RUOLO_COINVOLTO = @idRuoloTitolare@ AND (P.TICK is null Or P.Tick = 0) ORDER BY P.ID_PROCESSO DESC

query.name: S_DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_UTENTE_TITOLARE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.ID_PROCESSO, P.NOME, getcodRuolo(P.RUOLO_AUTORE) AS RUOLO_AUTORE FROM DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA P INNER JOIN DPA_PASSO_DI_FIRMA PF ON P.ID_PROCESSO = PF.ID_PROCESSO WHERE PF.Id_Utente_Coinvolto = @idUtenteTitolare@ @idRuoloCoinvolto@ AND (P.TICK is null Or P.Tick = 0) ORDER BY P.ID_PROCESSO DESC

query.name: S_COUNT_DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_UTENTE_TITOLARE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.ID_PROCESSO) FROM DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA P INNER JOIN DPA_PASSO_DI_FIRMA PF ON P.ID_PROCESSO = PF.ID_PROCESSO WHERE PF.Id_Utente_Coinvolto = @idUtenteTitolare@ @idRuoloCoinvolto@ AND (P.TICK is null Or P.Tick = 0) ORDER BY P.ID_PROCESSO DESC

query.name: S_DPA_ISTANZA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_RUOLO_TITOLARE
query.value: Select Distinct P.Id_Istanza, P.Id_Processo, P.Descrizione, P.Attivato_Il, P.Concluso_Il, P.Notifica_Concluso, P.Notifica_Interrotto, P.Note, P.Stato, P.MOTIVO_RESPINGIMENTO, P.DOC_ALL, P.ID_DOCUMENTO, P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE AS ID_GRUPPO, --GETDESCRUOLO(P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE) AS Group_Name, --getcodRuolo(P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE) as Group_Id, --getRuoloSystemIdCorr(P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE) as Id_Corr, P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE AS ID_UTENTE --getpeopleuserid(P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE) AS USER_CODE, --getpeoplename(P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE) AS USER_DESCRIPTION, --getCorrSystemId(P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE) AS USER_SYSTEM_ID From Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma P Inner Join Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma Pf On P.Id_Istanza = Pf.Id_Istanza_Processo Where Pf.Id_Ruolo_Coinvolto = @idRuoloTitolare@ And P.Concluso_Il Is Null And P.Stato = 'IN_EXEC'

query.name: S_COUNT_DPA_ISTANZA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_RUOLO_TITOLARE
query.value: Select count(Distinct P.Id_Istanza) From Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma P Inner Join Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma Pf On P.Id_Istanza = Pf.Id_Istanza_Processo Where Pf.Id_Ruolo_Coinvolto = @idRuoloTitolare@ And P.Concluso_Il Is Null And P.Stato = 'IN_EXEC'

query.name: S_DPA_ISTANZA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_UTENTE_TITOLARE
query.value: Select Distinct P.Id_Istanza, P.Id_Processo, P.Descrizione, P.Attivato_Il, P.Concluso_Il, P.Notifica_Concluso, P.Notifica_Interrotto, P.Note, P.Stato, P.MOTIVO_RESPINGIMENTO, P.DOC_ALL, P.ID_DOCUMENTO, P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE AS ID_GRUPPO, --GETDESCRUOLO(P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE) AS Group_Name, --getcodRuolo(P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE) as Group_Id, --getRuoloSystemIdCorr(P.ID_RUOLO_PROPONENTE) as Id_Corr, P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE AS ID_UTENTE --getpeopleuserid(P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE) AS USER_CODE, --getpeoplename(P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE) AS USER_DESCRIPTION, --getCorrSystemId(P.ID_UTENTE_PROPONENTE) AS USER_SYSTEM_ID From Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma P Inner Join Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma Pf On P.Id_Istanza = Pf.Id_Istanza_Processo Where Pf.Id_Utente_Coinvolto = @idUtenteTitolare@ @idRuoloCoinvolto@ And P.Concluso_Il Is Null And P.Stato = 'IN_EXEC'

query.name: S_COUNT_DPA_ISTANZA_PROCESSO_FIRMA_BY_UTENTE_TITOLARE
query.value: Select COUNT(Distinct P.Id_Istanza) From Dpa_Istanza_Processo_Firma P Inner Join Dpa_Istanza_Passo_Firma Pf On P.Id_Istanza = Pf.Id_Istanza_Processo Where Pf.Id_Utente_Coinvolto = @idUtenteTitolare@ And P.Concluso_Il Is Null And P.Stato = 'IN_EXEC' @idRuoloCoinvolto@

query.name: U_DPA_PASSO_TICK
query.value: Update DPA_PASSO_DI_FIRMA Set TICK = '@tipoTick@' WHERE ID_PASSO IN (@idPassi@)

query.name: U_DPA_PROCESSO_TICK
query.value: Update DPA_SCHEMA_PROCESSO_FIRMA Set TICK = 1 WHERE ID_PROCESSO IN (Select Id_Processo from Dpa_Passo_Di_Firma Where Id_Passo in (@idPassi@))

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_RUOLO_BY_ID_AMM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_CODICE, VAR_DESC_RUOLO FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ order by var_desc_ruolo asc

query.name: S_DPA_FIRMA_ELETTRONICA
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_FIRMA_ELETTRONICA WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO=@docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID=@versionId@ AND XML IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DATA_APPOSIZIONE

query.name: U_COMPONENTS_CHA_FIRMATO
query.value: UPDATE COMPONENTS SET CHA_FIRMATO= '1' WHERE DOCNUMBER=@docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID=@versionId@

query.name: U_COMPONENTS_CHA_TIPO_FIRMA
query.value: UPDATE COMPONENTS SET CHA_TIPO_FIRMA= '@tipoFirma@' WHERE DOCNUMBER=@docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID=@versionId@

query.name: S_DPA_FIRMA_ELETTRONICA_IS_SIGNED
query.value: SELECT ID_FIRMA FROM DPA_FIRMA_ELETTRONICA WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO = @docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID = @versionId@ AND ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_INTEROP_ENABLED_SAVE_MAIL
query.value: SELECT cha_salva_mail_loc FROM dpa_mail_registri WHERE id_registro=@idReg@

listeQuery.query: U_EXT_PROFILE UPDATE PROFILE SET EXT = GETCHAIMG(@docnumber@) WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@

query.name: S_DPA_UPLOAD_FILE
query.value: Select Id_People, Id_Ruolo ,File_Hash ,Sender_Name ,Sender_Path ,File_Name ,File_Description ,File_Size ,File_Part ,Total_Part ,File_Path ,Start_Date ,Num_Order ,End_Date ,UnicStr From Dpa_Upload_File Where Id_People = @IdUtente@ AND UnicStr = '@identity@' --File_Name = '@fileName@' AND File_Description = '@fileDescription@' --AND File_Hash = '@fileHash@'

query.name: S_DPA_UPLOAD_FILE_LIST
query.value: Select Id_People, Id_Ruolo ,File_Hash,Sender_Name,Sender_Path,File_Name,File_Description ,File_Size,File_Part,Total_Part,File_Path ,Start_Date,Num_Order,End_Date, UnicStr From Dpa_Upload_File Where Id_People = @IdUtente@ AND Sender_Name = '@MachineName@' And End_Date Is Null ORDER BY Num_Order

query.name: I_DPA_UPLOAD_FILE
query.value: INSERT INTO Dpa_Upload_File (Id_People, Id_Ruolo ,File_Hash ,Sender_Name ,Sender_Path ,File_Name ,File_Description ,File_Size ,File_Part ,Total_Part ,File_Path ,Num_Order ,Start_Date ,UnicStr) Values (@Id_People@ ,@Id_Ruolo@ ,'@File_Hash@' ,'@Sender_Name@' ,'@Sender_Path@' ,'@File_Name@' ,'@File_Description@' ,@File_Size@ ,@File_Part@ ,@Total_Part@ ,'@File_Path@' ,@Ordine@ ,Sysdate ,'@identity@')

query.name: U_DPA_UPLOAD_FILE
query.value: Update Dpa_Upload_File Set ID_RUOLO=@IdRuolo@, File_Name = '@File_Name@', File_Part = @File_Part@, NUM_ORDER=@Ordine@, Total_Part=@TotalChunk@, File_Path='@File_Path@', End_Date = @End_Date@, File_Description = '@File_Description@' Where Id_People = @IdUtente@ AND UnicStr = '@identity@' --AND File_Hash = '@fileHash@'

query.name: D_DPA_UPLOAD_FILE
query.value: DELETE Dpa_Upload_File Where Id_People = @IdUtente@ AND File_Name = '@fileName@' AND File_Description = '@fileDescription@' --AND File_Hash = '@fileHash@'

query.name: S_DPA_BIGFILE_LIST
query.value: Select Id_People ,Id_Ruolo ,File_Hash ,Sender_Name ,Sender_Path ,File_Name , File_Description, File_Size ,File_Part ,Total_Part ,File_Path ,Start_Date ,Num_Order ,End_Date, UnicStr From Dpa_Upload_File Where Id_People = @IdUtente@ OR Id_Ruolo = @IdRuolo@ ORDER BY Start_Date desc

query.name: S_PDF_PREVIEW
query.value: SELECT DOC_NUMBER,VERSION_ID,TOTAL_PAGES, PAGE_TO,PAGE_FROM,FILE_HASH,PATH FROM DPA_PREVIEW WHERE VERSION_ID = @versionId@ AND DOC_NUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: I_PDF_PREVIEW
S_DPA_ULTIMI_DOC_VISUALIZZATI
query.value: SELECT D.SYSTEM_ID, D.ID_PEOPLE, D.ID_GRUPPO, D.ID_AMM, D.ID_PROFILE, P.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, P.VAR_SEGNATURA AS SEGNATURA FROM DPA_ULTIMI_DOC_VISUALIZZATI D JOIN PROFILE P ON D.ID_PROFILE = P.SYSTEM_ID WHERE ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@ AND ID_GRUPPO = @idGruppo@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@ ORDER BY DTA_VISUALIZZAZIONE DESC

query.name: S_DPA_TRASMISSIONE_DOC
query.value: SELECT GETCODRUBRICACORR(S.ID_CORR_GLOBALE) as VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE T JOIN DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA S ON T.SYSTEM_ID = S.ID_TRASMISSIONE WHERE T.ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@

query.name: S_PROFILE_INFO_DOC_BY_NUM_PROTO
query.value: SELECT P.DOCNAME, P.SYSTEM_ID, getPeopleUserId(P.ID_PEOPLE_PROT) CODICE_PEOPLE, GETCODRUBRICACORR(P.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE) CODICE_RUOLO, GETCODRUBRICACORR(P.ID_UO_PROT) as CODICE_UO, T.VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM PROFILE P LEFT JOIN DPA_TIPO_ATTO T ON P.ID_TIPO_ATTO = T.SYSTEM_ID WHERE NUM_PROTO = @numProto@ and GETIDAMM(p.author) = @idAmm@ and p.id_registro = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM dpa_el_registri where UPPER(var_codice) ='@codiceRegistro@') and num_anno_proto = @anno@

query.name: S_PROFILE_INFO_DOC_BY_DOCNUMBER
query.value: SELECT P.DOCNAME, P.SYSTEM_ID, getPeopleUserId(P.ID_PEOPLE_PROT) CODICE_PEOPLE, GETCODRUBRICACORR(P.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE) CODICE_RUOLO, GETCODRUBRICACORR(P.ID_UO_PROT) as CODICE_UO, T.VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM PROFILE P LEFT JOIN DPA_TIPO_ATTO T ON P.ID_TIPO_ATTO = T.SYSTEM_ID WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=@docnumber@

query.name: S_GET_COD_FASC_BY_DOC
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE, DESCRIPTION FROM PROJECT F WHERE F.SYSTEM_ID in ( SELECT P.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS C JOIN PROJECT P ON C.PROJECT_ID = P.SYSTEM_ID where c.link= @idProfile@ )

query.name: S_DPA_SPEDIZIONI_DOC
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM dpa_stato_invio where id_profile= @idProfile@ and rownum = 1

query.name: ALBO_S_DA_NOTIFICARE
query.value: SELECT L.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS CODE_AMM, A.DOC_NUMBER AS ID_DOC, B.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS STATO_DOC, B.ID_DIAGRAMMA AS ID_DIAGRAMMA, TO_CHAR(C.CREATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as data_creazione, C.EXT, D.USER_ID, E.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS USER_RUOLO, G.VALORE_OGGETTO_DB AS DURATA, I.VALORE_OGGETTO_DB AS DATA_PUBB, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE ax, versions ay WHERE ax.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = c.system_id AND (ax.EXT IS NOT NULL AND UPPER(ax.EXT) !='PDF') and ax.system_id = ay.docnumber and ay.cha_allegati_esterno='0') AS ALL_NON_VALIDI FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI A, DPA_STATI B, PROFILE C ,PEOPLE D , DPA_CORR_GLOBALI E, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM F, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES G, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM H, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES I, DPA_AMMINISTRA L WHERE A.ID_STATO= B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_DIAGRAMMA IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI_STATO WHERE VAR_DESCRIZIONE LIKE 'ALT%') AND UPPER(B.VAR_DESCRIZIONE) IN ('DA PUBBLICARE','DA REVOCARE', 'DA ANNULLARE') AND A.DOC_NUMBER=C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.AUTHOR = D.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE= E.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(F.DESCRIZIONE)='DURATA' AND F.SYSTEM_ID= G.ID_OGGETTO AND G.DOC_NUMBER= C.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(H.DESCRIZIONE)='DATA DI PUBBLICAZIONE' AND H.SYSTEM_ID= I.ID_OGGETTO AND I.DOC_NUMBER= C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.SYSTEM_ID > @min_id_doc@ AND L.SYSTEM_ID = E.ID_AMM ORDER BY C.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: ALBO_UTN_S_DA_NOTIFICARE
query.value: SELECT L.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS CODE_AMM, A.DOC_NUMBER AS ID_DOC, B.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS STATO_DOC, B.ID_DIAGRAMMA AS ID_DIAGRAMMA, TO_CHAR(C.CREATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as data_creazione, C.EXT, D.USER_ID, E.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS USER_RUOLO, G.VALORE_OGGETTO_DB AS DURATA, I.VALORE_OGGETTO_DB AS DATA_PUBB, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE ax, versions ay WHERE ax.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = c.system_id AND (ax.EXT IS NOT NULL AND UPPER(ax.EXT) !='PDF') and ax.system_id = ay.docnumber and ay.cha_allegati_esterno='0') AS ALL_NON_VALIDI FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI A, DPA_STATI B, PROFILE C ,PEOPLE D , DPA_CORR_GLOBALI E, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM F, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES G, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM H, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES I, DPA_AMMINISTRA L WHERE A.ID_STATO= B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_DIAGRAMMA IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI_STATO WHERE VAR_DESCRIZIONE LIKE 'ALT%') AND UPPER(B.VAR_DESCRIZIONE) IN ('DA PUBBLICARE', 'DA ANNULLARE') AND A.DOC_NUMBER=C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.AUTHOR = D.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE= E.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(F.DESCRIZIONE) LIKE 'DURATA DI PUBBLICAZIONE%' AND F.SYSTEM_ID= G.ID_OGGETTO AND G.DOC_NUMBER= C.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(H.DESCRIZIONE)='DATA DI PUBBLICAZIONE' AND H.SYSTEM_ID= I.ID_OGGETTO AND I.DOC_NUMBER= C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.SYSTEM_ID > @min_id_doc@ AND L.SYSTEM_ID = E.ID_AMM ORDER BY C.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_DPA_LOG_BY_ID_OGGETTO_COD_AZIONE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_LOG WHERE ID_OGGETTO = @param1@ AND VAR_COD_AZIONE = '@param2@' UNION SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO WHERE ID_OGGETTO = @param1@ AND VAR_COD_AZIONE = '@param2@' ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: U_PROFILE_CHA_IN_CESTINO_DOC
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET CHA_IN_CESTINO = '1' WHERE @docnumber@

query.name: CTRL_STAMPE_REP_ERRORI
query.value: select id_amm,amministrazione,id_tipo, tipologia, idrepertorio, repertorio, inizio,datafine,decode(ultimastampa,null,'Mai stampato',ultimastampa) as ultimastampa,prossimastampa,frequenza, decode(registro,null,'Di Tipologia',registro) as registro, respstampa,ruolorespstampa,mailrespstampa,mail_resp_conservazione, num_doc, num_doc_annullati,num_doc_residui, tipo_abilitato, tipo_in_esercizio, utenteabilitato, fineruolo, ut_in_ruolo, (case when num_doc_residui=1 then 'ERRORE' else 'OK' end) as singolo_doc_ieri, (case when num_doc =1 then 'ERRORE' else 'OK' end) as singolo_doc, (case when ultimastampa = 'Mai stampato' then 'ERRORE' else 'OK' end) as mai_stampato from( select c.system_id as id_amm, c.var_desc_amm as amministrazione, b.system_id as id_tipo, b.var_desc_atto as tipologia, a.counterid as idrepertorio, g.descrizione as repertorio, to_char(a.dtastart,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inizio, to_char(a.dtafinish, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as datafine, to_char(a.dtalastprint, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as ultimastampa, to_char(a.dtanextautomaticprint, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as prossimastampa, decode(a.printfreq,'D','Giornaliera','N','Non abilitata','M','Mensile','W','Settimanale','FD','15 giorni') as frequenza, (select var_codice || ' - ' || var_desc_registro from dpa_el_registri where system_id = a.registryid or system_id =a.rfid) as registro, d.full_name as respStampa, f.var_desc_corr as RuoloRespStampa, d.email_address as mailrespstampa, (select email_address from people where system_id = c.id_utente_resp_cons) as mail_resp_conservazione, (select count(*) from dpa_associazione_templates where id_oggetto = a.counterid and valore_oggetto_db is not null and dta_ins>a.dtalastprint and id_aoo_rf in (a.registryid, a.rfid,0) ) as num_doc, (select count(*) from dpa_associazione_templates where id_oggetto = a.counterid and valore_oggetto_db is not null and dta_annullamento>a.dtalastprint and id_aoo_rf in (a.registryid, a.rfid,0) ) as num_doc_annullati, (select count(*) from dpa_associazione_templates where id_oggetto = a.counterid and valore_oggetto_db is not null and dta_ins>a.dtalastprint and dta_ins < (sysdate -1) and id_aoo_rf in (a.registryid, a.rfid,0) ) as num_doc_residui, decode(b.abilitato_si_no,1,'OK',0,'ERRORE') as tipo_abilitato, decode(b.in_esercizio,'SI','OK','NO','ERRORE') as tipo_in_esercizio, decode(d.disabled,'N','OK','Y','ERRORE') as UtenteAbilitato, decode(f.dta_fine,null,'OK','ERRORE') as fineruolo, decode(e.dta_fine,null,'OK','ERRORE') as ut_in_ruolo from dpa_registri_repertorio a , dpa_tipo_atto b, dpa_amministra c, people d, peoplegroups e, dpa_corr_globali f, dpa_oggetti_custom g where a.dtafinish > sysdate and b.system_id = a.tipologyid and c.system_id = b.id_amm and d.system_id = a.printeruserrespid and f.id_gruppo = a.printerrolerespid and d.system_id = e.people_system_id and f.id_gruppo = e.groups_system_id and g.system_id = a.counterid and a.dtalastprint < (a.dtanextautomaticprint -1) and a.dtanextautomaticprint < trunc(sysdate+1) ) where ultimastampa is null or num_doc>0 or num_doc_annullati>0 order by amministrazione, tipologia, registro

query.name: CTRL_STAMPE_REP_FILE_PRESENTE
query.value: select c.system_id as id_amm, c.var_desc_amm as amministrazione, b.system_id as id_tipo, b.var_desc_atto as tipologia, a.counterid as idrepertorio, g.descrizione as repertorio, to_char(a.dtastart,'dd/mm/yyyy') as inizio, to_char(a.dtafinish, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as datafine, to_char(a.dtalastprint, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as ultimastampa, to_char(a.dtanextautomaticprint, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as prossimastampa, decode(a.printfreq,'D','Giornaliera','N','Non abilitata','M','Mensile','W','Settimanale','FD','15 giorni') as frequenza, (select var_codice || ' - ' || var_desc_registro from dpa_el_registri where system_id = a.registryid or system_id =a.rfid) as registro, d.full_name as respStampa, f.var_desc_corr as RuoloRespStampa , d.email_address as mailrespstampa, (select email_address from people where system_id = c.id_utente_resp_cons) as mail_resp_conservazione, h.docnumber as iddocstampa, to_char(h.dta_stampa, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as datastampa from dpa_registri_repertorio a , dpa_tipo_atto b, dpa_amministra c, people d, peoplegroups e, dpa_corr_globali f, dpa_oggetti_custom g, dpa_stampa_repertori h where a.dtafinish > sysdate and b.system_id = a.tipologyid and c.system_id = b.id_amm and d.system_id = a.printeruserrespid and f.id_gruppo = a.printerrolerespid and d.system_id = e.people_system_id and f.id_gruppo = e.groups_system_id and g.system_id = a.counterid and h.id_repertorio = a.counterid and (not exists(select 'x' from components where docnumber = h.docnumber) or exists(select 'x' from components where docnumber = h.docnumber and var_impronta is null )) and h.dta_stampa > trunc(a.dtalastprint) and a.dtalastprint < (a.dtanextautomaticprint -1) and (h.registryid = a.rfid or h.registryid = a.registryid) order by c.var_desc_amm, b.var_desc_atto, h.docnumber

query.name: S_PROFILE_ATTACHMENTS
query.value: select docnumber from profile where id_documento_principale = @docnumber@

query.name: I_DPA_PLUGIN_HASH
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_PLUGIN_HASH (system_id, id_profile, id_people, dta_elab, hash_file) VALUES (seq.nextval,@param1@,@param2@,@param3@,@param4@)

query.name: S_DPA_PLUGIN_HASH
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_PROFILE, ID_PEOPLE, HASH_FILE, DTA_ELAB FROM DPA_PLUGIN_HASH WHERE HASH_FILE = @hashFile@

query.name: U_PROFILE_LAST_EDIT_DATE
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET LAST_EDIT_DATE= SYSDATE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @docnumber@ OR SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @docnumber@)

query.name: I_DPA_TASK
I_DPA_STATO_TASK
S_DPA_TASK_BY_ID_TRASM_SINGOLA
query.value: SELECT T.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TASK, T.ID_PROFILE, T.ID_PROJECT, T.ID_TRASMISSIONE, T.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, T.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, T.ID_PROFILE_REVIEW, T.ID_TIPO_ATTO, T.CHA_CONTRIBUTO, T.ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_GRUPPO_MITT, S.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATO_TASK, S.DTA_SCADENZA, S.DTA_APERTURA, S.DTA_ANNULLAMENTO, S.DTA_LAVORAZIONE, S.DTA_CHIUSURA, S.NOTE_LAVORAZIONE, S.NOTE_RIAPERTURA, S.CHA_STATO, GETDESCRUOLO(T.ID_RUOLO_MITT) AS GROUP_NAME_MITT, getcodRuolo(T.ID_RUOLO_MITT) as GROUP_ID_MITT, T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_UTENTE_MITT, getpeopleuserid(T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT) AS USER_CODE_MITT, getpeoplename(T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT) AS USER_DESCRIPTION_MITT, getCorrSystemId(T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT) AS USER_SYSTEM_ID_MITT, GETDESCRUOLO(T.ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER) AS GROUP_NAME_DEST, getcodRuolo(T.ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER) as GROUP_ID_DEST, T.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER AS ID_UTENTE_DEST, getpeopleuserid(T.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER) AS USER_CODE_DEST, getpeoplename(T.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER) AS USER_DESCRIPTION_DEST, T.ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER As ID_GRUPPO_DEST, CASE WHEN T.ID_PROJECT IS NULL THEN getObjectMainDoc(T.ID_PROFILE) ELSE (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = T.ID_PROJECT) END AS DESCRIPTION_OBJECT, CASE WHEN T.ID_PROFILE IS NULL THEN GETCODFASC(T.ID_PROJECT) END AS COD_PROJECT FROM DPA_TASK T, DPA_STATO_TASK S WHERE T.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = @idTrasmSingola@ AND S.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT MAX(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_STATO_TASK WHERE ID_TASK = T.SYSTEM_ID) AND CHA_STATO IN ('A', 'L', 'R')

query.name: S_DPA_TASK_RICEVUTI
query.value: SELECT T.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TASK, T.ID_PROFILE, T.ID_PROJECT, T.ID_TRASMISSIONE, T.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, T.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, T.ID_PROFILE_REVIEW, T.ID_TIPO_ATTO, T.CHA_CONTRIBUTO, T.ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_GRUPPO, R.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, S.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATO_TASK, S.DTA_SCADENZA, S.DTA_APERTURA, S.DTA_ANNULLAMENTO, S.DTA_LAVORAZIONE, S.DTA_CHIUSURA, S.NOTE_LAVORAZIONE, S.NOTE_RIAPERTURA, S.CHA_STATO, GETDESCRUOLO(T.ID_RUOLO_MITT) AS GROUP_NAME, getcodRuolo(T.ID_RUOLO_MITT) as GROUP_ID, T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_UTENTE, getpeopleuserid(T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT) AS USER_CODE, getpeoplename(T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT) AS USER_DESCRIPTION, getCorrSystemId(T.ID_PEOPLE_MITT) AS USER_SYSTEM_ID, CASE WHEN T.ID_PROJECT IS NULL THEN getObjectMainDoc(T.ID_PROFILE) ELSE (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = T.ID_PROJECT) END AS DESCRIPTION_OBJECT, CASE WHEN T.ID_PROFILE IS NULL THEN GETCODFASC(T.ID_PROJECT) END AS COD_PROJECT FROM DPA_TASK T, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM R, DPA_STATO_TASK S WHERE ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER = @idRuolo@ AND ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @idUtente@ AND R.SYSTEM_ID = T.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AND S.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT MAX(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_STATO_TASK WHERE ID_TASK = T.SYSTEM_ID) @filterLavorazione@ order by S.DTA_APERTURA desc

query.name: S_DPA_TASK_ASSEGNATI
query.value: SELECT T.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TASK, T.ID_PROFILE, T.ID_PROJECT, T.ID_TRASMISSIONE, T.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, T.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, T.ID_PROFILE_REVIEW, T.ID_TIPO_ATTO, T.CHA_CONTRIBUTO, T.ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER As ID_GRUPPO,R.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, S.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATO_TASK, S.DTA_SCADENZA, S.DTA_APERTURA, S.DTA_ANNULLAMENTO, S.DTA_LAVORAZIONE, S.DTA_CHIUSURA, S.NOTE_LAVORAZIONE, S.NOTE_RIAPERTURA, S.CHA_STATO, GETDESCRUOLO(T.ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER) AS GROUP_NAME, getcodRuolo(T.ID_RUOLO_RECEIVER) as GROUP_ID, T.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER AS ID_UTENTE, getpeopleuserid(T.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER) AS USER_CODE, getpeoplename(T.ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER) AS USER_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN T.ID_PROJECT IS NULL THEN getObjectMainDoc(T.ID_PROFILE) ELSE (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = T.ID_PROJECT) END AS DESCRIPTION_OBJECT, CASE WHEN T.ID_PROFILE IS NULL THEN GETCODFASC(T.ID_PROJECT) END AS COD_PROJECT FROM DPA_TASK T, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM R, DPA_STATO_TASK S WHERE ID_RUOLO_MITT = @idRuolo@ AND ID_PEOPLE_MITT = @idUtente@ and R.SYSTEM_ID=T.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AND S.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT MAX(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_STATO_TASK WHERE ID_TASK = T.SYSTEM_ID) AND CHA_STATO IN ('A', 'L', 'R') order by S.DTA_APERTURA desc

query.name: D_DPA_TASK
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TASK WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idTask@

query.name: U_DPA_STATO_TASK_CHIUDI_LAVORAZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_STATO_TASK SET DTA_LAVORAZIONE = @dataLavorazione@, CHA_STATO = 'L', NOTE_LAVORAZIONE= '@noteLavorazione@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idStatoTask@

query.name: U_DPA_STATO_TASK_DTA_CHIUSURA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_STATO_TASK SET DTA_CHIUSURA = @dataChiusura@, CHA_STATO = 'C' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idStatoTask@

query.name: U_DPA_STATO_TASK_DTA_ANNULLAMENTO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_STATO_TASK SET DTA_ANNULLAMENTO = @dataAnnullamento@, CHA_STATO = 'C' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idStatoTask@

query.name: U_DPA_TASK_ID_PROFILE_REVIEW
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TASK SET ID_PROFILE_REVIEW = @docnumber@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idTask@

query.name: U_DPA_TASK_ID_ID_PROFILE_REVIEW
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TASK SET ID_PROFILE_REVIEW = null WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idTask@

query.name: U_PROFILE_TASK_STATUS
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET CHA_TASK_STATUS='@status@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idProfile@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_NOTE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET VAR_NOTE_ACC = '@note@' || VAR_NOTE_ACC WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = @idTrasmSingola@ AND ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_RAGIONE
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_TASK FROM DPA_TIPO_RAGIONE WHERE ID_RAGIONE_TRASM= @idRagione@

query.name: S_DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idRagione@ and ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_DPA_TIPO_RAGIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_TIPO_RAGIONE ( ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, CHA_TIPO_TASK, ID_TIPO_ATTO, CHA_CONTRIBUTO_OBBLIGATORIO ) VALUES ( @idRagione@, '@chaTipoTask@', @idTipoAtto@, '@chaContributoObbligatorio@' )

query.name: AMM_U_DPA_TIPO_RAGIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TIPO_RAGIONE SET CHA_TIPO_TASK = '@chaTipoTask@', ID_TIPO_ATTO = @idTipoAtto@, CHA_CONTRIBUTO_OBBLIGATORIO = '@chaContributoObbligatorio@' WHERE ID_RAGIONE_TRASM = @idRagione@

query.name: I_DELETED_SECURITY_ACCESSRIGHT20
query.value: INSERT INTO DELETED_SECURITY (THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, NOTE, DTA_REVOCA, ID_UTENTE_REV, ID_RUOLO_REV, HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS, CHA_COPIA_VISIBILITA) ( SELECT S.THING, S.PERSONORGROUP, S.ACCESSRIGHTS, S.ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, S.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, 'Visibilita'' rimossa dall''amministratore per mancanza di utenti nel ruolo', @date@,null ,null , S.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS, S.CHA_COPIA_VISIBILITA FROM SECURITY S WHERE PERSONORGROUP = @idGruppo@ and ACCESSRIGHTS=20 )

query.name: D_SECURITY_ACCESSRIGHT20
query.value: DELETE FROM SECURITY WHERE PERSONORGROUP = @idGruppo@ and ACCESSRIGHTS=20

query.name: S_DPA_NOTIFY_COUNT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_NOTIFY WHERE ID_PEOPLE_RECEIVER = @idPeople@ AND (ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = @idGruppo@ OR ID_GROUP_RECEIVER = 0)

query.name: S_SIMPINTEROPRECEIVEDMESSAGE_BY_ID_PROFILE
query.value: Select SenderAdministrationCode AS SENDER_ADMINISTRATION_CODE, AOOCode AS SENDER_AOO_CODE, RecordNumber AS SENDER_RECORD_NUMBER, RecordDate AS SENDER_RECORD_DATE, SenderUrl AS SENDER_URL, ReceiverCode AS RECEIVER_CODE From SimpInteropReceivedMessage Where ProfileId = @idProfile@

query.name: S_PROFILE_RECEIVER_INFO
query.value: SELECT (SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = ID_REGISTRO) AS RECEIVER_AOO_CODE, NUM_PROTO AS RECEIVER_RECORD_NUMBER, DTA_PROTO AS RECEIVER_RECORD_DATE, (SELECT VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT ID_AMM FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = ID_UO_PROT)) as RECEIVER_ADMINISTRATOR_CODE FROM PROFILE Where System_id = @idProfile@

query.name: S_DPA_DESKTOP_APPS
query.value: SELECT NOME ,VERSIONE, PATH, DESCRIZIONE FROM DPA_DESKTOP_APPS

query.name: I_DPA_DESKTOP_APPS
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_DESKTOP_APPS (NOME,VERSIONE,PATH,DESCRIZIONE) VALUES ('@nome@','@versione@','@path@','@descrizione@')

query.name: U_DPA_DESKTOP_APP
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DESKTOP_APPS @parametri@ WHERE NOME = '@nome@'

query.name: D_DPA_DESKTOP_APP
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_DESKTOP_APPS WHERE NAME = '@nome@'

query.name: S_SELECT_ISTANZA_STATO_DA_STATO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_AREA_CONSERVAZIONE WHERE CHA_STATO = '@cha_stato@'

query.name: S_DPA_HSMPIN
query.value: SELECT PIN, ALIAS FROM DPA_HSMPIN WHERE PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @idPeople@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: I_DPA_HSMPIN
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_HSMPIN (PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID, ID_AMM, PIN, ALIAS) VALUES (@idPeople@, @idAmministrazione@, '@pin@', '@alias@')

query.name: U_DPA_HSMPIN
query.value: UPDATE DPA_HSMPIN SET PIN = '@pin@', ALIAS = '@alias@' WHERE PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @idPeople@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: D_DPA_HSMPIN
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_HSMPIN WHERE PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @idPeople@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_DPA_HSMPARAMETERS
query.value: SELECT ID_AMM, DOMINIO, TSAURL, TSAUSER, TSAPASSWORD, USERAPPLICATIVA, PASSWORDAPPLICATIVA, SERVERURL FROM DPA_HSMPARAMETERS WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: I_DPA_HSMPARAMETERS
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_HSMPARAMETERS (ID_AMM, DOMINIO, TSAURL, TSAUSER, TSAPASSWORD, USERAPPLICATIVA, PASSWORDAPPLICATIVA, SERVERURL) VALUES(@idAmministrazione@, '@dominio@', '@tsaurl@', '@tsauser@', '@tsapassword@', '@userapplicativa@', '@passwordapplicativa@', '@serverurl@')

query.name: U_DPA_HSMPARAMETERS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_HSMPARAMETERS SET DOMINIO = '@dominio@', TSAURL = '@tsaurl@', TSAUSER = '@tsauser@', TSAPASSWORD = '@tsapassword@', USERAPPLICATIVA = '@userapplicativa@', PASSWORDAPPLICATIVA = '@passwordapplicativa@', SERVERURL = '@serverurl@' WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: D_DPA_HSMPARAMETERS
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_HSMPARAMETERS WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_DPA_CLASSIFICAZIONE_TIPI_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CLASSIFICAZIONE_TIPI_DOC WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: U_DPA_CLASSIFICAZIONE_TIPI_DOC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CLASSIFICAZIONE_TIPI_DOC SET CHA_FASC_OBBLIGATORIA = '@chaFascObbligatoria@' WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND TIPO_DOC = '@tipoDoc@'

query.name: I_DPA_CLASSIFICAZIONE_TIPI_DOC
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CLASSIFICAZIONE_TIPI_DOC ( ID_AMM, TIPO_DOC, CHA_FASC_OBBLIGATORIA ) VALUES ( @idAmm@, '@tipoDoc@', '@chaFascObbligatoria@' )

query.name: S_STRUTTURE_SOTTOFASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,NAME FROM PROJECT_TEMPLATE

query.name: D_STRUTTURE_TEMPLATE
query.value: DELETE FROM PROJECT_TEMPLATE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @SystemId@

query.name: U_STRUTTURE_TEMPLATE
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT_TEMPLATE SET NAME = '@NAME@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @ID@

query.name: U_NODI_STRUTTURA
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT_STRUCTURE SET ID_PARENT = @IdParent@, NAME = '@Name@', ID_TEMPLATE = @IdTemplate@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @SystemId@

query.name: D_NODI_STRUTTURA
query.value: DELETE FROM PROJECT_STRUCTURE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @SystemId@

query.name: I_REL_PROJECT_STRUCTURE
query.value: INSERT INTO REL_PROJECT_STRUCTURE (ID_TIPO_FASCICOLO,ID_TITOLARIO,ID_TEMPLATE) VALUES (@ID_TIPO_FASCICOLO@,@ID_TITOLARIO@,@ID_TEMPLATE@)

query.name: S_TIPO_FASCICOLO
query.value: SELECT b.SYSTEM_ID, DESCRIPTION FROM PROJECT a JOIN DPA_TIPO_FASC b ON (a.ID_TIPO_FASC = b.SYSTEM_ID) WHERE a.SYSTEM_ID = @ID_FASCICOLO@

query.name: S_NODO_IN_FASCICOLI
query.value: select count(*) from project where ID_PARENT IN ( select system_id from project where cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and description = '@NODE_NAME@' and ( id_tipo_fasc IN (select id_tipo_fascicolo from rel_project_structure where id_template = @ID_TEMPLATE@ and id_tipo_fascicolo is not null) or id_titolario IN (select id_titolario from rel_project_structure where id_template = @ID_TEMPLATE@ and id_titolario is not null) ) )

query.name: S_FOLDERTEMPLATE_IN_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT system_id AS ID_FOLDER, id_parent AS ID_PARENT_FOLDER, id_fascicolo AS ID_FASCICOLO, description AS FOLDER_DESCRIPTION, cha_tipo_fascicolo, dta_apertura AS APERTURA FROM project WHERE cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND CHA_STATO != 'C' AND description = '@NAME@' AND ( id_tipo_fasc IN (select id_tipo_fascicolo from rel_project_structure where id_template = @ID_TEMPLATE@ and id_tipo_fascicolo is not null) or id_titolario IN (select id_titolario from rel_project_structure where id_template = @ID_TEMPLATE@ and id_titolario is not null) )

query.name: S_ROOTFOLDER_IN_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT system_id AS ID_FOLDER, id_parent AS ID_PARENT_FOLDER, id_fascicolo AS ID_FASCICOLO, description AS FOLDER_DESCRIPTION, cha_tipo_fascicolo, dta_apertura AS APERTURA FROM project WHERE cha_tipo_proj = 'C' AND id_parent IN ( SELECT distinct system_id FROM project WHERE cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND CHA_STATO != 'C' AND ( id_tipo_fasc IN (select id_tipo_fascicolo from rel_project_structure where id_template = @ID_TEMPLATE@ and id_tipo_fascicolo is not null) or id_titolario IN (select id_titolario from rel_project_structure where id_template = @ID_TEMPLATE@ and id_titolario is not null) ) )

query.name: U_FOLDERNAME_PROJECT
query.value: UPDATE project SET description = '@NEWNAME@' WHERE system_id = @SYSTEM_ID@

query.name: S_DPAMailElabIMAP
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_MAIL_ELABORATE WHERE VAR_MESSAGE = @param1@ and cha_ragione_elab in ('E','F') AND(ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR ID_REGISTRO = @idRegistro@)

query.name: U_DPAMailElab
query.value: UPDATE DPA_MAIL_ELABORATE SET cha_ragione_elab = '@param1@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: S_GET_MAX_NUM_FASC
query.value: SELECT NVL(MAX(NUM_FASCICOLO)+1, '1') FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO = 'P' AND ID_PARENT = @idTitolario@ AND ID_REGISTRO @idRegistro@

query.name: S_DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_STATI_PHASES
query.value: SELECT SP.ID_STATO, SP.ID_PHASES, P.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIZIONE_PHASE, SP.POSITION_PHASE, SP.CHA_INTERMEDIATE_PHASE, S.STATO_INIZIALE FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_STATI_PHASES SP, DPA_PHASES P, DPA_STATI S WHERE SP.ID_PHASES=P.SYSTEM_ID AND SP.ID_DIAGRAMMA=@idDiagramma@ AND S.SYSTEM_ID = SP.ID_STATO ORDER BY SP.POSITION_PHASE

query.name: S_DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_STATI_PHASES_BY_ID_FASE
query.value: SELECT SP.ID_STATO, SP.ID_PHASES, P.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIZIONE_PHASE, SP.POSITION_PHASE, SP.CHA_INTERMEDIATE_PHASE, S.STATO_INIZIALE, S.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE_STATO FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_STATI_PHASES SP, DPA_PHASES P, DPA_STATI S WHERE SP.ID_PHASES=P.SYSTEM_ID AND SP.ID_DIAGRAMMA=@idDiagramma@ AND S.SYSTEM_ID = SP.ID_STATO AND SP.ID_PHASES=@idFase@ ORDER BY SP.POSITION_PHASE

query.name: S_DPA_STATI_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_STATI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idStato@

query.name: GET_IDPRJ_BY_ASS_TEMPLATES
query.value: SELECT ID_PROJECT FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC WHERE ID_OGGETTO = @id_ogg_fasc@ AND UPPER(VALORE_OGGETTO_DB) = UPPER('@valore_oggetto_db@') ORDER BY ID_PROJECT @ordine@

query.name: GET_IDDOC_BY_ASS_TEMPLATES
query.value: SELECT DOC_NUMBER FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES WHERE ID_OGGETTO = @id_ogg_custom@ AND UPPER(VALORE_OGGETTO_DB) = UPPER('@valore_oggetto_db@') ORDER BY DOC_NUMBER @ordine@

query.name: CAP_REFACTOR_TRASMUT_1
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET VAR_NOTE_RIF = '@notaDaIns@', VAR_NOTE_ACC=NULL, CHA_RIFIUTATA = '1', CHA_ACCETTATA='0', CHA_VISTA='1', CHA_IN_TODOLIST='0', DTA_ACCETTATA = NULL, DTA_RIFIUTATA = @funzionedata@, DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST= @funzionedata@ WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE ID_TRASMISSIONE IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE WHERE ID_PROJECT =@idFascicolo@) )

query.name: CAP_REFACTOR_TRSING_2
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA SET VAR_NOTE_SING = '@notaDaIns@' WHERE ID_TRASMISSIONE IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE WHERE ID_PROJECT =@idFascicolo@)

query.name: CAP_REFACTOR_TRASM_3
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASMISSIONE SET DTA_INVIO = @funzionedata@, VAR_NOTE_GENERALI='@notaDaIns@' WHERE ID_PROJECT = @idFascicolo@

query.name: CAP_GET_OPPS_PENDING
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(D.SYSTEM_ID || ' ' ||F.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE || ' ' || TO_CHAR(B.DTA_SCADENZA,'dd.mm.yyyy') || ' '|| B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE) AS OPP @apprInfo@ , C.DTA_INVIO FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASMISSIONE C, PROJECT D, DPA_TIPO_FASC E, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM F WHERE A.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_PROJECT = D.SYSTEM_ID AND D.ID_TIPO_FASC = E.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(E.VAR_DESC_FASC) LIKE '@typePrefix@%' AND C.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = B.SYSTEM_ID AND (CHA_ACCETTATA ='1' OR CHA_RIFIUTATA = '1')) /* AND A.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND A.CHA_RIFIUTATA='0' AND A.DTA_RIFIUTATA IS NULL AND A.DTA_ACCETTATA IS NULL */ @soloApproval@ AND F.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RAGIONE AND A.ID_PEOPLE=@id_people@ @idOpp@ ORDER BY C.DTA_INVIO DESC

query.name: CAP_GET_OPPS_APPROVED
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(D.SYSTEM_ID || ' ' ||F.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE || ' ' || TO_CHAR(B.DTA_SCADENZA,'dd.mm.yyyy') || ' '|| B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE) AS OPP , C.DTA_INVIO FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASMISSIONE C, PROJECT D, DPA_TIPO_FASC E, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM F WHERE A.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_PROJECT = D.SYSTEM_ID AND D.ID_TIPO_FASC = E.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(E.VAR_DESC_FASC) LIKE '@typePrefix@%' AND C.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL /* AND (A.CHA_ACCETTATA='1' or A.CHA_RIFIUTATA='1') AND (A.DTA_RIFIUTATA IS not NULL or A.DTA_ACCETTATA IS not NULL) and (A.VAR_NOTE_RIF IS NULL OR UPPER(A.VAR_NOTE_RIF) NOT LIKE 'REMOVED%') */ and exists (select 'X' from dpa_trasm_utente where id_trasm_singola = b.system_id and (cha_accettata ='1' or cha_rifiutata = '1') and (VAR_NOTE_SING IS NULL OR UPPER(VAR_NOTE_SING) NOT LIKE 'REMOVED%')) AND F.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RAGIONE @soloApproval@ AND A.ID_PEOPLE=@id_people@ @idOpp@ ORDER BY C.DTA_INVIO DESC

query.name: CAP_GET_OPP_APPROVALS
query.value: SELECT (SELECT X.CHA_ACCETTATA || X.CHA_RIFIUTATA||''|| X.VAR_NOTE_RIF|| X.VAR_NOTE_ACC||''|| Y.VAR_NOME||''|| Y.VAR_COGNOME||''|| TO_CHAR(X.DTA_ACCETTATA,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss')|| TO_CHAR(X.DTA_RIFIUTATA,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE X, PEOPLE Y WHERE X.ID_PEOPLE = Y.SYSTEM_ID AND (X.DTA_ACCETTATA IS NOT NULL OR X.DTA_RIFIUTATA IS NOT NULL) AND X.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = B.SYSTEM_ID) AS UTENTE, F.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, B.SYSTEM_ID AS IDTRASMSING, H.VAR_DESC_CORR, TO_CHAR(C.DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as DTAINVIO FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASMISSIONE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM F, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI H WHERE B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND (C.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI IS NULL OR UPPER(C.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI) NOT LIKE 'REMOVED%') AND F.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RAGIONE AND C.ID_PROJECT = @idOpp@ AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = H.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY B.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: CAP_CTRL_CONTRIBUTION
query.value: SELECT C.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, (SELECT ID_PROFILE_REVIEW FROM DPA_TASK WHERE ID_PROJECT = A.ID_PROJECT AND ID_TRASMISSIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = B.SYSTEM_ID AND ID_RAGIONE_TRASM= C.SYSTEM_ID) AS CONTRIBUTO FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM C WHERE B.ID_TRASMISSIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_RAGIONE= C.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PROJECT = @idOpp@ AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI NOT LIKE 'REMOVED%'

query.name: S_DPA_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idContesto@

query.name: I_DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE
S_DPA_CORR_INTEROP_BY_ID_CORR
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CORR_INTEROP WHERE ID_CORR = @idCorr@

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_MESSAGGI_FLUSSO_INIZIALE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_MESSAGGI_FLUSSO WHERE CHA_MESSAGGIO_INIZIALE = '1'

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_MESSAGGI_FLUSSO_BY_ID_PROFILE
query.value: SELECT T.* FROM DPA_TIPO_MESSAGGI_FLUSSO t join DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE f on t.ID_MESSAGGIO = f.ID_MESSAGGIO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@

query.name: S_DPA_FLUSSO_MESSAGGI_BY_ID_MESSAGGIO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_MESSAGGI_FLUSSO t join DPA_FLUSSO_MESSAGGI m on t.ID_MESSAGGIO = m.ID_MESSAGGIO_SUCCESSIVO WHERE m.ID_MESSAGGIO = @idMessaggio@

query.name: S_DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE_ID_PROCESSO
query.value: SELECT ID_PROCESSO FROM DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@

query.name: S_DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE_BY_ID_PROCESSO
query.value: SELECT F.SYSTEM_ID, F.DTA_ARRIVO AS DATA_ARRIVO, F.NOME_REGISTRO, F.NUMERO_REGISTRO, convert(nvarchar (10), f.DTA_REGISTRO, 103) AS DTA_REGISTRO, F.ID_PROCESSO, P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_PROFILE, P.NUM_PROTO, P.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO, M.ID_MESSAGGIO, M.DESCRIZIONE, M.CHA_MESSAGGIO_INIZIALE, M.CHA_MESSAGGIO_FINALE FROM DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE F, DPA_TIPO_MESSAGGI_FLUSSO M, PROFILE P WHERE F.ID_PROCESSO = '@idProcesso@' AND M.ID_MESSAGGIO = F.ID_MESSAGGIO AND P.SYSTEM_ID = F.ID_PROFILE ORDER BY F.DTA_ARRIVO

query.name: S_DPA_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE

query.name: S_DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE_BY_ID_PROCESSO_INIZIALE
query.vale: SELECT * FROM DPA_FLUSSO_PROCEDURALE WHERE ID_PROCESSO='@idProcesso@' AND ID_MESSAGGIO=@idMessaggio@

query.name: S_PROJECT_NO_SECURITY2_BY_ID_PROFILE
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, DOCSADM.checksecurity(a.system_id, @param4@, @param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@, 'F') as SICUREZZA, @param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA,@param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.VAR_NOTE, A.ID_REGISTRO,DOCSADM.getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@, @idRuoloPubblico@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, A.ID_TITOLARIO, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, DOCSADM.getFascPrimaria(@param3@, A.SYSTEM_ID) as CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA, A.CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS, a.CHA_CONSENTI_FASC, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A JOIN PROJECT C ON A.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_FASCICOLO JOIN PROJECT_COMPONENTS B ON C.SYSTEM_ID=B.PROJECT_ID AND B.LINK=@param3@ WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND A.CHA_STATO = 'A' ORDER BY B.DTA_CLASS ASC

query.name: I_DPA_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE ( TIPO_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE, NOME, FAMIGLIA, VERSIONE ) VALUES ( '@tipoContesto@', '@nome@', @famiglia@, @versione@ )

query.name: U_DPA_TIPO_ATTO_CONTESTO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TIPO_ATTO SET ID_CONTESTO_PROCEDURALE = @idContestoProcedurale@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idTipoAtto@

query.name: I_DPA_CORR_INTEROP
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_INTEROP(ID_CORR, CHA_INTEROPERANTE_RGS) VALUES(@idCorr@, '@interoperanteRGS@')

query.name: D_DPA_CORR_INTEROP
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CORR_INTEROP WHERE ID_CORR = @idCorr@

query.name: S_GET_LICENSE
query.value: SELECT VAR_CONTENT FROM DPA_LIC WHERE COD_APP='@codApp@'

query.name: S_STATO_FASC_TRASMISSIONI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT B.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASM FROM DPA_STATI_RAGIONI_TRASM A, DPA_TRASMISSIONE B, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA C WHERE A.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM=C.ID_RAGIONE AND C.ID_TRASMISSIONE=B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.DTA_INVIO IS NULL AND B.ID_PROJECT=@idFasc@ AND A.ID_STATO=@idStato@

query.name: S_STATO_RAGIONI
query.value: SELECT B.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE FROM DPA_STATI_RAGIONI_TRASM A, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM B WHERE A.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM=B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_STATO=@idStato@

query.name: C3_GET_DOCS
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNAME, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, TO_CHAR(A.DTA_PROTO, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATAPROTO, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATACREAZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_CODICE ||''|| VAR_DESC_REGISTRO ||''|| CHA_RF FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_REGISTRO) AS REGISTRO, (SELECT FULL_NAME FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.AUTHOR) AS AUTORE, A.AUTHOR AS IDAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE) AS RUOLOCREATORE, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE as IDRUOLOAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_UO_CREATORE) AS UOCREATRICE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_ATTO) AS TIPOLOGIA, CORRCAT(A.SYSTEM_ID,A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO) MITT_DEST, (SELECT X.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE ||''|| Y.VERSION_LABEL ||''|| Z.MIME_TYPE ||''|| X.VERSION_ID ||''|| SUBSTR(X.PATH,INSTR(X.PATH,'\',-1)+1) ||''|| X.FILE_SIZE FROM COMPONENTS X, VERSIONS Y, APPS Z WHERE X.VERSION_ID = Y.VERSION_ID AND UPPER(X.EXT)= UPPER(Z.DEFAULT_EXTENSION) AND Z.MIME_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND Y.VERSION_ID = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER = A.SYSTEM_ID) AND X.DOCNUMBER=A.SYSTEM_ID AND ROWNUM =1) AS DOC_PRINCIPALE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS NUM_ALLEGATI, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE @dateLimits@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL AND A.CHA_IN_CESTINO IS NULL ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: C3_GET_ALLEGATI_BY_IDDOC
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, A.DOCNAME, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AS DATACREAZIONE, (SELECT X.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE ||''|| Y.VERSION_LABEL ||''|| Z.MIME_TYPE ||''|| X.VERSION_ID ||''|| SUBSTR(X.PATH,INSTR(X.PATH,'\',-1)+1) ||''|| X.FILE_SIZE FROM COMPONENTS X, VERSIONS Y, APPS Z WHERE X.VERSION_ID = Y.VERSION_ID AND UPPER(X.EXT)= UPPER(Z.DEFAULT_EXTENSION) AND Z.MIME_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND Y.VERSION_ID = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER = A.SYSTEM_ID) AND X.DOCNUMBER=A.SYSTEM_ID AND ROWNUM =1) AS FILE_ALLEGATO, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = @idDoc@ AND A.CHA_IN_CESTINO IS NULL ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: C3_GET_DOCS_MOD
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNAME, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, TO_CHAR(A.DTA_PROTO, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATAPROTO, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATACREAZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_CODICE ||''|| VAR_DESC_REGISTRO ||''|| CHA_RF FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_REGISTRO) AS REGISTRO, (SELECT FULL_NAME FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.AUTHOR) AS AUTORE, A.AUTHOR AS IDAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE) AS RUOLOCREATORE, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE as IDRUOLOAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_UO_CREATORE) AS UOCREATRICE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_ATTO) AS TIPOLOGIA, CORRCAT(A.SYSTEM_ID,A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO) MITT_DEST, (SELECT X.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE ||''|| Y.VERSION_LABEL ||''|| Z.MIME_TYPE ||''|| X.VERSION_ID ||''|| SUBSTR(X.PATH,INSTR(X.PATH,'\',-1)+1) ||''|| X.FILE_SIZE FROM COMPONENTS X, VERSIONS Y, APPS Z WHERE X.VERSION_ID = Y.VERSION_ID AND UPPER(X.EXT)= UPPER(Z.DEFAULT_EXTENSION) AND Z.MIME_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND Y.VERSION_ID = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER = A.SYSTEM_ID) AND X.DOCNUMBER=A.SYSTEM_ID AND ROWNUM =1) AS DOC_PRINCIPALE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS NUM_ALLEGATI, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE CREATION_TIME NOT @dateLimitsMod@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL AND A.CHA_IN_CESTINO IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM DPA_LOG WHERE ID_OGGETTO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND DTA_AZIONE @dateLimitsMod@ AND VAR_COD_AZIONE IN ('PUT_FILE','ADD_VERSION','MODIFIED_OBJECT_PROTO','RECORD_PREDISPOSED','MOD_MITT_DEST','MODIFIED_OBJECT_DOC','ANNULL_PROTOCOLLO')) ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: C3_GET_DOCS_MOD_ALLEGATI
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNAME, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, TO_CHAR(A.DTA_PROTO, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATAPROTO, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATACREAZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_CODICE ||''|| VAR_DESC_REGISTRO ||''|| CHA_RF FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_REGISTRO) AS REGISTRO, (SELECT FULL_NAME FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.AUTHOR) AS AUTORE, A.AUTHOR AS IDAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE) AS RUOLOCREATORE, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE as IDRUOLOAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_UO_CREATORE) AS UOCREATRICE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_ATTO) AS TIPOLOGIA, CORRCAT(A.SYSTEM_ID,A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO) MITT_DEST, (SELECT X.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE ||''|| Y.VERSION_LABEL ||''|| Z.MIME_TYPE ||''|| X.VERSION_ID ||''|| SUBSTR(X.PATH,INSTR(X.PATH,'\',-1)+1) ||''|| X.FILE_SIZE FROM COMPONENTS X, VERSIONS Y, APPS Z WHERE X.VERSION_ID = Y.VERSION_ID AND UPPER(X.EXT)= UPPER(Z.DEFAULT_EXTENSION) AND Z.MIME_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND Y.VERSION_ID = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER = A.SYSTEM_ID) AND X.DOCNUMBER=A.SYSTEM_ID AND ROWNUM =1) AS DOC_PRINCIPALE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS NUM_ALLEGATI, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE CREATION_TIME NOT @dateLimitsMod@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL AND A.CHA_IN_CESTINO IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM DPA_LOG Q, PROFILE W WHERE Q.ID_OGGETTO = W.SYSTEM_ID AND Q.DTA_AZIONE @dateLimitsMod@ AND Q.VAR_COD_AZIONE IN ('PUT_FILE','ADD_VERSION','MODIFIED_OBJECT_PROTO','RECORD_PREDISPOSED','MOD_MITT_DEST','MODIFIED_OBJECT_DOC','ANNULL_PROTOCOLLO') AND W.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = A.SYSTEM_ID) ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: C3_GET_DOCS_MOD_LED
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNAME, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, TO_CHAR(A.DTA_PROTO, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATAPROTO, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATACREAZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_CODICE ||''|| VAR_DESC_REGISTRO ||''|| CHA_RF FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_REGISTRO) AS REGISTRO, (SELECT FULL_NAME FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.AUTHOR) AS AUTORE, A.AUTHOR AS IDAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE) AS RUOLOCREATORE, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE as IDRUOLOAUTORE, (SELECT VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_UO_CREATORE) AS UOCREATRICE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID ||''|| VAR_DESC_ATTO FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_ATTO) AS TIPOLOGIA, CORRCAT(A.SYSTEM_ID,A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO) MITT_DEST, (SELECT X.VAR_NOMEORIGINALE ||''|| Y.VERSION_LABEL ||''|| Z.MIME_TYPE ||''|| X.VERSION_ID ||''|| SUBSTR(X.PATH,INSTR(X.PATH,'\',-1)+1) ||''|| X.FILE_SIZE FROM COMPONENTS X, VERSIONS Y, APPS Z WHERE X.VERSION_ID = Y.VERSION_ID AND UPPER(X.EXT)= UPPER(Z.DEFAULT_EXTENSION) AND Z.MIME_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND Y.VERSION_ID = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER = A.SYSTEM_ID) AND X.DOCNUMBER=A.SYSTEM_ID AND ROWNUM =1) AS DOC_PRINCIPALE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = A.SYSTEM_ID) AS NUM_ALLEGATI, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO FROM PROFILE A WHERE CREATION_TIME NOT @dateLimitsMod@ AND LAST_EDIT_DATE @dateLimitsMod@ AND A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL AND A.CHA_IN_CESTINO IS NULL ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_DPA_CAP_COMUNI
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_INFO_COMUNI WHERE VAR_CAP like '@cap@%' @condComune@ order by VAR_CAP

query.name: S_DPA_CAP
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_INFO_COMUNI WHERE VAR_CAP = '@cap@' condComune

query.name: S_DPA_CAP_COMUNI_BY_COMUNE
query.value: SELECT VAR_COMUNE FROM DPA_INFO_COMUNI WHERE UPPER(VAR_COMUNE) like '%@comune@%' GROUP BY VAR_COMUNE ORDER BY VAR_COMUNE

query.name: S_DPA_PROVINCIA_BY_COMUNE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_INFO_COMUNI WHERE UPPER(VAR_COMUNE) = '@comune@'

query.name: I_DPA_PREF_MOBILE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_PREF_MOBILE SELECT SEQ_DPA_PREF_MOBILE.NEXTVAL, @idpeopleowner@, system_id, id_people || id_gruppo, var_desc_corr, cha_tipo_urp, '@cha_tipo_pref@' FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI where system_id in (@idcorr@,@idinternal@)

query.name: S_DPA_PREF_MOBILE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_PREF_MOBILE @condizione@

query.name: D_DPA_PREF_MOBILE
query.value: DELETE DPA_PREF_MOBILE WHERE @condizione@

query.name: S_TIPORAG_TRASMSING
query.value: SELECT A.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE AS TIPORAGIONE FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RAGIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = @idTrasmSing@

query.name: D_DPA_PEOPLE_OTP_RESET_PASSWORD
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_PEOPLE_OTP_RESET_PASSWORD WHERE USER_ID_PEOPLE = '@userId@'

query.name: I_DPA_PEOPLE_OTP_RESET_PASSWORD
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_PEOPLE_OTP_RESET_PASSWORD ( SYSTEM_ID, USER_ID_PEOPLE, VAR_EMAIL, VAR_OTP, DTA_INSERIMENTO ) VALUES ( @systemId@ '@userId@', '@email@', '@otp@', @dataInserimento@ )

query.name: S_DPA_PEOPLE_OTP_RESET_PASSWORD
query.value: SELECT VAR_OTP FROM DPA_PEOPLE_OTP_RESET_PASSWORD WHERE UPPER(USER_ID_PEOPLE) = UPPER('@userId@')
